[03] idha ^a^V0.0158^ea^ bhikkhu asantaasii hoti anuttaasii aparittaasii; so na tasati na uttasati na parittasati na bhaayati na santaasa.m aapajjati. kula.m vaa na labhaami, ga.na.m vaa na labhaami, aavaasa.m vaa na labhaami, laabha.m vaa na labhaami, yasa.m vaa na labhaami, pasa.msa.m vaa na labhaami, sukha.m vaa na labhaami, ciivara.m vaa na labhaami, pi.n.dapaata.m vaa na labhaami, senaasana.m vaa na labhaami, gilaanapaccayabhesajjaparikkhaara.m vaa na labhaami, gilaanupa.t.thaaka.m vaa na labhaami, appa~n~naatomhiiti na tasati na uttasati na parittasati na bhaayati na santaasa.m aapajjatiiti -- akkodhano asantaasii.

[03] ^b^avikatthii akukkuco^eb^ti. idhekacco katthii hoti vikatthii, so katthati vikatthati -- ahamasmi siilasampannoti vaa vatasampannoti vaa siilabbatasampannoti vaa jaatiyaa vaa gottena vaa kolaputtiyena vaa va.n.napokkharataaya ^a^M0.0167^ea^ vaa dhanena vaa ajjhenena vaa kammaayatanena vaa sippaayatanena vaa vijjaa.t.thaanena vaa sutena vaa ^a^T0.0260^ea^ pa.tibhaanena vaa a~n~natara~n~natarena vaa vatthunaa. uccaa kulaa ^a^P1.0218^ea^ pabbajitoti vaa mahaakulaa pabbajitoti vaa, mahaabhogakulaa pabbajitoti vaa u.laarabhogakulaa pabbajitoti vaa, ~naato yasassii gaha.t.thapabbajitaananti vaa, laabhimhi ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanapaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraananti vaa, suttantikoti vaa vinayadharoti vaa dhammakathikoti vaa, aara~n~nikoti vaa pi.n.dapaatikoti vaa pa.msukuulikoti vaa teciivarikoti vaa, sapadaanacaarikoti vaa khalupacchaabhattikoti vaa nesajjikoti vaa yathaasanthatikoti vaa, pa.thamassa jhaanassa laabhiiti vaa dutiyassa jhaanassa laabhiiti vaa tatiyassa jhaanassa laabhiiti vaa catutthassa jhaanassa laabhiiti vaa, aakaasaana~ncaayatanasamaapattiyaa... vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanasamaapattiyaa... aaki~nca~n~naayatanasamaapattiyaa... nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanasamaapattiyaa laabhiiti vaa katthati vikatthati. eva.m na katthati na vikatthati, katthanaa vikatthanaa aarato virato pa.tivirato nikkhanto nissa.to vippamutto visa~n~nutto vimariyaadikatena cetasaa viharatiiti -- avikatthii.

[03] ^b^akukkuco^eb^ti. ^b^kukkucca^eb^nti hatthakukkuccampi kukkucca.m, paadakukkuccampi kukkucca.m, hatthapaadakukkuccampi kukkucca.m, akappiye kappiyasa~n~nitaa kappiye akappiyasa~n~nitaa, vikaale kaalasa~n~nitaa kaale vikaalasa~n~nitaa, avajje vajjasa~n~nitaa vajje avajjasa~n~nitaa; ya.m evaruupa.m kukkucca.m kukkuccaayanaa kukkuccaayitatta.m cetaso vippa.tisaaro manovilekho -- ida.m vuccati kukkucca.m.

[01] api ^a^T0.0261^ea^ ^a^V0.0159^ea^ ca dviihi kaara.nehi uppajjati kukkucca.m cetaso vippa.tisaaro manovilekho katattaa ca akatattaa ca. katha.m katattaa ca akatattaa ca uppajjati kukkucca.m cetaso vippa.tisaaro manovilekho? ``kata.m me kaayaduccarita.m, akata.m me kaayasucarita''ntiuppajjati kukkucca.m cetaso vippa.tisaaro manovilekho; ``kata.m me vaciiduccarita.m, akata.m me vaciisucarita.m... kata.m me manoduccarita.m, akata.m me manosucarita''nti -- uppajjati kukkucca.m cetaso vippa.tisaaro manovilekho; ``kato me paa.naatipaato, akataa me paa.naatipaataa verama.nii''ti -- uppajjati kukkucca.m ^a^M0.0168^ea^ cetaso vippa.tisaaro manovilekho; ``kata.m me adinnaadaana.m ^a^P1.0219^ea^, akataa me adinnaadaanaa verama.nii''ti -- uppajjati kukkucca.m cetaso vippa.tisaaro manovilekho; ``kato me kaamesumicchaacaaro, akataa me kaamesumicchaacaaraa verama.nii''ti -- uppajjati kukkucca.m cetaso vippa.tisaaro manovilekho; ``kato me musaavaado, akataa me musaavaadaa verama.nii''ti... ``kataa me pisu.naa vaacaa, akataa me pisu.naaya vaacaaya verama.nii''ti... ``kataa me pharusaa vaacaa, akataa me pharusaaya vaacaaya verama.nii''ti... ``kato me samphappalaapo, akataa me samphappalaapaa verama.nii''ti... ``kataa me abhijjhaa, akataa me anabhijjhaa''ti... ``kato me byaapaado, akato me abyaapaado''ti... ``kataa me micchaadi.t.thi, akataa me sammaadi.t.thii''ti -- uppajjati kukkucca.m cetaso ^a^T0.0262^ea^ vippa.tisaaro manovilekho. eva.m katattaa ca akatattaa ca uppajjati kukkucca.m cetaso vippa.tisaaro manovilekho.

[03] atha vaa ``siilesumhi na paripuurakaarii''ti -- uppajjati kukkucca.m cetaso vippa.tisaaro manovilekho; ``indriyesumhi aguttadvaaro''ti... ``bhojane amatta~n~numhii''ti... ``jaagariya.m ananuyuttomhii''ti... ``na satisampaja~n~nena samannaagatomhii''ti... ``abhaavitaa me cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa''ti... ``abhaavitaa me cattaaro sammappadhaanaa''ti... ``abhaavitaa me cattaaro iddhipaadaa''ti... ``abhaavitaani me pa~ncindriyaanii''ti... ``abhaavitaani me pa~nca balaanii''ti... ``abhaavitaa me satta bojjha"ngaa''ti... ``abhaavito me ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo''ti... ``dukkha.m me apari~n~naata''nti... ``samudayo me appahiino''ti... ``maggo me abhaavito''ti... ``nirodho me asacchikato''ti -- uppajjati kukkucca.m cetaso vippa.tisaaro manovilekho. yasseta.m kukkucca.m pahiina.m samucchinna.m vuupasanta.m pa.tipassaddha.m abhabbuppattika.m ~naa.nagginaa da.d.dha.m, so vuccati akukkuccoti -- avikatthii akukkuco.

[03] ^b^mantabhaa.nii anuddhato^eb^ti. mantaa vuccati pa~n~naa. yaa pa~n~naa pajaananaa...pe0... amoho dhammavicayo sammaadi.t.thi. mantaaya pariggahetvaa pariggahetvaa vaaca.m bhaasati bahumpi kathento bahumpi ^a^V0.0160^ea^ bha.nanto bahumpi diipayanto bahumpi voharanto. dukkathita.m dubbha.nita.m ^a^P1.0220^ea^ dullapita.m durutta.m dubbhaasita.m vaaca.m na bhaasatiiti -- mantabhaa.nii. ^b^anuddhato^eb^ti. tattha katama.m ^a^T0.0263^ea^ uddhacca.m? ya.m cittassa uddhacca.m ^a^M0.0169^ea^ avuupasamo cetaso vikkhepo bhantatta.m cittassa -- ida.m vuccati uddhacca.m. yasseta.m uddhacca.m pahiina.m samucchinna.m vuupasanta.m pa.tipassaddha.m abhabbuppattika.m ~naa.nagginaa da.d.dha.m, so vuccati anuddhatoti -- mantabhaa.nii anuddhato.

[03] ^b^sa ve vaacaayato munii^eb^ti. idha bhikkhu musaavaada.m pahaaya musaavaadaa pa.tivirato hoti saccavaadii saccasandho theto paccayiko avisa.mvaadako lokassa. pisu.na.m vaaca.m pahaaya pisu.naaya vaacaaya pa.tivirato hoti -- ito sutvaa na amutra akkhaataa imesa.m bhedaaya, amutra vaa sutvaa na imesa.m akkhaataa amuusa.m bhedaaya. iti bhinnaana.m vaa sandhaataa, sahitaana.m vaa anuppadaataa, samaggaaraamo samaggarato samagganandii samaggakara.ni.m vaaca.m bhaasitaa hoti. pharusa.m vaaca.m pahaaya pharusaaya vaacaaya pa.tivirato hoti -- yaa saa vaacaa nelaa ka.n.nasukhaa pemaniiyaa hadaya"ngamaa porii bahujanakantaa bahujanamanaapaa tathaaruupi.m vaaca.m bhaasitaa hoti. samphappalaapa.m pahaaya samphappalaapaa pa.tivirato hoti -- kaalavaadii bhuutavaadii atthavaadii dhammavaadii vinayavaadii nidhaanavati.m vaaca.m bhaasitaa hoti kaalena saapadesa.m pariyantavati.m atthasa.mhita.m. catuuhi vaciisucaritehi samannaagato catuddosaapagata.m vaaca.m bhaasati, baatti.msaaya tiracchaanakathaaya aarato assa virato pa.tivirato nikkhanto nissa.to vippamutto visa~n~nutto vimariyaadikatena cetasaa viharati.

[03] dasa kathaavatthuuni kathesi, seyyathida.m -- appicchakatha.m katheti, santu.t.thiikatha.m ^a^T0.0264^ea^ katheti, pavivekakatha.m... asa.msaggakatha.m... viiriyaarambhakatha.m... siilakatha.m... samaadhikatha.m... pa~n~naakatha.m... vimuttikatha.m ^a^P1.0221^ea^... vimutti~naa.nadassanakatha.m... satipa.t.thaanakatha.m... sammappadhaanakatha.m... iddhipaadakatha.m... indriyakatha.m... balakatha.m... bojjha"ngakatha.m... maggakatha.m... phalakatha.m... nibbaanakatha.m katheti. ^b^vaacaayato^eb^ti yatto pariyatto gutto gopito rakkhito vuupasanto. ^b^munii^eb^ti. ^b^mona^eb^.m vuccati ~naa.na.m. yaa pa~n~naa pajaananaa...pe0... amoho dhammavicayo sammaadi.t.thi...pe0... sa"ngajaalamaticca so muniiti -- sa ve vaacaayato muni.
[03] tenaaha bhagavaa --
[21] ``akkodhano asantaasii, avikatthii akukkuco.
[22] mantabhaa.nii anuddhato, sa ve vaacaayato munii''ti..
[21] ^b^niraasatti^eb^ ^a^V0.0161^ea^ ^a^M0.0170^ea^ ^b^anaagate, atiita.m naanusocati.^eb^
[22] ^b^vivekadassii phassesu, di.t.thiisu ca na niiyati..^eb^

[03] ^b^niraasatti anaagate^eb^ti. ^b^aasatti^eb^ vuccati ta.nhaa. yo raago saaraago...pe0... abhijjhaa lobho akusalamuula.m. yassesaa aasatti ta.nhaa pahiinaa samucchinnaa vuupasantaa pa.tipassaddhaa abhabbuppattikaa ~naa.nagginaa da.d.dhaati. evampi niraasatti anaagate. atha vaa ``eva.mruupo siya.m anaagatamaddhaana''nti tattha nandi.m na samannaaneti, ``eva.mvedano siya.m... eva.msa~n~no siya.m... eva.msa"nkhaaro siya.m... eva.mvi~n~naa.no siya.m anaagatamaddhaana''nti tattha nandi.m na samannaaneti. evampi niraasatti anaagate. atha vaa ``iti me cakkhu siyaa anaagatamaddhaana.m -- iti ruupaa''ti appa.tiladdhassa pa.tilaabhaaya citta.m na pa.nidahati ^a^T0.0265^ea^, cetaso appa.nidhaanappaccayaa na tadabhinandati; na tadabhinandanto. evampi niraasatti anaagate. ``iti me sota.m siyaa anaagatamaddhaana.m -- iti saddaa''ti...pe0... ``iti me mano siyaa anaagatamaddhaana.m -- iti dhammaa''ti appa.tiladdhassa pa.tilaabhaaya citta.m na pa.nidahati, cetaso appa.nidhaanappaccayaa ^a^P1.0222^ea^ na tadabhinandati; na tadabhinandanto. evampi niraasatti anaagate. atha vaa ``iminaaha.m siilena vaa vatena vaa tapena vaa brahmacariyena vaa devo vaa bhavissaami deva~n~nataro vaa''ti appa.tiladdhassa pa.tilaabhaaya citta.m na pa.nidahati, cetaso appa.nidhaanappaccayaa na tadabhinandati; na tadabhinandanto. evampi niraasatti anaagate.

[03] ^b^atiita.m naanusocatii^eb^ti. vipari.nata.m vaa vatthu.m na socati, vipari.natasmi.m vaa vatthusmi.m na socati, ``cakkhu me vipari.nata''nti na socati, ``sota.m me... ghaana.m me... jivhaa me... kaayo me... ruupaa me... saddaa me... gandhaa me... rasaa me... pho.t.thabbaa me... kula.m me... ga.no me... aavaaso me... laabho me... yaso me... pasa.msaa me... sukha.m me... ciivara.m me... pi.n.dapaato me... senaasana.m me... gilaanapaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaro me... maataa me... pitaa me... bhaataa me... bhaginii me... putto me... dhiitaa me... mittaa me... amaccaa me... ~naatakaa me... saalohitaa me vipari.nataa''ti na socati na kilamati na paridevati na urattaa.li.m kandati na sammoha.m aapajjatiiti -- atiita.m naanusocati.

[03] ^b^vivekadassii^eb^ ^a^T0.0266^ea^ ^a^M0.0171^ea^ ^b^phassesuu^eb^ti. cakkhusamphasso sotasamphasso ghaanasamphasso jivhaasamphasso kaayasamphasso manosamphasso, adhivacanasamphasso pa.tighasamphasso, sukhavedaniiyo phasso dukkhavedaniiyo phasso adukkhamasukhavedaniiyo phasso, kusalo phasso akusalo phasso abyaakato ^a^V0.0162^ea^ phasso, kaamaavacaro phasso ruupaavacaro phasso aruupaavacaro phasso, su~n~nato phasso animitto phasso appa.nihito phasso, lokiyo phasso lokuttaro phasso, atiito phasso anaagato phasso paccuppanno phasso; yo evaruupo phasso phusanaa samphusanaa samphusitatta.m -- aya.m vuccati phasso.

[03] ^b^vivekadassii phassesuu^eb^ti. cakkhusamphassa.m vivitta.m passati attena vaa attaniyena vaa niccena vaa dhuvena vaa sassatena vaa avipari.naamadhammena vaa, sotasamphassa.m vivitta.m ^a^P1.0223^ea^ passati... ghaanasamphassa.m vivitta.m passati... jivhaasamphassa.m vivitta.m passati... kaayasamphassa.m vivitta.m passati... manosamphassa.m vivitta.m passati... adhivacanasamphassa.m vivitta.m passati... pa.tighasamphassa.m vivitta.m passati... sukhavedaniiya.m phassa.m... dukkhavedaniiya.m phassa.m... adukkhamasukhavedaniiya.m phassa.m... kusala.m phassa.m... akusala.m phassa.m... abyaakata.m phassa.m... kaamaavacara.m phassa.m... ruupaavacara.m phassa.m... aruupaavacara.m phassa.m... lokiya.m phassa.m vivitta.m passati attena vaa attaniyena vaa niccena vaa dhuvena vaa sassatena vaa avipari.naamadhammena vaa.

[03] atha vaa atiita.m phassa.m anaagatehi ca paccuppannehi ca phassehi ^a^T0.0267^ea^ vivitta.m passati, anaagata.m phassa.m atiitehi ca paccuppannehi ca phassehi vivitta.m passati, paccuppanna.m phassa.m atiitehi ca anaagatehi ca phassehi vivitta.m passati. atha vaa ye te phassaa ariyaa anaasavaa lokuttaraa su~n~natapa.tisa~n~nuttaa, te phasse vivitte passati raagena dosena mohena kodhena upanaahena makkhena pa.laasena issaaya macchariyena maayaaya saa.theyyena thambhena saarambhena maanena atimaanena madena pamaadena sabbakilesehi sabbaduccaritehi sabbadarathehi sabbapari.laahehi sabbasantaapehi sabbaakusalaabhisa"nkhaarehi vivitte passatiiti -- vivekadassii phassesu.

[03] ^b^di.t.thiisu ca na niiyatii^eb^ti. tassa dvaasa.t.thi di.t.thigataani pahiinaani samucchinnaani vuupasantaani pa.tipassaddhaani abhabbuppattikaani ~naa.nagginaa da.d.dhaani. so di.t.thiyaa na ^a^M0.0172^ea^ yaayati na niiyati na vuyhati na sa.mhariiyati; napi ta.m di.t.thigata.m saarato pacceti na paccaagacchatiiti -- di.t.thiisu ca na niiyati.
[03] tenaaha ^a^V0.0163^ea^ bhagavaa --
[21] ``niraasatti ^a^P1.0224^ea^ anaagate, atiita.m naanusocati.
[22] vivekadassii phassesu, di.t.thiisu ca na niiyatii''ti..
[21] ^b^patiliino akuhako, apihaalu amaccharii.^eb^
[22] ^b^appagabbho ajeguccho, pesu.neyye ca no yuto..^eb^

[03] ^b^patiliino akuhako^eb^ti. ^b^patiliino^eb^ti raagassa pahiinattaa patiliino, dosassa pahiinattaa patiliino, mohassa pahiinattaa patiliino, kodhassa... upanaahassa ^a^T0.0268^ea^... makkhassa... pa.laasassa... issaaya... macchariyassa...pe0... sabbaakusalaabhisa"nkhaaraana.m pahiinattaa patiliino. vutta~nheta.m bhagavataa -- ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu patiliino hoti? imassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno asmimaano pahiino hoti ucchinnamuulo taalaavatthukato anabhaava.mkato aayati.m anuppaadadhammo. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu patiliino hotii''ti -- patiliino.
[03] ^b^akuhako^eb^ti tii.ni kuhanavatthuuni -- paccayapa.tisevanasa"nkhaata.m kuhanavatthu, iriyaapathasa"nkhaata.m kuhanavatthu, saamantajappanasa"nkhaata.m kuhanavatthu.

[03] katama.m paccayapa.tisevanasa"nkhaata.m kuhanavatthu? idha gahapatikaa bhikkhu.m nimantenti ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanapaccayabhesajjaparikkhaarehi. so paapiccho icchaapakato atthiko ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanapaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraana.m bhiyyokamyata.m upaadaaya ciivara.m paccakkhaati, pi.n.dapaata.m paccakkhaati, senaasana.m paccakkhaati, gilaanapaccayabhesajjaparikkhaara.m paccakkhaati. so evamaaha -- ``ki.m sama.nassa mahagghena ciivarena! eta.m saaruppa.m ya.m sama.no susaanaa vaa sa"nkaarakuu.taa vaa paapa.nikaa vaa nantakaani uccinitvaa sa"nghaa.ti.m katvaa dhaareyya. ki.m sama.nassa mahagghena pi.n.dapaatena ^a^P1.0225^ea^! eta.m saaruppa.m ya.m sama.no u~nchaacariyaaya pi.n.diyaalopena jiivika.m kappeyya. ki.m sama.nassa mahagghena senaasanena! eta.m saaruppa.m ya.m sama.no rukkhamuuliko vaa assa sosaaniko vaa abbhokaasiko ^a^T0.0269^ea^ vaa. ki.m sama.nassa mahagghena gilaanapaccayabhesajjaparikkhaarena! eta.m saaruppa.m ya.m sama.no puutimuttena vaa haritakiikha.n.dena vaa osadha.m kareyyaa''ti. tadupaadaaya luukha.m ciivara.m dhaareti, luukha.m pi.n.dapaata.m paribhu~njati, luukha.m senaasana.m pa.tisevati ^a^M0.0173^ea^, luukha.m gilaanapaccayabhesajjaparikkhaara.m pa.tisevati. tamena.m gahapatikaa eva.m jaananti -- ``aya.m sama.no appiccho santu.t.tho pavivitto asa.msa.t.tho aaraddhaviiriyo ^a^V0.0164^ea^ dhutavaado''ti bhiyyo bhiyyo nimantenti ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanapaccayabhesajjaparikkhaarehi. so evamaaha -- ``ti.n.na.m sammukhiibhaavaa saddho kulaputto bahu.m pu~n~na.m pasavati. saddhaaya sammukhiibhaavaa saddho kulaputto bahu.m pu~n~na.m pasavati, deyyadhammassa sammukhiibhaavaa saddho kulaputto bahu.m pu~n~na.m pasavati, dakkhi.neyyaana.m sammukhiibhaavaa saddho kulaputto bahu.m pu~n~na.m pasavati. `tumhaaka~ncevaaya.m saddhaa atthi, deyyadhammo ca sa.mvijjati, aha~nca pa.tiggaahako. saceha.m na pa.tiggahessaami, eva.m tumhe pu~n~nena paribaahiraa bhavissanti. na mayha.m iminaa attho. api ca tumhaaka.myeva anukampaaya pa.tigga.nhaamii'''ti. tadupaadaaya bahumpi ciivara.m pa.tigga.nhaati, bahumpi pi.n.dapaata.m pa.tigga.nhaati, bahumpi gilaanapaccayabhesajjaparikkhaara.m pa.tigga.nhaati. yaa evaruupaa bhaaku.tikaa bhaaku.tiya.m kuhanaa kuhaayanaa kuhitatta.m -- ida.m paccayapa.tisevanasa"nkhaata.m kuhanavatthu.

[03] katama.m ^a^T0.0270^ea^ iriyaapathasa"nkhaata.m kuhanavatthu? idhekacco paapiccho icchaapakato sambhaavanaadhippaayo, ``eva.m ma.m jano sambhaavessatii''ti, gamana.m sa.n.thapeti .thaana.m sa.n.thapeti ^a^P1.0226^ea^ nisajja.m sa.n.thapeti sayana.m sa.n.thapeti, pa.nidhaaya gacchati pa.nidhaaya ti.t.thati pa.nidhaaya nisiidati pa.nidhaaya seyya.m kappeti, samaahito viya gacchati samaahito viya ti.t.thati samaahito viya nisiidati samaahito viya seyya.m kappeti, aapaathakajjhaayiiva hoti. yaa evaruupaa iriyaapathassa .thapanaa aa.thapanaa {a.t.thapanaa (sii0)} sa.n.thapanaa bhaaku.tikaa bhaaku.tiya.m kuhanaa kuhaayanaa kuhitatta.m -- ida.m iriyaapathasa"nkhaata.m kuhanavatthu.

[03] katama.m saamantajappanasa"nkhaata.m kuhanavatthu? idhekacco paapiccho icchaapakato sambhaavanaadhippaayo, ``eva.m ma.m jano sambhaavessatii''ti, ariyadhammasannissita.m vaaca.m bhaasati. ``yo evaruupa.m ciivara.m dhaareti so sama.no mahesakkho''ti bha.nati; ``yo evaruupa.m patta.m dhaareti... lohathaalaka.m dhaareti... dhammakara.na.m dhaareti... parisaavana.m dhaareti... ku~ncika.m dhaareti... upaahana.m dhaareti... kaayabandhana.m dhaareti... aayoga.m dhaareti so sama.no ^a^M0.0174^ea^ mahesakkho''ti bha.nati; ``yassa evaruupo upajjhaayo so sama.no mahesakkho''ti bha.nati; ``yassa evaruupo aacariyo... evaruupaa samaanupajjhaayakaa... samaanaacariyakaa... mittaa... sandi.t.thaa... sambhattaa... sahaayaa so sama.no mahesakkho''ti bha.nati; ``yo evaruupe vihaare vasati so sama.no mahesakkho''ti bha.nati; ``yo evaruupe ^a^T0.0271^ea^ a.d.dhayoge vasati... paasaade vasati... hammiye vasati... guhaaya.m vasati... le.ne vasati... ku.tiyaa vasati... kuu.taagaare vasati... a.t.te vasati ^a^V0.0165^ea^... maa.le vasati... udda.n.de vasati... upa.t.thaanasaalaaya.m vasati... ma.n.dape vasati... rukkhamuule vasati, so sama.no mahesakkho''ti bha.nati.

[03] atha vaa korajikakorajiko {kora~njikakora~njiko (sii0)} bhaaku.tikabhaaku.tiko kuhakakuhako lapakalapako mukhasambhaaviko, ``aya.m sama.no imaasa.m evaruupaana.m santaana.m vihaarasamaapattiina.m laabhii''ti taadisa.m gambhiira.m guu.lha.m nipu.na.m pa.ticchanna.m lokuttara.m su~n~nataapa.tisa.myutta.m ^a^P1.0227^ea^ katha.m kathesi. yaa evaruupaa bhaaku.tikaa bhaaku.tiya.m kuhanaa kuhaayanaa kuhitatta.m -- ida.m saamantajappanasa"nkhaata.m kuhanavatthu. yassimaani tii.ni kuhanavatthuuni pahiinaani samucchinnaani vuupasantaani pa.tipassaddhaani abhabbuppattikaani ~naa.nagginaa da.d.dhaani, so vuccati akuhakoti -- patiliino akuhako.

[03] ^b^apihaalu amaccharii^eb^ti. pihaa vuccati ta.nhaa. yo raago saaraago...pe0... abhijjhaa lobho akusalamuula.m. yassesaa pihaa ta.nhaa pahiinaa samucchinnaa vuupasantaa pa.tipassaddhaa abhabbuppattikaa ~naa.nagginaa da.d.dhaa, so vuccati apihaalu. so ruupe na piheti, sadde... gandhe... rase... pho.t.thabbe... kula.m... ga.na.m... aavaasa.m... laabha.m... yasa.m... pasa.msa.m... sukha.m... ciivara.m... pi.n.dapaata.m... senaasana.m... gilaanapaccayabhesajjaparikkhaara.m... kaamadhaatu.m... ruupadhaatu.m... aruupadhaatu.m... kaamabhava.m... ruupabhava.m... aruupabhava.m... sa~n~naabhava.m... asa~n~naabhava.m ^a^T0.0272^ea^... nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naabhava.m... ekavokaarabhava.m... catuvokaarabhava.m... pa~ncavokaarabhava.m... atiita.m... anaagata.m... paccuppanna.m... di.t.thasutamutavi~n~naatabbe dhamme na piheti na icchati na saadiyati na pattheti naabhijappatiiti -- apihaalu. ^b^amaccharii^eb^ti pa~nca macchariyaani -- aavaasamacchariya.m, kulamacchariya.m, laabhamacchariya.m, va.n.namacchariya.m, dhammamacchariya.m. ya.m evaruupa.m macchara.m maccharaayanaa maccharaayitatta.m veviccha.m kadariya.m ka.tuka~ncukataa ^a^M0.0175^ea^ aggahitatta.m cittassa -- ida.m vuccati macchariya.m. api ca khandhamacchariyampi macchariya.m, dhaatumacchariyampi macchariya.m, aayatanamacchariyampi macchariya.m gaaho -- ida.m vuccati macchariya.m. yasseta.m macchariya.m pahiina.m samucchinna.m vuupasanta.m pa.tipassaddha.m abhabbuppattika.m ~naa.nagginaa da.d.dha.m, so vuccati amacchariiti -- apihaalu amaccharii.

[03] ^b^appagabbho^eb^ ^a^P1.0228^ea^ ^b^ajeguccho^eb^ti. paagabbhiyanti tii.ni paagabbhiyaani -- kaayika.m paagabbhiya.m, vaacasika.m paagabbhiya.m, cetasika.m paagabbhiya.m. katama.m kaayika.m paagabbhiya.m? idhekacco sa"nghagatopi kaayika.m paagabbhiya.m dasseti, ga.nagatopi kaayika.m paagabbhiya.m dasseti, bhojanasaalaayampi ^a^V0.0166^ea^ kaayika.m paagabbhiya.m dasseti, jantaagharepi kaayika.m paagabbhiya.m dasseti, udakatitthepi kaayika.m paagabbhiya.m dasseti, antaraghara.m pavisantopi kaayika.m paagabbhiya.m dasseti, antaraghara.m pavi.t.thopi kaayika.m paagabbhiya.m dasseti.

[03] katha.m sa"nghagato kaayika.m paagabbhiya.m dasseti? idhekacco sa"nghagato acittiikaarakato ^a^T0.0273^ea^ {acittikaarakato (syaa0 ka0)} there bhikkhuu gha.t.tayantopi ti.t.thati, gha.t.tayantopi nisiidati, puratopi ti.t.thati, puratopi nisiidati, uccepi aasane nisiidati, sasiisa.m paarupitvaapi nisiidati, .thitakopi bha.nati, baahaavikkhepakopi bha.nati. eva.m sa"nghagato kaayika.m paagabbhiya.m dasseti.

[03] katha.m ga.nagato kaayika.m paagabbhiya.m dasseti? idhekacco ga.nagato acittiikaarakato theraana.m bhikkhuuna.m anupaahanaana.m ca"nkamantaana.m saupaahano ca"nkamati, niice ca"nkame ca"nkamantaana.m ucce ca"nkame ca"nkamati, chamaaya ca"nkamantaana.m ca"nkame ca"nkamati, gha.t.tayantopi ti.t.thati, gha.t.tayantopi nisiidati, puratopi ti.t.thati, puratopi nisiidati, uccepi aasane nisiidati, sasiisa.m paarupitvaa nisiidati, .thitakopi bha.nati, baahaavikkhepakopi bha.nati. eva.m ga.nagato kaayika.m paagabbhiya.m dasseti.

[03] katha.m bhojanasaalaaya.m kaayika.m paagabbhiya.m dasseti? idhekacco bhojanasaalaaya.m acittiikaarakato there bhikkhuu anupakhajja nisiidati, navepi bhikkhuu aasanena pa.tibaahati, gha.t.tayantopi ti.t.thati, gha.t.tayantopi nisiidati, puratopi ti.t.thati, puratopi nisiidati, uccepi aasane nisiidati, sasiisa.m paarupitvaapi nisiidati, .thitakopi bha.nati, baahaavikkhepakopi ^a^M0.0176^ea^ bha.nati. eva.m bhojanasaalaaya.m kaayika.m paagabbhiya.m dasseti.

[03] katha.m ^a^P1.0229^ea^ jantaaghare kaayika.m paagabbhiya.m dasseti? idhekacco jantaaghare acittiikaarakato there bhikkhuu gha.t.tayantopi ti.t.thati, gha.t.tayantopi nisiidati, puratopi ti.t.thati, puratopi nisiidati, uccepi aasane nisiidati ^a^T0.0274^ea^, anaapucchampi anajjhi.t.thopi ka.t.tha.m pakkhipati, dvaarampi pidahati, baahaavikkhepakopi bha.nati. eva.m jantaaghare kaayika.m paagabbhiya.m dasseti.

[03] katha.m udakatitthe kaayika.m paagabbhiya.m dasseti? idhekacco udakatitthe acittiikaarakato there bhikkhuu gha.t.tayantopi otarati, puratopi otarati, gha.t.tayantopi nhaayati {nahaayati (sii0)}, puratopi nhaayati ^a^V0.0167^ea^, uparitopi nhaayati, gha.t.tayantopi uttarati, puratopi uttarati, uparitopi uttarati. eva.m udakatitthe kaayika.m paagabbhiya.m dasseti.

[03] katha.m antaraghara.m pavisanto kaayika.m paagabbhiya.m dasseti? idhekacco antaraghara.m pavisanto acittiikaarakato there bhikkhuu gha.t.tayantopi gacchati, puratopi gacchati, vokkammaapi theraana.m bhikkhuuna.m purato purato gacchati. eva.m antaraghara.m pavisanto kaayika.m paagabbhiya.m dasseti.

[03] katha.m antaraghara.m pavi.t.tho kaayika.m paagabbhiya.m dasseti? idhekacco antaraghara.m pavi.t.tho, ``na pavisa {pavisatha (sii0) evama~n~nesu padadvayesupi}, bhante''ti vuccamaano pavisati, ``na ti.t.tha, bhante''ti vuccamaano ti.t.thati, ``na nisiida, bhante''ti vuccamaano nisiidati, anokaasampi pavisati, anokaasepi ti.t.thati, anokaasepi nisiidati, yaanipi taani honti kulaana.m ovarakaani guu.lhaani ca pa.ticchannaani ca. yattha kulitthiyo kuladhiitaro kulasu.nhaayo kulakumaariyo nisiidanti, tatthapi sahasaa pavisati kumaarakassapi sira.m paraamasati. eva.m antaraghara.m pavi.t.tho kaayika.m paagabbhiya.m dasseti -- ida.m kaayika.m paagabbhiya.m dasseti.

[03] katama.m ^a^P1.0230^ea^ vaacasika.m paagabbhiya.m dasseti? idhekacco sa"nghagatopi vaacasika.m paagabbhiya.m ^a^T0.0275^ea^ dasseti, ga.nagatopi vaacasika.m paagabbhiya.m dasseti, antaraghara.m pavi.t.thopi vaacasika.m paagabbhiya.m dasseti.

[03] katha.m ^a^M0.0177^ea^ sa"nghagato vaacasika.m paagabbhiya.m dasseti? idhekacco sa"nghagato acittiikaarakato there bhikkhuu anaapuccha.m vaa anajjhi.t.tho vaa aaraamagataana.m bhikkhuuna.m dhamma.m bha.nati, pa~nha.m visajjeti, paatimokkha.m uddisati, .thitakopi bha.nati, baahaavikkhepakopi bha.nati. eva.m sa"nghagato vaacasika.m paagabbhiya.m dasseti.

[03] katha.m ga.nagato vaacasika.m paagabbhiya.m dasseti? idhekacco ga.nagato acittiikaarakato there bhikkhuu anaapuccha.m vaa anajjhi.t.tho vaa aaraamagataana.m bhikkhuuna.m dhamma.m bha.nati, pa~nha.m visajjeti, .thitakopi bha.nati, baahaavikkhepakopi bha.nati. aaraamagataana.m bhikkhuniina.m upaasakaana.m upaasikaana.m dhamma.m bha.nati, pa~nha.m visajjeti, .thitakopi bha.nati, baahaavikkhepakopi bha.nati. eva.m ga.nagato vaacasika.m paagabbhiya.m dasseti.

[03] katha.m ^a^V0.0168^ea^ antaraghara.m pavi.t.tho vaacasika.m paagabbhiya.m dasseti? idhekacco antaraghara.m pavi.t.tho itthi.m vaa kumaari.m vaa evamaaha -- ``ittha.mnaame ittha.mgotte ki.m atthi? yaagu atthi, bhatta.m atthi, khaadaniiya.m atthi. ki.m pivissaama, ki.m bhu~njissaama, ki.m khaadissaama? ki.m vaa atthi, ki.m vaa me dassathaa''ti vippalapati, yaa evaruupaa vaacaa palaapo vippalaapo laalappo laalappanaa laalappitatta.m. eva.m antaraghara.m pavi.t.tho vaacasika.m paagabbhiya.m dasseti -- ida.m vaacasika.m paagabbhiya.m.

[03] katama.m ^a^T0.0276^ea^ cetasika.m paagabbhiya.m? idhekacco na uccaa kulaa pabbajito samaano uccaa kulaa pabbajitena saddhi.m sadisa.m attaana.m dahati cittena, na mahaakulaa pabbajito samaano mahaakulaa pabbajitena saddhi.m sadisa.m attaana.m dahati cittena, na mahaabhogakulaa pabbajito samaano mahaabhogakulaa pabbajitena saddhi.m sadisa.m attaana.m dahati ^a^P1.0231^ea^ cittena, na u.laarabhogakulaa pabbajito samaano... na suttantiko samaano suttantikena saddhi.m sadisa.m attaana.m dahati cittena, na vinayadharo samaano... na dhammakathiko samaano... na aara~n~niko samaano... na pi.n.dapaatiko samaano... na pa.msukuuliko samaano... na teciivariko samaano... na sapadaanacaariko samaano... na khalupacchaabhattiko samaano... na nesajjiko samaano... na yathaasanthatiko samaano... na pa.thamassa jhaanassa laabhii samaano pa.thamassa jhaanassa laabhinaa saddhi.m sadisa.m attaana.m dahati cittena...pe0... na nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanasamaapattiyaa laabhii ^a^M0.0178^ea^ samaano nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanasamaapattiyaa laabhinaa saddhi.m sadisa.m attaana.m dahati cittena -- ida.m cetasika.m paagabbhiya.m. yassimaani tii.ni paagabbhiyaani pahiinaani samucchinnaani vuupasantaani pa.tipassaddhaani abhabbuppattikaani ~naa.nagginaa da.d.dhaani, so vuccati appagabbhoti -- appagabbho.

[03] ^b^ajeguccho^eb^ti ^a^T0.0277^ea^. atthi puggalo jeguccho, atthi ajeguccho. katamo ca puggalo jeguccho? idhekacco puggalo dussiilo hoti paapadhammo asucisa"nkassarasamaacaaro pa.ticchannakammanto assama.no sama.napa.ti~n~no abrahmacaarii brahmacaaripa.ti~n~no antopuuti avassuto kasambujaato -- aya.m vuccati puggalo jeguccho. atha vaa kodhano hoti upaayaasabahulo, appampi vutto samaano abhisajjati kuppati byaapajjati pati.t.thiiyati, kopa~nca dosa~nca appaccaya~nca paatukaroti -- aya.m vuccati puggalo jeguccho. atha vaa kodhano hoti upanaahii, makkhii hoti pa.laasii, issukii hoti maccharii, sa.tho hoti maayaavii ^a^V0.0169^ea^, thaddho hoti atimaanii, paapiccho hoti micchaadi.t.thi {micchaadi.t.thii (sii0)}, sandi.t.thiparaamaasii hoti aadaanaggaahii duppa.tinissaggii -- aya.m vuccati puggalo jeguccho.

[03] katamo ca puggalo ajeguccho? idha bhikkhu siilavaa hoti paatimokkhasa.mvarasa.mvuto viharati aacaaragocarasampanno ^a^P1.0232^ea^ a.numattesu vajjesu bhayadassaavii, samaadaaya sikkhati sikkhaapadesu -- aya.m vuccati puggalo ajeguccho. atha vaa akkodhano hoti anupaayaasabahulo, bahumpi vutto samaano na abhisajjati na kuppati na byaapajjati na pati.t.thiiyati, na kopa~nca dosa~nca appaccaya~nca paatukaroti -- aya.m vuccati puggalo ajeguccho. atha vaa akkodhano hoti anupanaahii, amakkhii hoti apa.laasii, anissukii hoti amaccharii, asa.tho hoti amaayaavii, athaddho hoti anatimaanii ^a^T0.0278^ea^, na paapiccho hoti na micchaadi.t.thi, asandi.t.thiparaamaasii hoti anaadaanaggaahii suppa.tinissaggii -- aya.m vuccati puggalo ajeguccho. sabbe baalaputhujjanaa jegucchaa, puthujjanakalyaa.naka.m upaadaaya a.t.tha ariyapuggalaa ajegucchaati -- appagabbho ajeguccho.

[03] ^b^pesu.neyye ca no yuto^eb^ti. pesu~n~nanti idhekacco pisu.navaaco hoti, ito sutvaa amutra akkhaataa imesa.m bhedaaya, amutra vaa sutvaa ^a^M0.0179^ea^ imesa.m akkhaataa amuusa.m bhedaaya. iti samaggaana.m vaa bhettaa {bhedo (ka0)}, bhinnaana.m vaa anuppadaataa, vaggaaraamo, vaggarato, vagganandii, vaggakara.ni.m vaaca.m bhaasitaa hoti -- ida.m vuccati pesu~n~na.m.

[03] api ca dviihi kaara.nehi pesu~n~na.m upasa.mharati -- piyakamyataaya vaa, bhedaadhippaayena {bhedaadhippaayo (bahuusu)} vaa. katha.m piyakamyataaya pesu~n~na.m upasa.mharati? imassa piyo bhavissaami, manaapo bhavissaami, vissaasiko bhavissaami, abbhantariko bhavissaami, suhadayo bhavissaamiiti. eva.m piyakamyataaya pesu~n~na.m upasa.mharati. katha.m bhedaadhippaayena pesu~n~na.m upasa.mharati? ``katha.m ime naanaa assu vinaa assu vaggaa assu dvedhaa assu dvejjhaa assu dve pakkhaa assu bhijjeyyu.m na samaagaccheyyu.m dukkha.m na phaasu {aphaasu.m (sii0)} vihareyyu''nti. eva.m ^a^P1.0233^ea^ bhedaadhippaayena pesu~n~na.m upasa.mharati. yasseta.m pesu~n~na.m pahiina.m samucchinna.m vuupasanta.m pa.tipassaddha.m abhabbuppattika.m ~naa.nagginaa da.d.dha.m, so pesu~n~ne no yuto na yutto na ^a^T0.0279^ea^ payutto na sammaayuttoti -- pesu.neyye ca no yuto.
[03] tenaaha ^a^V0.0170^ea^ bhagavaa --
[21] ``patiliino akuhako, apihaalu amaccharii.
[22] appagabbho ajeguccho, pesu.neyye ca no yuto''ti..
[21] ^b^saatiyesu anassaavii, atimaane ca no yuto.^eb^
[22] ^b^sa.nho ca pa.tibhaanavaa, na saddho na virajjati..^eb^

[03] ^b^saatiyesu anassaavii^eb^ti. ^b^saatiyaa^eb^ vuccanti pa~nca kaamagu.naa. ki.mkaara.naa saatiyaa vuccanti pa~nca kaamagu.naa? yebhuyyena devamanussaa pa~nca kaamagu.ne icchanti saatiyanti patthayanti pihayanti abhijappanti, ta.mkaara.naa saatiyaa vuccanti pa~nca kaamagu.naa. yesa.m esaa saatiyaa ta.nhaa appahiinaa tesa.m cakkhuto ruupata.nhaa savati aasavati {pasavati (syaa0)} sandati pavattati, sotato saddata.nhaa... ghaanato gandhata.nhaa... jivhaato rasata.nhaa... kaayato pho.t.thabbata.nhaa... manato dhammata.nhaa savati aasavati sandati pavattati. yesa.m esaa saatiyaa ta.nhaa pahiinaa samucchinnaa vuupasantaa pa.tipassaddhaa abhabbuppattikaa ~naa.nagginaa da.d.dhaa tesa.m cakkhuto ruupata.nhaa na savati naasavati {na pasavati (syaa0)} na sandati na pavattati ^a^M0.0180^ea^, sotato saddata.nhaa...pe0... manato dhammata.nhaa na savati naasavati na sandati na pavattatiiti -- saatiyesu anassaavii.

[03] ^b^atimaane ca no yuto^eb^ti. katamo atimaano? idhekacco para.m ^a^T0.0280^ea^ atima~n~nati jaatiyaa vaa gottena vaa...pe0... a~n~natara~n~natarena vaa vatthunaa. yo evaruupo maano ma~n~nanaa ma~n~nitatta.m unnati unnamo dhajo sampaggaaho ketukamyataa ^a^P1.0234^ea^ cittassa -- aya.m vuccati atimaano. yasseso atimaano pahiino samucchinno vuupasanto pa.tipassaddho abhabbuppattiko ~naa.nagginaa da.d.dho, so atimaane ca no yuto na yutto nappayutto na sammaayuttoti -- atimaane ca no yuto.

[03] ^b^sa.nho ca pa.tibhaanavaa^eb^ti. ^b^sa.nho^eb^ti sa.nhena kaayakammena samannaagatoti sa.nho, sa.nhena vaciikammena... sa.nhena manokammena samannaagatoti sa.nho, sa.nhehi satipa.t.thaanehi samannaagatoti sa.nho, sa.nhehi sammappadhaanehi... sa.nhehi iddhipaadehi... sa.nhehi indriyehi... sa.nhehi balehi... sa.nhehi bojjha"ngehi samannaagatoti sa.nho, sa.nhena ariyena a.t.tha"ngikena maggena samannaagatoti -- sa.nho.

[03] ^b^pa.tibhaanavaa^eb^ti ^a^V0.0171^ea^ tayo pa.tibhaanavanto -- pariyattipa.tibhaanavaa, paripucchaapa.tibhaanavaa, adhigamapa.tibhaanavaa. katamo pariyattipa.tibhaanavaa? idhekaccassa pakatiyaa pariyaapu.ta.m hoti -- sutta.m geyya.m veyyaakara.na.m gaathaa udaana.m itivuttaka.m jaataka.m abbhutadhamma.m vedalla.m, tassa pariyatti.m nissaaya pa.tibhaayati -- aya.m pariyattipa.tibhaanavaa. katamo ^a^T0.0281^ea^ paripucchaapa.tibhaanavaa? idhekacco paripucchitaa {paripucchita.m (sii0), paripucchako (syaa0)} hoti attatthe ca ~naayatthe ca lakkha.ne ca kaara.ne ca .thaanaa.thaane ca, tassa ta.m paripuccha.m nissaaya pa.tibhaayati -- aya.m paripucchaapa.tibhaanavaa. katamo adhigamapa.tibhaanavaa? idhekaccassa adhigataa honti cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa cattaaro sammappadhaanaa cattaaro iddhipaadaa pa~ncindriyaani pa~nca balaani satta bojjha"ngaa ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo cattaaro ariyamaggaa cattaari saama~n~naphalaani catasso pa.tisambhidaayo cha abhi~n~naayo, tassa attho ~naato dhammo ~naato nirutti ~naataa, atthe ~naate attho pa.tibhaayati ^a^P1.0235^ea^, dhamme ~naate dhammo pa.tibhaayati, niruttiyaa ~naataaya nirutti pa.tibhaayati; imesu tiisu ^a^M0.0181^ea^ ~naa.nesu ~naa.na.m pa.tibhaanapa.tisambhidaa. imaaya pa.tibhaanapa.tisambhidaaya upeto samupeto upagato samupagato upapanno samupapanno samannaagato so vuccati pa.tibhaanavaa. yassa pariyatti natthi, paripucchaa natthi, adhigamo natthi, ki.m tassa pa.tibhaayissatiiti -- sa.nho ca pa.tibhaanavaa.

[03] ^b^na saddho na virajjatii^eb^ti. ^b^na saddho^eb^ti saama.m saya.m abhi~n~naata.m attapaccakkha.m dhamma.m na kassaci saddahati a~n~nassa sama.nassa vaa braahma.nassa vaa devassa vaa maarassa vaa brahmuno vaa. ``sabbe sa"nkhaaraa aniccaa''ti saama.m saya.m abhi~n~naata.m...pe0... ^a^T0.0282^ea^ ``sabbe sa"nkhaaraa dukkhaa''ti... ``sabbe dhammaa anattaa''ti... ``avijjaapaccayaa sa"nkhaaraa''ti...pe0... ``jaatipaccayaa jaraamara.na''nti... ``avijjaanirodhaa sa"nkhaaranirodho''ti...pe0... ``jaatinirodhaa jaraamara.nanirodho''ti... ``ida.m dukkha''nti...pe0... ``aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa''ti... ``ime aasavaa''ti...pe0... ``aya.m aasavanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa''ti... ``ime dhammaa abhi~n~neyyaa''ti...pe0... ``ime dhammaa sacchikaatabbaa''ti saama.m saya.m abhi~n~naata.m...pe0... channa.m phassaayatanaana.m samudaya~nca attha"ngama~nca assaada~nca aadiinava~nca nissara.na~nca, pa~ncanna.m upaadaanakkhandhaana.m samudaya~nca...pe0... catunna.m mahaabhuutaana.m samudaya~nca attha"ngama~nca assaada~nca aadiinava~nca nissara.na~nca saama.m saya.m abhi~n~naata.m...pe0... ``ya.m ki~nci samudayadhamma.m sabba.m ta.m nirodhadhamma''nti saama.m saya.m abhi~n~naata.m attapaccakkha.m dhamma.m na kassaci saddahati a~n~nassa sama.nassa ^a^P1.0236^ea^ vaa braahma.nassa vaa devassa vaa maarassa vaa brahmuno vaa {brahmuno vaa...pe0... (sii0 ka0)}.

[03] vutta~nheta.m bhagavataa -- ``saddahasi tva.m, saariputta, saddhindriya.m bhaavita.m bahuliikata.m amatogadha.m ^a^V0.0172^ea^ hoti amataparaayana.m amatapariyosaana.m; viiriyindriya.m... satindriya.m... samaadhindriya.m... pa~n~nindriya.m bhaavita.m bahuliikata.m amatogadha.m hoti amataparaayana.m amatapariyosaana''nti?

[03] ``na khvaaha.m ettha, bhante, bhagavato saddhaaya gacchaami saddhindriya.m... viiriyindriya.m... satindriya.m... samaadhindriya.m... pa~n~nindriya.m bhaavita.m bahuliikata.m amatogadha.m hoti amataparaayana.m amatapariyosaana.m. yesa.m nuuneta.m, bhante ^a^T0.0283^ea^, a~n~naata.m assa adi.t.tha.m avidita.m asacchikata.m aphassita.m pa~n~naaya, te tattha paresa.m saddhaaya gaccheyyu.m saddhindriya.m bhaavita.m bahuliikata.m amatogadha.m hoti amataparaayana.m amatapariyosaana.m. viiriyindriya.m... satindriya.m... samaadhindriya.m ^a^M0.0182^ea^... pa~n~nindriya.m bhaavita.m bahuliikata.m amatogadha.m hoti amataparaayana.m amatapariyosaana.m. yesa~nca kho eta.m, bhante, ~naata.m di.t.tha.m vidita.m sacchikata.m phassita.m pa~n~naaya, nikka"nkhaa te tattha nibbicikicchaa. saddhindriya.m... viiriyindriya.m... satindriya.m... samaadhindriya.m... pa~n~nindriya.m bhaavita.m bahuliikata.m amatogadha.m hoti amataparaayana.m amatapariyosaana.m. mayha~nca kho, eta.m bhante, ~naata.m di.t.tha.m vidita.m sacchikata.m phassita.m pa~n~naaya, nikka"nkhoha.m tattha nibbicikiccho. saddhindriya.m... viiriyindriya.m... satindriya.m... samaadhindriya.m... pa~n~nindriya.m bhaavita.m bahuliikata.m amatogadha.m hoti amataparaayana.m amatapariyosaana''nti.

[03] ``saadhu saadhu, saariputta! yesa~nheta.m, saariputta, a~n~naata.m assa adi.t.tha.m avidita.m asacchikata.m aphassita.m pa~n~naaya, te tattha paresa.m saddhaaya gaccheyyu.m saddhindriya.m...pe0... pa~n~nindriya.m ^a^P1.0237^ea^ bhaavita.m bahuliikata.m amatogadha.m hoti amataparaayana.m amatapariyosaananti.
[21] ``assaddho akata~n~nuu ca, sandhicchedo ca yo naro.
[22] hataavakaaso vantaaso, sa ve uttamaporiso''ti..

[03] ^b^na saddho na virajjatii^eb^ti. sabbe baalaputhujjanaa rajjanti, puthujjanakalyaa.naka.m upaadaaya satta sekkhaa virajjanti. arahaa neva rajjati no virajjati, viratto so khayaa raagassa viitaraagattaa khayaa dosassa viitadosattaa, khayaa mohassa viitamohattaa. so vu.t.thavaaso ci.n.nacara.no...pe0... jaatimara.nasa.msaaro natthi ^a^T0.0284^ea^ tassa punabbhavoti -- na saddho na virajjati.
[03] tenaaha ^a^V0.0173^ea^ bhagavaa --
[21] ``saatiyesu anassaavii, atimaane ca no yuto.
[22] sa.nho ca pa.tibhaanavaa, na saddho na virajjatii''ti..
[21] ^b^laabhakamyaa na sikkhati, alaabhe ca na kuppati. ^eb^
[22] ^b^aviruddho ca ta.nhaaya, rasesu^eb^ {rase ca (sii0 syaa0)} ^b^naanugijjhati..^eb^

[03] ^b^laabhakamyaa na sikkhati, alaabhe ca na kuppatii^eb^ti. katha.m laabhakamyaa sikkhati? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bhikkhu.m passati laabhi.m ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanapaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraana.m. tassa eva.m hoti -- ``kena nu ^a^M0.0183^ea^ kho ayamaayasmaa laabhii ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanapaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraana''nti? tassa eva.m hoti -- ``aya.m kho aayasmaa suttantiko, tenaayamaayasmaa laabhii ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanapaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraana''nti. so laabhahetu laabhapaccayaa laabhakaara.naa laabhaabhinibbattiyaa laabha.m paripaacento suttanta.m pariyaapu.naati. evampi laabhakamyaa sikkhati.

[03] atha vaa ^a^P1.0238^ea^ bhikkhu bhikkhu.m passati laabhi.m ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanapaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraana.m. tassa eva.m hoti -- ``kena nu kho ayamaayasmaa laabhii ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanapaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraana''nti? tassa eva.m hoti -- ``aya.m kho aayasmaa vinayadharo...pe0... dhammakathiko... aabhidhammiko, tenaayamaayasmaa laabhii ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanapaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraana''nti. so laabhahetu laabhapaccayaa laabhakaara.naa ^a^T0.0285^ea^ laabhaabhinibbattiyaa laabha.m paripaacento abhidhamma.m pariyaapu.naati. evampi laabhakamyaa sikkhati.

[03] atha vaa bhikkhu bhikkhu.m passati laabhi.m ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanapaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraana.m. tassa eva.m hoti -- ``kena nu kho ayamaayasmaa laabhii ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanapaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraana''nti? tassa eva.m hoti -- ``aya.m kho aayasmaa aara~n~niko... pi.n.dapaatiko... pa.msukuuliko... teciivariko... sapadaanacaariko... khalupacchaabhattiko... nesajjiko... yathaasanthatiko, tenaayamaayasmaa laabhii ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanapaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraana''nti. so laabhahetu laabhapaccayaa laabhakaara.naa ^a^V0.0174^ea^ laabhaabhinibbattiyaa laabha.m paripaacento aara~n~niko hoti...pe0... yathaasanthatiko hoti. evampi laabhakamyaa sikkhati.

[03] katha.m na laabhakamyaa sikkhati? idha bhikkhu na laabhahetu, na laabhapaccayaa, na laabhakaara.naa, na laabhaabhinibbattiyaa, na laabha.m paripaacento, yaavadeva attadamatthaaya attasamatthaaya attaparinibbaapanatthaaya suttanta.m pariyaapu.naati, vinaya.m pariyaapu.naati, abhidhamma.m pariyaapu.naati. evampi na laabhakamyaa sikkhati.

[03] atha ^a^M0.0184^ea^ vaa bhikkhu na laabhahetu, na laabhapaccayaa, na laabhakaara.naa, na laabhaabhinibbattiyaa, na laabha.m paripaacento, yaavadeva appiccha~n~neva {appiccha.myeva (sii0)} nissaaya santu.t.thi~n~neva nissaaya sallekha~n~neva nissaaya paviveka~n~neva nissaaya idamatthita~n~neva {idamatthikata~n~neva (sii0)} nissaaya aara~n~niko hoti, pi.n.dapaatiko hoti, pa.msukuuliko hoti, teciivariko hoti ^a^T0.0286^ea^, sapadaanacaariko hoti, khalupacchaabhattiko hoti, nesajjiko hoti, yathaasanthatiko hoti. evampi na laabhakamyaa sikkhatiiti -- laabhakamyaa na sikkhati.

[03] ^b^alaabhe^eb^ ^a^P1.0239^ea^ ^b^ca na kuppatii^eb^ti. katha.m alaabhe kuppati? idhekacco ``kula.m vaa na labhaami, ga.na.m vaa na labhaami, aavaasa.m vaa na labhaami, laabha.m vaa na labhaami, yasa.m vaa na labhaami, pasa.msa.m vaa na labhaami, sukha.m vaa na labhaami, ciivara.m vaa na labhaami, pi.n.dapaata.m vaa na labhaami, senaasana.m vaa na labhaami, gilaanapaccayabhesajjaparikkhaara.m vaa na labhaami, gilaanupa.t.thaaka.m vaa na labhaami, appa~n~naatomhii''ti kuppati byaapajjati pati.t.thiiyati, kopa~nca dosa~nca appaccaya~nca paatukaroti. eva.m alaabhe kuppati.

[03] katha.m alaabhe na kuppati? idha bhikkhu ``kula.m vaa na labhaami ga.na.m vaa na labhaami...pe0... appa~n~naatomhii''ti na kuppati na byaapajjati na pati.t.thiiyati, na kopa~nca dosa~nca appaccaya~nca paatukaroti. eva.m alaabhe na kuppatiiti -- laabhakamyaa na sikkhati alaabhe ca na kuppati.

[03] ^b^aviruddho^eb^ ^a^T0.0287^ea^ ^b^ca ta.nhaaya, rasesu naanugijjhatii^eb^ti. ^b^viruddho^eb^ti yo cittassa aaghaato pa.tighaato, pa.tigha.m pa.tivirodho, kopo pakopo sampakopo, doso padoso sampadoso, cittassa byaapatti manopadoso, kodho kujjhanaa kujjhitatta.m, doso dussanaa dussitatta.m, byaapatti byaapajjanaa ^a^V0.0175^ea^ byaapajjitatta.m virodho pa.tivirodho, ca.n.dikka.m, asuropo, anattamanataa cittassa -- aya.m vuccati virodho. yasseso virodho pahiino samucchinno vuupasanto pa.tipassaddho abhabbuppattiko ~naa.nagginaa da.d.dho, so vuccati aviruddho. ^b^ta.nhaa^eb^ti ^a^P1.0240^ea^ ruupata.nhaa saddata.nhaa gandhata.nhaa rasata.nhaa pho.t.thabbata.nhaa dhammata.nhaa. ^b^raso^eb^ti muularaso khandharaso tacaraso pattaraso puppharaso phalaraso, ambila.m ^a^M0.0185^ea^ madhura.m tittaka.m ka.tuka.m lo.nika.m khaarika.m lambika.m {lapila.m (sii0), lambila.m (syaa0), labila.m (ka0), aayatanavibha"nge} kasaavo saadu asaadu siita.m u.nha.m. santeke sama.nabraahma.naa rasagiddhaa. te jivhaggena rasaggaani pariyesantaa aahi.n.danti, te ambila.m labhitvaa anambila.m pariyesanti, anambila.m labhitvaa ambila.m pariyesanti; madhura.m labhitvaa amadhura.m pariyesanti, amadhura.m labhitvaa madhura.m pariyesanti; tittaka.m labhitvaa atittaka.m pariyesanti, atittaka.m labhitvaa tittaka.m pariyesanti; ka.tuka.m labhitvaa aka.tuka.m pariyesanti, aka.tuka.m labhitvaa ka.tuka.m pariyesanti; lo.nika.m labhitvaa alo.nika.m pariyesanti, alo.nika.m labhitvaa lo.nika.m pariyesanti; khaarika.m labhitvaa akhaarika.m pariyesanti, akhaarika.m labhitvaa khaarika.m pariyesanti; lambika.m labhitvaa kasaava.m pariyesanti ^a^T0.0288^ea^, kasaava.m labhitvaa lambika.m pariyesanti; saadu.m labhitvaa asaadu.m pariyesanti, asaadu.m labhitvaa saadu.m pariyesanti; siita.m labhitvaa u.nha.m pariyesanti, u.nha.m labhitvaa siita.m pariyesanti. te ya.m ya.m labhitvaa tena tena na santussanti aparaapara.m pariyesanti, manaapikesu rasesu rattaa giddhaa gadhitaa mucchitaa ajjhosannaa laggaa laggitaa palibuddhaa. yassesaa rasata.nhaa pahiinaa samucchinnaa vuupasantaa pa.tipassaddhaa abhabbuppattikaa ~naa.nagginaa da.d.dhaa, so pa.tisa"nkhaa yoniso aahaara.m aahaareti -- ``neva davaaya na madaaya na ma.n.danaaya na vibhuusanaaya, yaavadeva imassa kaayassa .thitiyaa yaapanaaya vihi.msuuparatiyaa brahmacariyaanuggahaaya. iti puraa.na~nca vedana.m pa.tiha"nkhaami, nava~nca vedana.m na uppaadessaami, yaatraa ca me bhavissati anavajjataa ca phaasuvihaaro caa''ti.

[03] yathaa ^a^P1.0241^ea^ vana.m aalimpeyya yaavadeva ropanatthaaya, yathaa vaa pana akkha.m abbha~njeyya yaavadeva bhaarassa nitthara.natthaaya, yathaa vaa pana puttama.msa.m aahaara.m aahareyya yaavadeva kantaarassa nitthara.natthaaya; evameva bhikkhu pa.tisa"nkhaa yoniso aahaara.m aahaareti -- ``neva davaaya...pe0... phaasuvihaaro caa''ti. rasata.nha.m pajahati vinodeti byanti.m karoti anabhaava.m ^a^T0.0289^ea^ gameti, rasata.nhaaya aarato assa virato pa.tivirato nikkhanto nissa.to vippamutto visa~n~nutto vimariyaadikatena cetasaa viharatiiti -- aviruddho ca ta.nhaaya rasesu naanugijjhati.
[03] tenaaha ^a^V0.0176^ea^ bhagavaa --
[21] ``laabhakamyaa ^a^M0.0186^ea^ na sikkhati, alaabhe ca na kuppati.
[22] aviruddho ca ta.nhaaya, rasesu naanugijjhatii''ti..
[21] ^b^upekkhako sadaa sato, na loke ma~n~nate sama.m.^eb^
[22] ^b^na visesii na niiceyyo, tassa no santi ussadaa.. ^eb^

[03] ^b^upekkhako sadaa sato^eb^ti. ^b^upekkhako^eb^ti cha.la"ngupekkhaaya samannaagato. cakkhunaa ruupa.m disvaa neva sumano hoti na dummano, upekkhako viharati sato sampajaano. sotena sadda.m sutvaa...pe0... manasaa dhamma.m vi~n~naaya neva sumano hoti na dummano, upekkhako viharati sato sampajaano. cakkhunaa ruupa.m disvaa manaapa.m naabhigijjhati naabhiha.msati {naabhihasati (sii0 syaa0)} na raaga.m janeti, tassa .thitova kaayo hoti, .thita.m citta.m ajjhatta.m susa.n.thita.m suvimutta.m. cakkhunaa ^a^P1.0242^ea^ kho paneva ruupa.m disvaa amanaapa.m na ma"nku hoti appati.t.thitacitto {appati.t.thiina citto (syaa0), appati.t.thanacitto (ka0)} aliinamanaso {aadinamanaso (syaa0)} abyaapannacetaso, tassa .thitova kaayo hoti, .thita.m citta.m ajjhatta.m susa.n.thita.m suvimutta.m. sotena sadda.m sutvaa... ghaanena gandha.m ghaayitvaa... jivhaaya rasa.m saayitvaa... kaayena pho.t.thabba.m phusitvaa... manasaa dhamma.m vi~n~naaya manaapa.m naabhigijjhati naabhiha.msati na ^a^T0.0290^ea^ raaga.m janeti, tassa .thitova kaayo hoti, .thita.m citta.m ajjhatta.m susa.n.thita.m suvimutta.m. manasaa kho paneva dhamma.m vi~n~naaya amanaapa.m na ma"nku hoti appati.t.thitacitto aliinamanaso abyaapannacetaso, tassa .thitova kaayo hoti, .thita.m citta.m ajjhatta.m susa.n.thita.m suvimutta.m.

[03] cakkhunaa ruupa.m disvaa manaapaamanaapesu ruupesu tassa .thitova kaayo hoti, .thita.m citta.m ajjhatta.m susa.n.thita.m suvimutta.m. sotena sadda.m sutvaa...pe0... manasaa dhamma.m vi~n~naaya manaapaamanaapesu dhammesu tassa .thitova kaayo hoti, .thita.m citta.m ajjhatta.m susa.n.thita.m suvimutta.m.

[03] cakkhunaa ruupa.m disvaa rajaniiye na rajjati, dussaniiye {dosaniiye (bahuusu)} na dussati, mohaniiye na muyhati, kopaniiye na kuppati, madaniiye na majjati, kilesaniiye na kilissati. sotena sadda.m sutvaa...pe0... manasaa dhamma.m vi~n~naaya rajaniiye na rajjati dussaniiye na dussati, mohaniiye na muyhati, kopaniiye na kuppati, madaniiye na majjati, kilesaniiye na kilissati. di.t.the ^a^M0.0187^ea^ di.t.thamatto, sute sutamatto, mute mutamatto, vi~n~naate vi~n~naatamatto. di.t.the na ^a^V0.0177^ea^ limpati, sute na limpati, mute na limpati, vi~n~naate na limpati. di.t.the anuupayo anapaayo anissito appa.tibaddho vippamutto visa~n~nutto vimariyaadikatena cetasaa viharati. sute... mute... vi~n~naate ^a^T0.0291^ea^ anuupayo anapaayo anissito appa.tibaddho vippamutto visa~n~nutto vimariyaadikatena cetasaa viharati.

[03] sa.mvijjati arahato cakkhu, passati arahaa cakkhunaa ruupa.m. chandaraago ^a^P1.0243^ea^ arahato natthi, suvimuttacitto arahaa. sa.mvijjati arahato sota.m, su.naati arahaa sotena sadda.m. chandaraago arahato natthi, suvimuttacitto arahaa. sa.mvijjati arahato ghaana.m, ghaayati arahaa ghaanena gandha.m. chandaraago arahato natthi, suvimuttacitto arahaa. sa.mvijjati arahato jivhaa, saayati arahaa jivhaaya rasa.m...pe0... sa.mvijjati arahato kaayo, phusati arahaa kaayena pho.t.thabba.m...pe0... sa.mvijjati arahato mano, vijaanaati arahaa manasaa dhamma.m. chandaraago arahato natthi suvimuttacitto arahaa.

[03] cakkhu ruupaaraama.m ruuparata.m ruupasammudita.m, ta.m arahato danta.m gutta.m rakkhita.m sa.mvuta.m, tassa ca sa.mvaraaya dhamma.m deseti. sota.m saddaaraama.m...pe0... ghaana.m gandhaaraama.m... jivhaa rasaaraamaa rasarataa rasasammuditaa, saa arahato dantaa guttaa rakkhitaa sa.mvutaa, tassaa ca sa.mvaraaya dhamma.m deseti. kaayo pho.t.thabbaaraamo...pe0... mano dhammaaraamo dhammarato dhammasammudito, so arahato danto gutto rakkhito sa.mvuto, tassa ca sa.mvaraaya dhamma.m deseti.
[21] ``danta.m nayanti samiti.m, danta.m raajaabhiruuhati.
[22] danto se.t.tho manussesu, yotivaakya.m titikkhati..
[21] ``varamassataraa ^a^T0.0292^ea^ dantaa, aajaaniiyaa ca {aajaaniyaava (syaa0)} sindhavaa.
[22] ku~njaraa ca mahaanaagaa, attadanto tato vara.m..
[21] ``na hi etehi yaanehi, gaccheyya agata.m disa.m.
[22] yathaattanaa sudantena, danto dantena gacchati..
[21] ``vidhaasu ^a^M0.0188^ea^ na vikampanti, vippamuttaa punabbhavaa.
[22] dantabhuumimanuppattaa, te loke vijitaavino..

[21] ``yassindriyaani ^a^V0.0178^ea^ ^a^P1.0244^ea^ bhaavitaani {vibhaavitaani (sii0)}, ajjhatta.m bahiddhaa ca {ajjhattabahiddhaa ca (sii0), ajjhatta~nca bahiddhaa ca (syaa0 ka0) su0 ni0 521} sabbaloke.
[22] nibbijjha ima.m {nibbijjhima.m (syaa0), nibbijja ima.m (ka0)} para~nca loka.m, kaala.m ka"nkhati bhaavito sa danto''ti..

[03] ^b^upekkhako sadaa^eb^ti. sadaa sabbadaa sabbakaala.m niccakaala.m dhuvakaala.m...pe0... pacchime vayokhandhe. ^b^sato^eb^ti catuuhi kaara.nehi sato -- kaaye kaayaanupassanaasatipa.t.thaana.m bhaavento sato, vedanaasu... citte... dhammesu dhammaanupassanaasatipa.t.thaana.m bhaavento sato...pe0... so vuccati satoti -- upekkhako sadaa sato.
[03] ^b^na loke ma~n~nate sama^eb^nti. ``sadisohamasmii''ti maana.m na janeti jaatiyaa vaa gottena vaa...pe0... a~n~natara~n~natarena vaa vatthunaati -- na loke ma~n~nate sama.m.

[03] ^b^na visesii na niiceyyo^eb^ti. ``seyyohamasmii''ti atimaana.m na janeti jaatiyaa vaa gottena vaa...pe0... a~n~natara~n~natarena vaa vatthunaa ^a^T0.0293^ea^. ``hiinohamasmii''ti omaana.m na janeti jaatiyaa vaa gottena vaa...pe0... a~n~natara~n~natarena vaa vatthunaati -- na visesii na niiceyyo.

[03] ^b^tassa no santi ussadaa^eb^ti. ^b^tassaa^eb^ti arahato khii.naasavassa. ^b^ussadaa^eb^ti sattussadaa -- raagussado dosussado mohussado maanussado di.t.thussado kilesussado kammussado. tassime ussadaa natthi na santi na sa.mvijjanti nupalabbhanti, pahiinaa samucchinnaa vuupasantaa pa.tipassaddhaa abhabbuppattikaa ~naa.nagginaa da.d.dhaati -- tassa no santi ussadaa.
[03] tenaaha bhagavaa --
[21] ``upekkhako sadaa sato, na loke ma~n~nate sama.m.
[22] na visesii na niiceyyo, tassa no santi ussadaa''ti..
[21] ^b^yassa^eb^ ^a^M0.0189^ea^ ^b^nissayataa^eb^ {nissayanaa (ka0)} ^b^natthi, ~natvaa dhamma.m anissito.^eb^
[22] ^b^bhavaaya vibhavaaya vaa, ta.nhaa yassa na vijjati.. ^eb^

[03] ^b^yassa^eb^ ^a^P1.0245^ea^ ^b^nissayataa natthii^eb^ti. ^b^yassaa^eb^ti arahato khii.naasavassa. ^b^nissayaa^eb^ti dve nissayaa -- ta.nhaanissayo ca di.t.thinissayo ca...pe0... aya.m ta.nhaanissayo...pe0... aya.m di.t.thinissayo ^a^V0.0179^ea^. tassa ta.nhaanissayo pahiino, di.t.thinissayo pa.tinissa.t.tho; ta.nhaanissayassa pahiinattaa di.t.thinissayassa pa.tinissa.t.thattaa nissayataa yassa natthi na santi na sa.mvijjati nupalabbhati, pahiinaa samucchinnaa vuupasantaa pa.tipassaddhaa abhabbuppattikaa ~naa.nagginaa da.d.dhaati -- yassa nissayataa natthi.

[03] ^b^~natvaa^eb^ ^a^T0.0294^ea^ ^b^dhamma.m anissito^eb^ti. ^b^~natvaa^eb^ti ~natvaa jaanitvaa tulayitvaa tiirayitvaa vibhaavayitvaa vibhuuta.m katvaa, ``sabbe sa"nkhaaraa aniccaa''ti ~natvaa jaanitvaa tulayitvaa tiirayitvaa vibhaavayitvaa vibhuuta.m katvaa, ``sabbe sa"nkhaaraa dukkhaa''ti... ``sabbe dhammaa anattaa''ti...pe0... ``ya.m ki~nci samudayadhamma.m sabba.m ta.m nirodhadhamma''ntntti ~natvaa jaanitvaa tulayitvaa tiirayitvaa vibhaavayitvaa vibhuuta.m katvaa. ^b^anissito^eb^ti dve nissayaa -- ta.nhaanissayo ca di.t.thinissayo ca...pe0... aya.m ta.nhaanissayo...pe0... aya.m di.t.thinissayo. ta.nhaanissaya.m pahaaya di.t.thinissaya.m pa.tinissajjitvaa cakkhu.m anissito, sota.m anissito, ghaana.m anissito, jivha.m anissito, kaaya.m anissito, mana.m anissito, ruupe... sadde... gandhe... rase... pho.t.thabbe... kula.m... ga.na.m... aavaasa.m...pe0... di.t.thasutamutavi~n~naatabbe dhamme anissito analliino anupagato anajjhosito anadhimutto nikkhanto nissa.to vippamutto visa~n~nutto vimariyaadikatena cetasaa viharatiiti -- ~natvaa dhamma.m anissito.

[03] ^b^bhavaaya vibhavaaya vaa, ta.nhaa yassa na vijjatii^eb^ti. ^b^ta.nhaa^eb^ti ruupata.nhaa saddata.nhaa gandhata.nhaa rasata.nhaa pho.t.thabbata.nhaa dhammata.nhaa. ^b^yassaa^eb^ti arahato khii.naasavassa. ^b^bhavaayaa^eb^ti bhavadi.t.thiyaa, ^b^vibhavaayaa^eb^ti vibhavadi.t.thiyaa; ^b^bhavaayaa^eb^ti sassatadi.t.thiyaa, ^b^vibhavaayaa^eb^ti ucchedadi.t.thiyaa; ^b^bhavaayaa^eb^ti punappunabhavaaya punappunagatiyaa punappunaupapattiyaa punappunapa.tisandhiyaa ^a^P1.0246^ea^ punappunaattabhaavaabhinibbattiyaa ^a^T0.0295^ea^. ta.nhaa yassa natthi na santi ^a^M0.0190^ea^ na sa.mvijjati nupalabbhati, pahiinaa samucchinnaa vuupasantaa pa.tipassaddhaa abhabbuppattikaa ~naa.nagginaa da.d.dhaati -- bhavaaya vibhavaaya vaa ta.nhaa yassa na vijjati.
[03] tenaaha bhagavaa --
[21] ``yassa nissayataa natthi, ~natvaa dhamma.m anissito.
[22] bhavaaya vibhavaaya vaa, ta.nhaa yassa na vijjatii''ti..
[21] ^b^ta.m^eb^ ^a^V0.0180^ea^ ^b^bruumi upasantoti, kaamesu anapekkhina.m.^eb^
[22] ^b^ganthaa tassa na vijjanti, atarii so visattika.m.. ^eb^
[03] ^b^ta.m bruumi upasanto^eb^ti. upasanto vuupasanto nibbuto pa.tipassaddhoti. ta.m bruumi ta.m kathemi ta.m bha.naami ta.m diipayaami ta.m voharaamiiti -- ta.m bruumi upasantoti.

[03] ^b^kaamesu anapekkhina^eb^nti. ^b^kaamaa^eb^ti uddaanato dve kaamaa -- vatthukaamaa ca kilesakaamaa ca...pe0... ime vuccanti vatthukaamaa...pe0... ime vuccanti kilesakaamaa. vatthukaame parijaanitvaa, kilesakaame pahaaya pajahitvaa vinodetvaa byanti.m karitvaa anabhaava.m gametvaa kaamesu anapekkhino viitakaamo cattakaamo vantakaamo muttakaamo pahiinakaamo pa.tinissa.t.thakaamo, kaamesu viitaraago vigataraago cattaraago vantaraago muttaraago pahiinaraago pa.tinissa.t.tharaago nicchaato nibbuto siitibhuuto sukhappa.tisa.mvedii brahmabhuutena attanaa viharatiiti -- kaamesu anapekkhina.m.

[03] ^b^ganthaa^eb^ ^a^T0.0296^ea^ ^b^tassa na vijjantii^eb^ti. ^b^ganthaa^eb^ti cattaaro ganthaa -- abhijjhaa kaayagantho, byaapaado kaayagantho, siilabbataparaamaaso kaayagantho, ida.msaccaabhiniveso kaayagantho. attano ^a^P1.0247^ea^ di.t.thiyaa raago abhijjhaa kaayagantho, paravaadesu aaghaato appaccayo byaapaado kaayagantho, attano siila.m vaa vata.m vaa siilabbata.m vaa paraamaaso siilabbataparaamaaso kaayagantho, attano di.t.thi ida.msaccaabhiniveso kaayagantho. ^b^tassaa^eb^ti arahato khii.naasavassa. ^b^ganthaa tassa na vijjantii^eb^ti. ganthaa tassa natthi na santi na sa.mvijjanti nupalabbhanti, pahiinaa samucchinnaa vuupasantaa pa.tipassaddhaa abhabbuppattikaa ~naa.nagginaa da.d.dhaati -- ganthaa tassa na vijjanti.

[03] ^b^atarii so visattika^eb^nti. ^b^visattikaa^eb^ vuccati ta.nhaa. yo raago saaraago...pe0... abhijjhaa lobho akusalamuula.m. ^b^visattikaa^eb^ti kena.t.thena visattikaa ^a^M0.0191^ea^? visataati visattikaa, visaalaati visattikaa, visa.taati visattikaa, visamaati visattikaa, visakkatiiti visattikaa, visa.mharatiiti visattikaa, visa.mvaadikaati visattikaa, visamuulaati visattikaa, visaphalaati visattikaa, visaparibhogaati visattikaa, visaalaa vaa pana saa ta.nhaa ruupe... sadde... gandhe... rase... pho.t.thabbe... kule... ga.ne... aavaase...pe0... di.t.thasutamutavi~n~naatabbesu dhammesu visata.m vitthataati visattikaa. ^b^atarii so visattika^eb^nti. so ima.m visattika.m ta.nha.m atari uttari patari samatikkami viitivattiiti -- atarii ^a^T0.0297^ea^ so visattika.m.
[03] tenaaha ^a^V0.0181^ea^ bhagavaa --
[21] ``ta.m bruumi upasantoti, kaamesu anapekkhina.m.
[22] ganthaa tassa na vijjanti, atarii so visattika''nti..
[21] ^b^na tassa puttaa pasavo, khetta.m vatthu~nca vijjati.^eb^
[22] ^b^attaa vaapi nirattaa vaa, na tasmi.m upalabbhati..^eb^

[03] ^b^na tassa puttaa pasavo, khetta.m vatthu~nca vijjatii^eb^ti. ^b^naa^eb^ti pa.tikkhepo. ^b^tassaa^eb^ti arahato khii.naasavassa. ^b^puttaa^eb^ti cattaaro puttaa -- attajo putto, khettajo putto, dinnako putto ^a^P1.0248^ea^, antevaasiko putto. ^b^pasavo^eb^ti. aje.lakaa kukku.tasuukaraa hatthigaavaassava.lavaa. ^b^khetta^eb^nti saalikhetta.m viihikhetta.m muggakhetta.m maasakhetta.m yavakhetta.m godhumakhetta.m tilakhetta.m. ^b^vatthu^eb^nti gharavatthu.m ko.t.thavatthu.m purevatthu.m pacchaavatthu.m aaraamavatthu.m vihaaravatthu.m. ^b^na tassa puttaa pasavo, khetta.m vatthu~nca vijjatii^eb^ti. tassa puttapariggaho vaa pasupariggaho vaa khettapariggaho vaa vatthupariggaho vaa natthi na santi na sa.mvijjanti nupalabbhanti, pahiinaa samucchinnaa vuupasantaa pa.tipassaddhaa abhabbuppattikaa ~naa.nagginaa da.d.dhaati -- na tassa puttaa pasavo, khetta.m vatthu~nca vijjati.

[03] ^b^attaa vaapi nirattaa vaa, na tasmi.m upalabbhatii^eb^ti. ^b^attaa^eb^ti attadi.t.thi, ^b^nirattaa^eb^ti ucchedadi.t.thi; ^b^attaa^eb^ti gahita.m natthi, ^b^nirattaa^eb^ti mu~ncitabba.m natthi. yassa natthi gahita.m tassa natthi ^a^T0.0298^ea^ mu~ncitabba.m. yassa natthi mu~ncitabba.m tassa natthi gahita.m. gaahamu~ncanasamatikkanto arahaa vuddhiparihaaniviitivatto. so vu.t.thavaaso ci.n.nacara.no...pe0... jaatimara.nasa.msaaro natthi tassa punabbhavoti -- attaa vaapi nirattaa vaa, na tasmi.m upalabbhati.
[03] tenaaha bhagavaa --
[21] ``na ^a^M0.0192^ea^ tassa puttaa pasavo, khetta.m vatthu~nca vijjati.
[22] attaa vaapi nirattaa vaa, na tasmi.m upalabbhatii''ti..
[21] ^b^yena na.m vajju.m puthujjanaa, atho sama.nabraahma.naa.^eb^
[22] ^b^ta.m tassa apurakkhata.m, tasmaa vaadesu nejati..^eb^

[03] ^b^yena na.m vajju.m puthujjanaa, atho sama.nabraahma.naa^eb^ti. ^b^puthujjanaa^eb^ti puthu kilese janentiiti ^a^P1.0249^ea^ puthujjanaa ^a^V0.0182^ea^, puthu avihatasakkaayadi.t.thikaati puthujjanaa, puthu satthaaraana.m mukhullokikaati {mukhullokakaati (sii0)} puthujjanaa, puthu sabbagatiihi avu.t.thitaati puthujjanaa, puthu naanaabhisa"nkhaare abhisa"nkharontiiti puthujjanaa, puthu naanaaoghehi vuyhantiiti puthujjanaa, puthu naanaasantaapehi santappentiiti puthujjanaa, puthu naanaapari.laahehi pari.dayhantiiti puthujjanaa, puthu pa~ncasu kaamagu.nesu rattaa giddhaa gadhitaa mucchitaa ajjhosannaa laggaa laggitaa palibuddhaati puthujjanaa, puthu pa~ncahi niivara.nehi aavutaa nivutaa ovutaa pihitaa pa.ticchannaa pa.tikujjitaati -- puthujjanaa. ^b^sama.naa^eb^ti ye keci ito bahiddhaa paribbajuupagataa paribbajasamaapannaa. ^b^braahma.naa^eb^ti ye keci bhovaadikaa. ^b^yena na.m vajju.m puthujjanaa, atho sama.nabraahma.naa^eb^ti ^a^T0.0299^ea^. puthujjanaa yena ta.m raagena vadeyyu.m, yena dosena vadeyyu.m, yena mohena vadeyyu.m, yena maanena vadeyyu.m, yaaya di.t.thiyaa vadeyyu.m, yena uddhaccena vadeyyu.m, yaaya vicikicchaaya vadeyyu.m, yehi anusayehi vadeyyu.m, rattoti vaa du.t.thoti vaa muu.lhoti vaa vinibaddhoti vaa paraama.t.thoti vaa vikkhepagatoti vaa ani.t.tha"ngatoti vaa thaamagatoti vaa te abhisa"nkhaaraa pahiinaa; abhisa"nkhaaraana.m pahiinattaa gatiyaa {gatiyo (syaa0)} yena ta.m vadeyyu.m -- nerayikoti vaa tiracchaanayonikoti vaa pettivisayikoti vaa manussoti vaa devoti vaa ruupiiti vaa aruupiiti vaa sa~n~niiti vaa asa~n~niiti vaa nevasa~n~niinaasa~n~niiti vaa. so hetu natthi paccayo natthi kaara.na.m natthi yena na.m vadeyyu.m katheyyu.m bha.neyyu.m diipayeyyu.m vohareyyunti -- yena na.m vajju.m puthujjanaa, atho sama.nabraahma.naa.

[03] ^b^ta.m tassa apurakkhata^eb^nti. ^b^tassaa^eb^ti arahato khii.naasavassa. ^b^purekkhaaraa^eb^ti dve purekkhaaraa -- ta.nhaapurekkhaaro ca ^a^P1.0250^ea^ di.t.thipurekkhaaro ca...pe0... aya.m ^a^M0.0193^ea^ ta.nhaapurekkhaaro...pe0... aya.m di.t.thipurekkhaaro. tassa ta.nhaapurekkhaaro pahiino, di.t.thipurekkhaaro pa.tinissa.t.tho; ta.nhaapurekkhaarassa pahiinattaa, di.t.thipurekkhaarassa pa.tinissa.t.thattaa na ta.nha.m vaa di.t.thi.m vaa purato katvaa carati, na ta.nhaadhajo na ta.nhaaketu na ta.nhaadhipateyyo, na di.t.thidhajo na di.t.thiketu na di.t.thaadhipateyyo, na ta.nhaaya vaa na di.t.thiyaa vaa parivaarito ^a^T0.0300^ea^ caratiiti -- ta.m tassa apurakkhata.m.

[03] ^b^tasmaa vaadesu nejatii^eb^ti. ^b^tasmaa^eb^ti tasmaa ta.mkaara.naa ta.mhetu tappaccayaa ta.mnidaanaa vaadesu upavaadesu nindaaya garahaaya akittiyaa ava.n.nahaarikaaya nejati na i~njati na calati na vedhati nappavedhati na sampavedhatiiti -- tasmaa vaadesu nejati.
[03] tenaaha ^a^V0.0183^ea^ bhagavaa --
[21] ``yena na.m vajju.m puthujjanaa, atho sama.nabraahma.naa.
[22] ta.m tassa apurakkhata.m, tasmaa vaadesu nejatii''ti..
[21] ^b^viitagedho amaccharii, na ussesu vadate muni.^eb^
[22] ^b^na samesu na omesu, kappa.m neti akappiyo..^eb^

[03] ^b^viitagedho amaccharii^eb^ti. ^b^gedho^eb^ vuccati ta.nhaa. yo raago saaraago...pe0... abhijjhaa lobho akusalamuula.m. yasseso gedho pahiino samucchinno vuupasanto pa.tipassaddho abhabbuppattiko ~naa.nagginaa da.d.dho, so vuccati viitagedho. so ruupe agiddho...pe0... di.t.thasutamutavi~n~naatabbesu dhammesu agiddho agadhito amucchito anajjhosito, viitagedho vigatagedho cattagedho vantagedho muttagedho pahiinagedho pa.tinissa.t.thagedho nicchaato...pe0... brahmabhuutena attanaa viharatiiti -- viitagedho. ^b^amaccharii^eb^ti ^a^P1.0251^ea^ ^b^macchariyanti^eb^ pa~nca macchariyaani -- aavaasamacchariya.m, kulamacchariya.m, laabhamacchariya.m, va.n.namacchariya.m, dhammamacchariya.m. ya.m evaruupa.m...pe0... gaaho -- ida.m vuccati macchariya.m. yasseta.m macchariya.m pahiina.m samucchinna.m vuupasanta.m pa.tipassaddha.m abhabbuppattika.m ^a^T0.0301^ea^ ~naa.nagginaa da.d.dha.m, so vuccati amacchariiti -- viitagedho amaccharii.

[03] ^b^na ussesu vadate muni, na samesu na omesuu^eb^ti. ^b^munii^eb^ti. ^b^mona.m^eb^ vuccati ~naa.na.m...pe0... sa"ngajaalamaticca so muni. ``seyyohamasmii''ti vaa, ``sadisohamasmii''ti vaa, ``hiinohamasmii''ti vaa na vadati na katheti na bha.nati na diipayati na voharatiiti -- na ussesu vadate muni, na ^a^M0.0194^ea^ samesu na omesu.

[03] ^b^kappa.m neti akappiyo^eb^ti. ^b^kappaa^eb^ti dve kappaa -- ta.nhaakappo ca di.t.thikappo ca...pe0... aya.m ta.nhaakappo...pe0... aya.m di.t.thikappo. tassa ta.nhaakappo pahiino, di.t.thikappo pa.tinissa.t.tho; ta.nhaakappassa pahiinattaa, di.t.thikappassa pa.tinissa.t.thattaa ta.nhaakappa.m vaa di.t.thikappa.m vaa neti na upeti na upagacchati na ga.nhaati na paraamasati naabhinivisatiiti -- kappa.m neti. ^b^akappiyo^eb^ti. kappaati dve kappaa -- ta.nhaakappo ca di.t.thikappo ca...pe0... aya.m ta.nhaakappo...pe0... aya.m di.t.thikappo. tassa ta.nhaakappo pahiino, di.t.thikappo pa.tinissa.t.tho; tassa ^a^V0.0184^ea^ ta.nhaakappassa pahiinattaa, di.t.thikappassa pa.tinissa.t.thattaa ta.nhaakappa.m vaa di.t.thikappa.m vaa na kappeti na janeti na sa~njaneti na nibbatteti naabhinibbattetiiti -- kappa.m neti akappiyo.
[03] tenaaha bhagavaa --
[21] ``viitagedho ^a^T0.0302^ea^ amaccharii, na ussesu vadate muni.
[22] na samesu na omesu, kappa.m neti akappiyo''ti..
[21] ^b^yassa loke saka.m natthi, asataa ca na socati. ^eb^
[22] ^b^dhammesu ca na gacchati, sa ve santoti vuccati.. ^eb^

[03] ^b^yassa^eb^ ^a^P1.0252^ea^ ^b^loke saka.m natthii^eb^ti. ^b^yassaa^eb^ti arahato khii.naasavassa. ^b^loke saka.m natthii^eb^ti. tassa mayha.m vaa ida.m paresa.m vaa idanti ki~nci ruupagata.m vedanaagata.m sa~n~naagata.m sa"nkhaaragata.m vi~n~naa.nagata.m, gahita.m paraama.t.tha.m abhinivi.t.tha.m ajjhosita.m adhimutta.m, natthi na santi...pe0... ~naa.nagginaa da.d.dhanti -- yassa loke saka.m natthi. ^b^asataa ca na socatii^eb^ti. vipari.nata.m vaa vatthu.m na socati, vipari.natasmi.m vaa vatthusmi.m na socati. cakkhu me vipari.natanti na socati. sota.m me... ghaana.m me... jivhaa me... kaayo me... mano me... ruupaa me... saddaa me... gandhaa me... rasaa me... pho.t.thabbaa me... kula.m me... ga.no me... aavaaso me... laabho me... yaso me... pasa.msaa me... sukha.m me... ciivara.m me... pi.n.dapaato me... senaasana.m me... gilaanapaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaro me... maataa me... pitaa me... bhaataa me... bhaginii me... putto me... dhiitaa me... mittaa me... amaccaa me... ~naatakaa me... saalohitaa me vipari.nataati na socati na kilamati na paridevati na urattaa.li.m kandati na sammoha.m aapajjatiiti. evampi, asataa ca na socati.

[03] atha vaa asantaaya {asataaya (sii0), asaataaya (syaa0)} dukkhaaya vedanaaya phu.t.tho pareto samohito samannaagato na ^a^T0.0303^ea^ socati na kilamati na paridevati na urattaa.li.m ^a^M0.0195^ea^ kandati na sammoha.m aapajjati. cakkhurogena phu.t.tho pareto samohito samannaagato na socati na kilamati na paridevati na urattaa.li.m kandati na sammoha.m aapajjati, sotarogena... ghaanarogena... jivhaarogena... kaayarogena... siisarogena... ka.n.narogena... mukharogena... dantarogena... kaasena... saasena... pinaasena... .daahena... jarena... kucchirogena... mucchaaya... pakkhandikaaya... suulena... visuucikaaya... ku.t.thena... ga.n.dena... kilaasena... sosena... apamaarena... dadduyaa... ka.n.duyaa... kacchuyaa... rakhasaaya ^a^V0.0185^ea^... vitacchikaaya... lohitena... pittena... madhumehena... a.msaaya... pi.lakaaya... bhagandalena {bhagandalaaya (sii0 syaa0)} ... pittasamu.t.thaanena aabaadhena... semhasamu.t.thaanena aabaadhena... vaatasamu.t.thaanena ^a^P1.0253^ea^ aabaadhena... sannipaatikena aabaadhena... utupari.naamajena aabaadhena... visamaparihaarajena aabaadhena... opakkamikena aabaadhena... kammavipaakajena aabaadhena... siitena... u.nhena... jighacchaaya... pipaasaaya... .da.msamakasavaataatapasariisapasamphassehi phu.t.tho pareto samohito samannaagato na socati na kilamati na paridevati na urattaa.li.m kandati na sammoha.m aapajjatiiti. evampi, asataa ca na socati.

[03] atha vaa asante asa.mvijjamaane anupalabbhamaane {anupalabbhiyamaane (syaa0 ka0)} -- ``aho vata me ta.m natthi, siyaa vata me ta.m, ta.m vataaha.m na ca labhaamii''ti na socati na kilamati na paridevati na urattaa.li.m kandati na sammoha.m aapajjatiiti. evampi asataa ca na socati. ^b^dhammesu^eb^ ^a^T0.0304^ea^ ^b^ca na gacchatii^eb^ti na chandaagati.m gacchati, na dosaagati.m gacchati, na mohaagati.m gacchati, na bhayaagati.m gacchati, na raagavasena gacchati, na dosavasena gacchati, na mohavasena gacchati, na maanavasena gacchati, na di.t.thivasena gacchati, na uddhaccavasena gacchati, na vicikicchaavasena gacchati, na anusayavasena gacchati na ca vaggehi dhammehi yaayati niiyati vuyhati sa.mhariiyatiiti -- dhammesu ca na gacchati.
[03] ^b^sa ve santoti vuccatii^eb^ti. so santo upasanto vuupasanto nibbuto pa.tipassaddhoti vuccati pavuccati kathiiyati bha.niiyati diipiiyati ^a^P1.0254^ea^ vohariiyatiiti -- sa ve santoti vuccati.
[03] tenaaha bhagavaa --
[21] ``yassa ^a^M0.0196^ea^ loke saka.m natthi, asataa ca na socati.
[22] dhammesu ca na gacchati, sa ve santoti vuccatii''ti..
[06] puraabhedasuttaniddeso dasamo.
[03] atha ^a^V0.0186^ea^ kalahavivaadasuttaniddesa.m vakkhati --
[21] ^b^kutopahuutaa^eb^ ^a^T0.0305^ea^ ^a^P2.0255^ea^ ^b^kalahaa vivaadaa, paridevasokaa sahamaccharaa ca.^eb^
[22] ^b^maanaatimaanaa sahapesu.naa ca, kutopahuutaa te tadi"ngha bruuhi..^eb^

[03] ^b^kutopahuutaa kalahaa vivaadaa^eb^ti. ^b^kalaho^eb^ti ekena aakaarena kalaho; vivaadotipi ta~n~neva. yo kalaho so vivaado, yo vivaado so kalaho. atha vaa aparena aakaarena vivaado vuccati kalahassa pubbabhaago vivaado. raajaanopi raajuuhi vivadanti, khattiyaapi khattiyehi vivadanti, braahma.naapi braahma.nehi vivadanti, gahapatiipi gahapatiihi vivadanti, maataapi puttena vivadati, puttopi maataraa vivadati, pitaapi puttena vivadati, puttopi pitaraa vivadati, bhaataapi bhaataraa vivadati, bhaataapi bhaginiyaa vivadati, bhaginiipi bhaataraa vivadati, sahaayopi sahaayena vivadati -- aya.m vivaado. katamo kalaho? aagaarikaa da.n.dapasutaa kaayena vaacaaya kalaha.m karonti, pabbajitaa aapatti.m aapajjantaa kaayena vaacaaya kalaha.m karonti -- aya.m kalaho.

[03] ^b^kutopahuutaa^eb^ ^a^P2.0256^ea^ ^b^kalahaa vivaadaa^eb^ti. kalahaa ca vivaadaa ca kutopahuutaa kutojaataa kutosa~njaataa kutonibbattaa kutoabhinibbattaa kutopaatubhuutaa, ki.mnidaanaa ki.msamudayaa ki.mjaatikaa ki.mpabhavaati kalahassa ca vivaadassa ca muula.m pucchati, hetu.m pucchati ^a^T0.0306^ea^, nidaana.m pucchati, sambhava.m pucchati, pabhava.m pucchati, samu.t.thaana.m pucchati, aahaara.m pucchati, aaramma.na.m pucchati, paccaya.m pucchati, samudaya.m pucchati papucchati ^a^M0.0197^ea^ yaacati ajjhesati {ajjhosati (sii0)} pasaadetiiti -- kutopahuutaa kalahaa vivaadaa.

[03] ^b^paridevasokaa sahamaccharaa caa^eb^ti. ^b^paridevo^eb^ti ~naatibyasanena vaa phu.t.thassa, bhogabyasanena vaa phu.t.thassa, rogabyasanena vaa phu.t.thassa, siilabyasanena vaa phu.t.thassa, di.t.thibyasanena vaa phu.t.thassa, a~n~natara~n~natarena ^a^V0.0187^ea^ vaa byasanena samannaagatassa, a~n~natara~n~natarena vaa dukkhadhammena phu.t.thassa, aadevo paridevo, aadevanaa paridevanaa, aadevitatta.m paridevitatta.m, vaacaa palaapo vippalaapo laalappo laalappaayanaa laalappaayitatta.m. ^b^soko^eb^ti ~naatibyasanena vaa phu.t.thassa, bhogarogasiiladi.t.thibyasanena vaa phu.t.thassa, a~n~natara~n~natarena vaa byasanena samannaagatassa, a~n~natara~n~natarena vaa dukkhadhammena phu.t.thassa, soko socanaa socitatta.m, antosoko antoparisoko, anto.daaho antopari.daaho, cetaso parijjhaayanaa domanassa.m sokasalla.m. ^b^macchara^eb^nti pa~nca macchariyaani -- aavaasamacchariya.m, kulamacchariya.m, laabhamacchariya.m, va.n.namacchariya.m, dhammamacchariya.m. ya.m evaruupa.m macchariya.m maccharaayana.m maccharaayitatta.m veviccha.m kadariya.m ka.tuka~ncukataa aggahitatta.m cittassa -- ida.m vuccati macchariya.m. api ca, khandhamacchariyampi macchariya.m ^a^T0.0307^ea^, dhaatumacchariyampi macchariya.m, aayatanamacchariyampi ^a^P2.0257^ea^ macchariya.m gaaho. ida.m vuccati macchariyanti -- paridevasokaa sahamaccharaa ca.

[03] ^b^maanaatimaanaa sahapesu.naa caa^eb^ti. ^b^maano^eb^ti idhekacco maana.m janeti jaatiyaa vaa gottena vaa kolaputtiyena vaa va.n.napokkharataaya vaa dhanena vaa ajjhenena vaa kammaayatanena vaa sippaayatanena vaa vijjaa.t.thaanena vaa sutena vaa pa.tibhaanena vaa a~n~natara~n~natarena vaa vatthunaa. ^b^atimaano^eb^ti idhekacco para.m atima~n~nati jaatiyaa vaa gottena vaa...pe0... a~n~natara~n~natarena vaa vatthunaa. ^b^pesu~n~na^eb^nti idhekacco pisu.navaaco hoti -- ito sutvaa amutra akkhaataa imesa.m bhedaaya, amutra vaa sutvaa imesa.m akkhaataa amuusa.m bhedaaya. iti samaggaana.m vaa bhettaa, bhinnaana.m vaa anuppadaataa, vaggaaraamo vaggarato vagganandii vaggakara.ni.m vaaca.m bhaasitaa hoti -- ida.m vuccati pesu~n~na.m. api ca dviihi kaara.nehi pesu~n~na.m upasa.mharati -- piyakamyataaya vaa bhedaadhippaayena vaa. katha.m piyakamyataaya pesu~n~na.m upasa.mharati? imassa piyo ^a^M0.0198^ea^ bhavissaami, manaapo bhavissaami, vissaasiko bhavissaami, abbhantariko bhavissaami, suhadayo bhavissaamiiti -- eva.m piyakamyataaya pesu~n~na.m upasa.mharati. katha.m bhedaadhippaayena pesu~n~na.m upasa.mharati? katha.m ime naanaa assu, vinaa assu, vaggaa assu, dvidhaa assu, dvejjhaa assu, dve pakkhaa assu, bhijjeyyu.m na samaagaccheyyu.m, dukkha.m na phaasu ^a^T0.0308^ea^ vihareyyunti -- eva.m bhedaadhippaayena pesu~n~na.m upasa.mharatiiti -- maanaatimaanaa sahapesu.naa ca.

[03] ^b^kutopahuutaa te tadi"ngha bruuhii^eb^ti. kalaho ca vivaado ca paridevo ca soko ca macchariya~nca maano ca atimaano ca ^a^P2.0258^ea^ pesu~n~na~ncaati -- ime a.t.tha kilesaa kutopahuutaa kutojaataa kutosa~njaataa kutonibbattaa kutoabhinibbattaa kutopaatubhuutaa, ki.mnidaanaa ki.msamudayaa ^a^V0.0188^ea^ ki.mjaatikaa ki.mpabhavaati. imesa.m a.t.thanna.m kilesaana.m muula.m pucchati, hetu.m pucchati, nidaana.m pucchati, sambhava.m pucchati, pabhava.m pucchati, samu.t.thaana.m pucchati, aahaara.m pucchati, aaramma.na.m pucchati, paccaya.m pucchati, samudaya.m pucchati papucchati yaacati ajjhesati pasaadetiiti -- kutopahuutaa te tadi"ngha.m bruuhiiti. i"ngha bruuhi aacikkha desehi pa~n~napehi pa.t.thapehi vivara vibhaja uttaaniikarohi pakaasehiiti -- kutopahuutaa te tadi"ngha bruuhi.
[03] tenaaha so nimmito --
[21] ``kutopahuutaa kalahaa vivaadaa, paridevasokaa sahamaccharaa ca.
[22] maanaatimaanaa sahapesu.naa ca, kutopahuutaa te tadi"ngha bruuhii''ti..
[21] ^b^piyappahuutaa kalahaa vivaadaa, paridevasokaa sahamaccharaa ca.^eb^
[27] ^b^maanaatimaanaa sahapesu.naa ca, maccherayuttaa^eb^ ^a^T0.0309^ea^ ^b^kalahaa vivaadaa.^eb^
[22] ^b^vivaadajaatesu ca pesu.naani..^eb^

[03] ^b^piyappahuutaa kalahaa vivaadaa, paridevasokaa sahamaccharaa caa^eb^ti. ^b^piyaa^eb^ti dve piyaa -- sattaa vaa sa"nkhaaraa vaa. katame sattaa piyaa? idha yassa ^a^M0.0199^ea^ te honti atthakaamaa hitakaamaa phaasukaamaa yogakkhemakaamaa maataa vaa pitaa vaa bhaataa vaa bhaginii vaa putto vaa dhiitaa vaa mittaa vaa amaccaa vaa ~naatii vaa saalohitaa vaa -- ime sattaa piyaa. katame sa"nkhaaraa piyaa? manaapikaa ruupaa manaapikaa saddaa manaapikaa gandhaa manaapikaa rasaa manaapikaa pho.t.thabbaa -- ime sa"nkhaaraa piyaa.

[03] piya.m vatthu.m ^a^P2.0259^ea^ acchedasa"nkinopi kalaha.m karonti, acchijjantepi kalaha.m karonti, acchinnepi kalaha.m karonti. piya.m vatthu.m vipari.naamasa"nkinopi kalaha.m karonti, vipari.naamantepi kalaha.m karonti, vipari.natepi kalaha.m karonti. piya.m vatthu.m acchedasa"nkinopi vivadanti, acchijjantepi vivadanti, acchinnepi vivadanti. piya.m vatthu.m vipari.naamasa"nkinopi vivadanti, vipari.naamantepi vivadanti, vipari.natepi vivadanti. piya.m vatthu.m acchedasa"nkinopi paridevanti, acchijjantepi paridevanti, acchinnepi paridevanti. piya.m vatthu.m vipari.naamasa"nkinopi paridevanti, vipari.naamantepi paridevanti, vipari.natepi paridevanti. piya.m vatthu.m acchedasa"nkinopi socanti, acchijjantepi socanti, acchinnepi socanti. piya.m vatthu.m vipari.naamasa"nkinopi ^a^V0.0189^ea^ socanti ^a^T0.0310^ea^, vipari.naamantepi socanti, vipari.natepi socanti. piya.m vatthu.m rakkhanti gopenti parigga.nhanti mamaayanti maccharaayanti.

[03] ^b^maanaatimaanaa sahapesu.naa caa^eb^ti. piya.m vatthu.m nissaaya maana.m janenti, piya.m vatthu.m nissaaya atimaana.m janenti. katha.m piya.m vatthu.m nissaaya maana.m janenti? maya.m laabhino manaapikaana.m ruupaana.m saddaana.m gandhaana.m rasaana.m pho.t.thabbaananti. eva.m piya.m vatthu.m nissaaya maana.m janenti. katha.m piya.m vatthu.m nissaaya atimaana.m janenti? maya.m laabhino manaapikaana.m ruupaana.m saddaana.m gandhaana.m rasaana.m pho.t.thabbaana.m, ime pana~n~ne na laabhino manaapikaana.m ruupaana.m saddaana.m gandhaana.m rasaana.m pho.t.thabbaananti. eva.m piya.m vatthu.m nissaaya atimaana.m janenti. ^b^pesu~n~na^eb^nti idhekacco pisu.navaaco hoti, ito sutvaa amutra akkhaataa imesa.m bhedaaya...pe0... eva.m bhedaadhippaayena pesu~n~na.m upasa.mharatiiti...pe0... maanaatimaanaa sahapesu.naa ca.

[03] ^b^maccherayuttaa^eb^ ^a^P2.0260^ea^ ^b^kalahaa vivaadaa^eb^ti. kalaho ca vivaado ca paridevo ca soko ca maano ca atimaano ca pesu~n~na~ncaati -- ime satta kilesaa macchariye yuttaa payuttaa aayuttaa samaayuttaati -- maccherayuttaa kalahaa vivaadaa.

[03] ^b^vivaadajaatesu^eb^ ^a^M0.0200^ea^ ^b^ca pesu.naanii^eb^ti. vivaade jaate sa~njaate nibbatte abhinibbatte paatubhuute pesu~n~na.m upasa.mharanti; ito sutvaa ^a^T0.0311^ea^ amutra akkhaayanti imesa.m bhedaaya, amutra vaa sutvaa imesa.m akkhaayanti amuusa.m bhedaaya. iti samaggaana.m vaa bhettaaro, bhinnaana.m vaa anuppadaataaro, vaggaaraamaa vaggarataa vagganandii vaggakara.ni.m vaaca.m bhaasitaaro honti -- ida.m vuccati pesu~n~na.m. api ca dviihi kaara.nehi pesu~n~na.m upasa.mharanti -- piyakamyataaya vaa bhedaadhippaayena vaa. katha.m piyakamyataaya pesu~n~na.m upasa.mharanti? imassa piyaa bhavissaama, manaapaa bhavissaama, vissaasikaa bhavissaama, abbhantarikaa bhavissaama, suhadayaa bhavissaamaati. eva.m piyakamyataaya pesu~n~na.m upasa.mharanti. katha.m bhedaadhippaayena pesu~n~na.m upasa.mharanti? ``katha.m ime naanaa assu, vinaa assu, vaggaa assu, dvedhaa assu, dvejjhaa assu, dve pakkhaa assu, bhijjeyyu.m na samaagaccheyyu.m, dukkha.m na phaasu vihareyyu''nti -- eva.m bhedaadhippaayena pesu~n~na.m upasa.mharantiiti -- vivaadajaatesu ca pesu.naani.
[03] tenaaha ^a^V0.0190^ea^ bhagavaa --
[21] ``piyappahuutaa kalahaa vivaadaa, paridevasokaa sahamaccharaa ca.
[27] maanaatimaanaa sahapesu.naa ca, maccherayuttaa kalahaa vivaadaa.
[22] vivaadajaatesu ca pesu.naanii''ti..
[21] ^b^piyaa^eb^ ^a^T0.0312^ea^ ^a^P2.0261^ea^ ^b^su lokasmi.m kutonidaanaa, ye caapi lobhaa vicaranti loke.^eb^
[22] ^b^aasaa ca ni.t.thaa ca kutonidaanaa, ye samparaayaaya narassa honti..^eb^

[03] ^b^piyaa su lokasmi.m kutonidaanaa^eb^ti. piyaa kutonidaanaa kutojaataa kutosa~njaataa kutonibbattaa kutoabhinibbattaa kutopaatubhuutaa, ki.mnidaanaa ki.msamudayaa ki.mjaatikaa ki.mpabhavaati piyaana.m muula.m pucchati...pe0... samudaya.m pucchati papucchati yaacati ajjhesati pasaadetiiti -- piyaa su lokasmi.m kutonidaanaa.

[03] ^b^ye caapi lobhaa vicaranti loke^eb^ti. ^b^ye caapii^eb^ti khattiyaa ca braahma.naa ca vessaa ca suddaa ca gaha.t.thaa ca pabbajitaa ca devaa ca manussaa ^a^M0.0201^ea^ ca. ^b^lobhaa^eb^ti yo lobho lubbhanaa lubbhitatta.m saaraago saarajjanaa saarajjitatta.m abhijjhaa lobho akusalamuula.m. ^b^vicarantii^eb^ti vicaranti viharanti iriyanti vattanti paalenti yapenti yaapenti. ^b^loke^eb^ti apaayaloke manussaloke devaloke khandhaloke dhaatuloke aayatanaloketi -- ye caapi lobhaa vicaranti loke.

[03] ^b^aasaa ca ni.t.thaa ca kutonidaanaa^eb^ti. aasaa ca ni.t.thaa ca kutonidaanaa kutojaataa kutosa~njaataa kutonibbattaa kutoabhinibbattaa kutopaatubhuutaa, ki.mnidaanaa ki.msamudayaa ki.mjaatikaa ki.mpabhavaati aasaaya ^a^T0.0313^ea^ ca ni.t.thaaya ca muula.m pucchati...pe0... samudaya.m pucchati papucchati yaacati ajjhesati pasaadetiiti -- aasaa ca ni.t.thaa ca kutonidaanaa. ^b^ye samparaayaaya narassa hontii^eb^ti. ye narassa paraayanaa honti diipaa honti taa.naa honti le.naa honti sara.naa honti ni.t.thaa paraayanaa hontiiti -- ye samparaayaaya narassa honti.
[03] tenaaha so nimmito --
[21] ``piyaa ^a^P2.0262^ea^ su lokasmi.m kutonidaanaa, ye caapi lobhaa vicaranti loke.
[22] aasaa ca ni.t.thaa ca kutonidaanaa, ye samparaayaaya narassa hontii''ti..
[21] ^b^chandaanidaanaani^eb^ ^a^V0.0191^ea^ ^b^piyaani loke, ye caapi^eb^ {ye vaapi (syaa0)} ^b^lobhaa vicaranti loke.^eb^
[22] ^b^aasaa ca ni.t.thaa ca itonidaanaa, ye samparaayaaya narassa honti..^eb^

[03] ^b^chandaanidaanaani piyaani loke^eb^ti. ^b^chando^eb^ti yo kaamesu kaamacchando kaamaraago kaamanandii kaamata.nhaa kaamasneho kaamapari.laaho kaamamucchaa kaamajjhosaana.m kaamogho kaamayogo kaamupaadaana.m kaamacchandaniivara.na.m. api ca pa~nca chandaa -- pariyesanacchando, pa.tilaabhacchando, paribhogacchando, sannidhicchando, visajjanacchando. katamo ^a^T0.0314^ea^ pariyesanacchando? idhekacco ajjhositoyeva atthiko chandajaato ruupe pariyesati, sadde... gandhe... rase... pho.t.thabbe pariyesati -- aya.m ^a^M0.0202^ea^ pariyesanacchando. katamo pa.tilaabhacchando? idhekacco ajjhositoyeva atthiko chandajaato ruupe pa.tilabhati, sadde... gandhe... rase... pho.t.thabbe pa.tilabhati -- aya.m pa.tilaabhacchando. katamo paribhogacchando? idhekacco ajjhositoyeva atthiko chandajaato ruupe paribhu~njati, sadde... gandhe... rase... pho.t.thabbe paribhu~njati -- aya.m paribhogacchando. katamo sannidhicchando? idhekacco ajjhositoyeva atthiko chandajaato dhanasannicaya.m karoti ``aapadaasu bhavissatii''ti -- aya.m sannidhicchando. katamo visajjanacchando? idhekacco ajjhositoyeva atthiko chandajaato dhana.m visajjeti hatthaarohaana.m assaarohaana.m rathikaana.m dhanuggahaana.m pattikaana.m ``ime ma.m rakkhissanti gopissanti samparivaarissantii''ti -- aya.m visajjanacchando. ^b^piyaanii^eb^ti ^a^P2.0263^ea^ dve piyaa -- sattaa vaa sa"nkhaaraa vaa...pe0... ime sattaa piyaa...pe0... ime sa"nkhaaraa piyaa. ^b^chandaanidaanaani piyaani loke^eb^ti. piyaa chandanidaanaa chandasamudayaa chandajaatikaa chandapabhavaati -- chandaanidaanaani piyaani loke.

[03] ^b^ye^eb^ ^a^T0.0315^ea^ ^b^caapi lobhaa vicaranti loke^eb^ti. ^b^ye caapii^eb^ti khattiyaa ca braahma.naa ca vessaa ca suddaa ca gaha.t.thaa ca pabbajitaa ca devaa ca manussaa ca. ^b^lobhaa^eb^ti yo lobho lubbhanaa lubbhitatta.m saaraago saarajjanaa saarajjitatta.m abhijjhaa lobho akusalamuula.m. ^b^vicarantii^eb^ti vicaranti viharanti iriyanti vattanti paalenti yapenti yaapenti. ^b^loke^eb^ti apaayaloke...pe0... aayatanaloketi -- ye caapi lobhaa vicaranti loke.
