[03] katha.m bhagavaa buddhacakkhunaapi viva.tacakkhu? bhagavaa buddhacakkhunaa loka.m volokento addasa satte apparajakkhe mahaarajakkhe tikkhindriye mudindriye svaakaare dvaakaare suvi~n~naapaye duvi~n~naapaye appekacce paralokavajjabhayadassaavino viharante, appekacce na paralokavajjabhayadassaavino viharante. seyyathaapi naama uppaliniya.m vaa paduminiya.m vaa pu.n.dariikiniya.m vaa appekaccaani uppalaani vaa padumaani vaa pu.n.dariikaani vaa udake jaataani udake sa.mva.d.dhaani udakaa anuggataani antonimuggaposiini, appekaccaani uppalaani vaa padumaani vaa pu.n.dariikaani vaa udake jaataani udake sa.mva.d.dhaani samodaka.m .thitaani, appekaccaani uppalaani vaa padumaani vaa pu.n.dariikaani vaa udake jaataani udake sa.mva.d.dhaani udakaa accuggamma ti.t.thanti anupalittaani udakena; evameva bhagavaa buddhacakkhunaa loka.m volokento addasa satte apparajakkhe mahaarajakkhe tikkhindriye mudindriye svaakaare dvaakaare suvi~n~naapaye duvi~n~naapaye appekacce paralokavajjabhayadassaavino ^a^T0.0435^ea^ viharante, appekacce na paralokavajjabhayadassaavino viharante. jaanaati bhagavaa -- ``aya.m puggalo raagacarito, aya.m dosacarito, aya.m mohacarito, aya.m vitakkacarito, aya.m saddhaacarito, aya.m ~naa.nacarito''ti. raagacaritassa bhagavaa puggalassa asubhakatha.m katheti; dosacaritassa bhagavaa puggalassa mettaabhaavana.m aacikkhati; mohacaritassa bhagavaa puggalassa uddese paripucchaaya kaalena dhammassavane kaalena dhammasaakacchaaya garusa.mvaase niveseti; vitakkacaritassa bhagavaa puggalassa aanaapaanassati.m aacikkhati; saddhaacaritassa bhagavaa puggalassa pasaadaniiya.m nimitta.m aacikkhati buddhasubodhi.m ^a^P2.0360^ea^ ^a^M0.0280^ea^ {buddhasubuddhata.m (ka0)} dhammasudhammata.m sa"nghasuppa.tipatti.m siilaani ca; attano ~naa.nacaritassa bhagavaa puggalassa aacikkhati vipassanaanimitta.m aniccaakaara.m dukkhaakaara.m anattaakaara.m.
[21] ``sele ^a^V0.0265^ea^ yathaa pabbatamuddhani.t.thito, yathaapi passe janata.m samantato.
[27] tathuupama.m dhammamaya.m sumedha, paasaadamaaruyha samantacakkhu.
[22] sokaavati.n.na.m janatamapetasoko, avekkhassu jaatijaraabhibhuuta''nti..
[03] eva.m bhagavaa buddhacakkhunaapi viva.tacakkhu.

[03] katha.m bhagavaa samantacakkhunaapi viva.tacakkhu? ^b^samantacakkhu^eb^ vuccati sabba~n~nuta~naa.na.m. bhagavaa sabba~n~nuta~naa.nena upeto samupeto upagato ^a^T0.0436^ea^ samupagato upapanno samupapanno samannaagato.
[21] ``na tassa adi.t.thamidhatthi ki~nci, atho avi~n~naatamajaanitabba.m.
[22] sabba.m abhi~n~naasi yadatthi neyya.m, tathaagato tena samantacakkhuu''ti..
[03] eva.m bhagavaa samantacakkhunaapi viva.tacakkhuuti -- akittayi viva.tacakkhu.

[03] ^b^sakkhidhamma.m parissayavinaya^eb^nti. ^b^sakkhidhamma^eb^nti na itihitiha.m, na itikiraaya, na paramparaaya, na pi.takasampadaaya, na takkahetu, na nayahetu, na aakaaraparivitakkena, na di.t.thinijjhaanakkhantiyaa saama.m sayamabhi~n~naata.m attapaccakkha.m dhammanti -- sakkhidhamma.m. ^b^parissayavinaya^eb^nti. ^b^parissayaa^eb^ti dve parissayaa -- paaka.taparissayaa ca pa.ticchannaparissayaa ca. katame paaka.taparissayaa? siihaa byagghaa diipii acchaa taracchaa ^a^P2.0361^ea^ kokaa mahi.msaa {gomahisaa (syaa0) mahaani0 5} hatthii ahi vicchikaa satapadii, coraa vaa assu maanavaa vaa katakammaa vaa akatakammaa vaa, cakkhurogo sotarogo ghaanarogo jivhaarogo kaayarogo siisarogo ka.n.narogo mukharogo dantarogo kaaso saaso pinaaso .daaho {.daho (sii0 syaa0) mahaani0 5} jaro kucchirogo mucchaa pakkhandikaa suulaa visuucikaa ku.t.tha.m ga.n.do kilaaso soso apamaaro ^a^M0.0281^ea^ daddu ka.n.du kacchu rakhasaa vitacchikaa lohitapitta.m {lohita.m pitta.m (syaa0 ka0)} madhumeho a.msaa pi.lakaa bhagandalaa, pittasamu.t.thaanaa aabaadhaa semhasamu.t.thaanaa aabaadhaa ^a^T0.0437^ea^ vaatasamu.t.thaanaa aabaadhaa sannipaatikaa aabaadhaa utupari.naamajaa aabaadhaa visamaparihaarajaa aabaadhaa opakkamikaa aabaadhaa kammavipaakajaa aabaadhaa, siita.m u.nha.m jighacchaa pipaasaa uccaaro passaavo .da.msamakasavaataatapasariisapasamphassaa iti vaa -- ime vuccanti paaka.taparissayaa.

[03] katame pa.ticchannaparissayaa? kaayaduccarita.m vaciiduccarita.m manoduccarita.m kaamacchandaniivara.na.m ^a^V0.0266^ea^ byaapaadaniivara.na.m thinamiddhaniivara.na.m uddhaccakukkuccaniivara.na.m vicikicchaaniivara.na.m raago doso moho kodho upanaaho makkho pa.laaso issaa macchariya.m maayaa saa.theyya.m thambho saarambho maano atimaano mado pamaado, sabbe kilesaa sabbe duccaritaa sabbe darathaa sabbe pari.laahaa sabbe santaapaa sabbaakusalaabhisa"nkhaaraa -- ime vuccanti pa.ticchannaparissayaa.

[03] ^b^parissayaa^eb^ti kena.t.thena parissayaa? parisahantiiti parissayaa, parihaanaaya sa.mvattantiiti parissayaa, tatraasayaati parissayaa. katha.m parisahantiiti parissayaa? te parissayaa ta.m puggala.m sahanti parisahanti abhibhavanti ajjhottharanti pariyaadiyanti maddanti. eva.m parisahantiiti -- parissayaa.

[03] katha.m parihaanaaya sa.mvattantiiti parissayaa? te parissayaa kusalaana.m dhammaana.m antaraayaaya parihaanaaya sa.mvattanti. katamesa.m kusalaana.m dhammaana.m? sammaapa.tipadaaya anulomapa.tipadaaya apaccaniikapa.tipadaaya ^a^T0.0438^ea^ ^a^P2.0362^ea^ aviruddhapa.tipadaaya anvatthapa.tipadaaya dhammaanudhammapa.tipadaaya siilesu paripuurakaaritaaya indriyesu guttadvaarataaya bhojane matta~n~nutaaya jaagariyaanuyogassa satisampaja~n~nassa catunna.m satipa.t.thaanaana.m bhaavanaanuyogassa catunna.m sammappadhaanaana.m catunna.m iddhipaadaana.m pa~ncanna.m indriyaana.m pa~ncanna.m balaana.m sattanna.m bojjha"ngaana.m ariyassa a.t.tha"ngikassa maggassa bhaavanaanuyogassa -- imesa.m kusalaana.m dhammaana.m antaraayaaya parihaanaaya sa.mvattanti. evampi parihaanaaya sa.mvattantiiti -- parissayaa.

[03] katha.m ^a^M0.0282^ea^ tatraasayaati parissayaa? tatthete paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa uppajjanti attabhaavasannissayaa. yathaa bile bilaasayaa paa.naa sayanti, dake dakaasayaa paa.naa sayanti, vane vanaasayaa paa.naa sayanti, rukkhe rukkhaasayaa paa.naa sayanti; evameva tatthete paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa uppajjanti attabhaavasannissayaati. evampi tatraasayaati -- parissayaa.

[03] vutta~nheta.m bhagavataa -- ``saantevaasiko, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saacariyako dukkha.m na phaasu viharati. katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saantevaasiko saacariyako dukkha.m na phaasu viharati? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno cakkhunaa ruupa.m disvaa uppajjanti paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa sarasa"nkappaa sa~n~nojaniyaa, tyassa anto vasanti anvaassavanti paapakaa akusalaa dhammaati. tasmaa ^a^V0.0267^ea^ saantevaasikoti vuccati. te na.m samudaacaranti, samudaacaranti {samudaacaarenti (sii0)} na.m paapakaa ^a^T0.0439^ea^ akusalaa dhammaati. tasmaa saacariyakoti vuccati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno sotena sadda.m sutvaa...pe0... ghaanena gandha.m ghaayitvaa... jivhaaya rasa.m saayitvaa... kaayena pho.t.thabba.m phusitvaa ^a^P2.0363^ea^... manasaa dhamma.m vi~n~naaya uppajjanti paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa sarasa"nkappaa sa~n~nojaniyaa, tyassa anto vasanti anvaassavanti paapakaa akusalaa dhammaati. tasmaa saantevaasikoti vuccati. te na.m samudaacaranti, samudaacaranti na.m paapakaa akusalaa dhammaati. tasmaa saacariyakoti vuccati. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saantevaasiko saacariyako dukkha.m na phaasu viharatii''ti. evampi tatraasayaati -- parissayaa.

[03] vutta~nheta.m bhagavataa -- ``tayome, bhikkhave, antaraamalaa antaraaamittaa antaraasapattaa antaraavadhakaa antaraapaccatthikaa. katame tayo? lobho, bhikkhave, antaraamalo {antaraamala.m (sii0 ka0) itivu0 88} antaraaamitto antaraasapatto antaraavadhako antaraapaccatthiko; doso, bhikkhave...pe0... moho, bhikkhave, antaraamalo antaraaamitto antaraasapatto antaraavadhako antaraapaccatthiko. ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo antaraamalaa antaraaamittaa antaraasapattaa antaraavadhakaa antaraapaccatthikaa''ti.
[21] ``anatthajanano ^a^M0.0283^ea^ lobho, lobho cittappakopano.
[22] bhayamantarato jaata.m, ta.m jano naavabujjhati..
[21] ``luddho ^a^T0.0440^ea^ attha.m na jaanaati, luddho dhamma.m na passati.
[22] andhantama.m {andhatama.m (syaa0) itivu0 88} tadaa hoti, ya.m lobho sahate nara.m..
[21] ``anatthajanano doso, doso cittappakopano.
[22] bhayamantarato jaata.m, ta.m jano naavabujjhati..
[21] ``kuddho attha.m na jaanaati, kuddho dhamma.m na passati.
[22] andhantama.m tadaa hoti, ya.m doso sahate nara.m..
[21] ``anatthajanano ^a^V0.0268^ea^ ^a^P2.0364^ea^ moho, moho cittappakopano.
[22] bhayamantarato jaata.m, ta.m jano naavabujjhati..
[21] ``muu.lho attha.m na jaanaati, muu.lho dhamma.m na passati.
[22] andhantama.m tadaa hoti, ya.m moho sahate nara''nti..
[03] evampi tatraasayaati -- parissayaa.

[03] vutta~nheta.m bhagavataa -- ``tayo kho, mahaaraaja, purisassa dhammaa ajjhatta.m uppajjamaanaa uppajjanti ahitaaya dukkhaaya aphaasuvihaaraaya. katame tayo? lobho kho, mahaaraaja, purisassa dhammo ajjhatta.m uppajjamaano uppajjati ahitaaya dukkhaaya aphaasuvihaaraaya; doso kho, mahaaraaja...pe0... moho kho, mahaaraaja, purisassa dhammo ajjhatta.m uppajjamaano uppajjati ahitaaya dukkhaaya aphaasuvihaaraaya. ime kho, mahaaraaja, tayo purisassa dhammaa ajjhatta.m uppajjamaanaa uppajjanti ahitaaya dukkhaaya aphaasuvihaaraaya.
[21] ``lobho ^a^T0.0441^ea^ doso ca moho ca, purisa.m paapacetasa.m.
[22] hi.msanti attasambhuutaa, tacasaara.mva samphala''nti..
[03] evampi tatraasayaati -- parissayaa.
[03] vutta~nheta.m ^a^M0.0284^ea^ bhagavataa --
[21] ``raago ca doso ca ito nidaanaa, aratii ratii lomaha.mso itojaa.
[22] ito samu.t.thaaya manovitakkaa, kumaarakaa dha"nkamivossajantii''ti..
[03] evampi tatraasayaati -- parissayaa.

[03] ^b^parissayavinaya^eb^nti ^a^P2.0365^ea^ parissayavinaya.m parissayappahaana.m parissayavuupasama.m parissayapa.tinissagga.m parissayapa.tipassaddhi.m amata.m nibbaananti -- sakkhidhamma.m parissayavinaya.m.

[03] ^b^pa.tipada.m vadehi bhaddante^eb^ti. pa.tipada.m vadehi -- sammaapa.tipada.m anulomapa.tipada.m apaccaniikapa.tipada.m ^a^V0.0269^ea^ aviruddhapa.tipada.m anvatthapa.tipada.m dhammaanudhammapa.tipada.m siilesu paripuurakaarita.m indriyesu guttadvaarata.m bhojane matta~n~nuta.m jaagariyaanuyoga.m satisampaja~n~na.m cattaaro satipa.t.thaane cattaaro sammappadhaane cattaaro iddhipaade pa~ncindriyaani pa~nca balaani satta bojjha"nge ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m nibbaana~nca nibbaanagaamini~nca pa.tipada.m vadehi aacikkha desehi pa~n~napehi pa.t.thapehi vivara vibhaja uttaaniikarohi pakaasehiiti -- pa.tipada.m vadehi. ^b^bhaddante^eb^ti so nimmito ^a^T0.0442^ea^ buddha.m bhagavanta.m aalapati. atha vaa ya.m tva.m dhamma.m aacikkhasi desesi pa~n~napesi pa.t.thapesi vivari vibhaji uttaaniiakaasi pakaasesi sabba.m ta.m sundara.m bhaddaka.m kalyaa.na.m anavajja.m sevitabbanti -- pa.tipada.m vadehi bhaddante.

[03] ^b^paatimokkha.m atha vaapi samaadhi^eb^nti. ^b^paatimokkha^eb^nti siila.m pati.t.thaa aadi cara.na.m sa.myamo sa.mvaro mukha.m pamukha.m kusalaana.m dhammaana.m samaapattiyaa. ^b^atha vaapi samaadhi^eb^nti yaa cittassa .thiti sa.n.thiti ava.t.thiti avisaahaaro avikkhepo avisaahatamaanasataa samatho samaadhindriya.m samaadhibala.m sammaasamaadhiiti -- paatimokkha.m atha vaapi samaadhi.m.
[03] tenaaha so nimmito --
[21] ``akittayii viva.tacakkhu, sakkhidhamma.m parissayavinaya.m.
[22] pa.tipada.m vadehi bhaddante, paatimokkha.m atha vaapi samaadhi''nti..
[21] ^b^cakkhuuhi^eb^ ^a^M0.0285^ea^ ^b^neva lolassa, gaamakathaaya aavaraye sota.m.^eb^

[03] ^b^cakkhuuhi^eb^ ^a^P2.0366^ea^ ^b^neva lolassaa^eb^ti. katha.m cakkhuloloti? idhekacco cakkhuloliyena samannaagato hoti -- ``adi.t.tha.m dakkhitabba.m ^a^T0.0443^ea^, di.t.tha.m samatikkamitabba''nti aaraamena aaraama.m uyyaanena uyyaana.m gaamena gaama.m nigamena nigama.m nagarena nagara.m ra.t.thena ra.t.tha.m janapadena janapada.m diighacaarika.m anava.t.thitacaarika.m {anavatthitacaarika.m (sii0 syaa0)} anuyutto ca hoti ruupassa dassanaaya. evampi cakkhulolo hoti.

[03] atha vaa bhikkhu antaraghara.m pavi.t.tho viithi.m pa.tipanno asa.mvuto gacchati hatthi.m olokento, assa.m olokento, ratha.m olokento, patti.m olokento, itthiyo olokento, purise olokento, kumaarake olokento, kumaarikaayo olokento, antaraapa.na.m olokento ^a^V0.0270^ea^, gharamukhaani olokento, uddha.m olokento, adho olokento, disaavidisa.m vipekkhamaano gacchati. evampi cakkhulolo hoti.

[03] atha vaa bhikkhu cakkhunaa ruupa.m disvaa nimittaggaahii hoti anubya~njanaggaahii. yatvaadhikara.namena.m cakkhundriya.m asa.mvuta.m viharanta.m abhijjhaadomanassaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa anvaassaveyyu.m, tassa sa.mvaraaya na pa.tipajjati, na rakkhati cakkhundriya.m, cakkhundriye na sa.mvara.m aapajjati. evampi cakkhulolo hoti.

[03] yathaa vaa paneke bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa saddhaadeyyaani bhojanaani bhu~njitvaa te evaruupa.m visuukadassana.m anuyuttaa viharanti, seyyathida.m -- nacca.m giita.m vaadita.m pekkha.m akkhaana.m paa.nissara.m vetaa.la.m kumbhathuu.na.m {kumbhathuuna.m (sii0 syaa0 ka0)} sobhanaka.m {sobhanagaraka.m (sii0 syaa0)} ca.n.daala.m va.msa.m dhovana.m hatthiyuddha.m assayuddha.m mahi.msayuddha.m {mahisayuddha.m (sii0 syaa0)} usabhayuddha.m ajayuddha.m me.n.dayuddha.m kukku.tayuddha.m va.t.takayuddha.m da.n.dayuddha.m mu.t.thiyuddha.m nibbuddha.m uyyodhika.m ^a^P2.0367^ea^ balagga.m senaabyuuha.m aniikadassana.m iti vaa ^a^T0.0444^ea^. evampi cakkhulolo hoti.

[03] katha.m ^a^M0.0286^ea^ na cakkhulolo hoti? idha bhikkhu antaraghara.m pavi.t.tho viithi.m pa.tipanno sa.mvuto gacchati na hatthi.m olokento, na assa.m olokento, na ratha.m olokento, na patti.m olokento, na itthiyo olokento, na purise olokento, na kumaarake olokento, na kumaarikaayo olokento, na antaraapa.na.m olokento, na gharamukhaani olokento, na uddha.m olokento, na adho olokento, na disaavidisaavipekkhamaano gacchati. evampi na cakkhulolo hoti.

[03] atha vaa bhikkhu cakkhunaa ruupa.m disvaa na nimittaggaahii hoti naanubya~njanaggaahii. yatvaadhikara.namena.m cakkhundriya.m asa.mvuta.m viharanta.m abhijjhaadomanassaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa anvaassaveyyu.m, tassa sa.mvaraaya pa.tipajjati, rakkhati cakkhundriya.m, cakkhundriye sa.mvara.m aapajjati. evampi na cakkhulolo hoti.

[03] yathaa vaa paneke bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa saddhaadeyyaani bhojanaani bhu~njitvaa te evaruupa.m visuukadassana.m ananuyuttaa viharanti, seyyathida.m -- nacca.m giita.m vaadita.m pekkha.m akkhaana.m...pe0... aniikadassana.m iti vaa. evaruupaa visuukadassanaa pa.tivirato hoti. evampi na cakkhulolo hoti.

[03] ^b^cakkhuuhi^eb^ ^a^V0.0271^ea^ ^b^neva lolassaa^eb^ti. cakkhuloliya.m pajaheyya vinodeyya byanti.m kareyya anabhaava.m gameyya, cakkhuloliyaa aarato assa virato pa.tivirato nikkhanto nissa.to vippamutto visa~n~nutto vimariyaadikatena cetasaa ^a^T0.0445^ea^ vihareyyaati -- cakkhuuhi neva lolassa.

[03] ^b^gaamakathaaya aavaraye sota^eb^nti. gaamakathaa vuccati baatti.msa tiracchaanakathaa, seyyathida.m -- raajakathaa corakathaa mahaamattakathaa senaakathaa bhayakathaa yuddhakathaa annakathaa paanakathaa vatthakathaa yaanakathaa sayanakathaa maalaakathaa gandhakathaa ~naatikathaa gaamakathaa nigamakathaa ^a^P2.0368^ea^ nagarakathaa janapadakathaa itthikathaa {itthikathaa purisakathaa (bahuusu)} suurakathaa visikhaakathaa kumbha.t.thaanakathaa pubbapetakathaa naanattakathaa lokakkhaayikaa samuddakkhaayikaa itibhavaabhavakathaa iti vaa. ^b^gaamakathaaya aavaraye sota^eb^nti ^a^M0.0287^ea^. gaamakathaaya sota.m aavareyya nivaareyya sa.mvareyya rakkheyya gopeyya pidaheyya pacchindeyyaati -- gaamakathaaya aavaraye sota.m.

[03] ^b^rase ca naanugijjheyyaa^eb^ti. ^b^rase caa^eb^ti muularaso khandharaso tacaraso pattaraso puppharaso phalaraso ambila.m madhura.m tittaka.m ka.tuka.m lo.nika.m khaarika.m lambika.m kasaavo saadu asaadu siita.m u.nha.m. santeke sama.nabraahma.naa rasagiddhaa; te jivhaggena rasaggaani pariyesantaa aahi.n.danti, te ambila.m labhitvaa anambila.m pariyesanti, anambila.m labhitvaa ambila.m pariyesanti...pe0... siita.m labhitvaa u.nha.m pariyesanti, u.nha.m labhitvaa siita.m pariyesanti. te ya.m ya.m labhitvaa tena tena na tussanti, aparaapara.m pariyesanti, manaapikesu rasesu rattaa giddhaa gadhitaa mucchitaa ajjhosannaa laggaa laggitaa palibuddhaa. yassesaa rasata.nhaa pahiinaa samucchinnaa...pe0... ~naa.nagginaa ^a^T0.0446^ea^ da.d.dhaa, so pa.tisa"nkhaa yoniso aahaara.m aahaareti neva davaaya...pe0... anavajjataa ca phaasuvihaaro caati.

[03] yathaa va.na.m aalimpeyya yaavadeva aaruha.natthaaya {aaruhanatthaaya (ka0) puraabhedasuttaniddese sattamagaathaava.n.nanaaya.m}, yathaa vaa pana akkha.m abbha~njeyya yaavadeva bhaarassa nitthara.natthaaya, yathaa vaa puttama.msa.m aahaara.m aahaareyya yaavadeva kantaarassa nitthara.natthaaya; evameva.m bhikkhu pa.tisa"nkhaa yoniso aahaara.m ^a^P2.0369^ea^ aahaareti neva davaaya...pe0... anavajjataa ca phaasuvihaaro caati rasata.nha.m pajaheyya vinodeyya byanti.m kareyya anabhaava.m gameyya, rasata.nhaaya aarato assa virato pa.tivirato nikkhanto nissa.to vippamutto visa~n~nutto vimariyaadikatena cetasaa vihareyyaati -- rase ca naanugijjheyya.

[03] ^b^na ca mamaayetha ki~nci lokasmi^eb^nti. ^b^mamattaa^eb^ti dve mamattaa -- ta.nhaamamatta~nca di.t.thimamatta~nca ^a^V0.0272^ea^ ...pe0... ida.m ta.nhaamamatta.m...pe0... ida.m di.t.thimamatta.m. ta.nhaamamatta.m pahaaya di.t.thimamatta.m pa.tinissajjitvaa cakkhu.m na mamaayeyya na ga.nheyya na paraamaseyya naabhiniviseyya; sota.m... ghaana.m... jivha.m... kaaya.m... ruupe... sadde... gandhe... rase... pho.t.thabbe... kula.m... ga.na.m... aavaasa.m... laabha.m... yasa.m... pasa.msa.m... sukha.m... ciivara.m... pi.n.dapaata.m... senaasana.m... gilaanapaccayabhesajjaparikkhaara.m... kaamadhaatu.m... ruupadhaatu.m... aruupadhaatu.m... kaamabhava.m... ruupabhava.m... aruupabhava.m... sa~n~naabhava.m... asa~n~naabhava.m... nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naabhava.m ^a^T0.0447^ea^... ekavokaarabhava.m... catuvokaarabhava.m... pa~ncavokaarabhava.m ^a^M0.0288^ea^... atiita.m... anaagata.m... paccuppanna.m... di.t.thasutamutavi~n~naatabbe dhamme na mamaayeyya na ga.nheyya na paraamaseyya naabhiniviseyya. ^b^ki~ncii^eb^ti ki~nci ruupagata.m vedanaagata.m sa~n~naagata.m sa"nkhaaragata.m vi~n~naa.nagata.m. ^b^lokasmi^eb^nti apaayaloke...pe0... aayatanaloketi -- na ca mamaayetha ki~nci lokasmi.m.
[03] tenaaha bhagavaa --
[21] ``cakkhuuhi neva lolassa, gaamakathaaya aavaraye sota.m.
[22] rase ca naanugijjheyya, na ca mamaayetha ki~nci lokasmi''nti..
[21] ^b^phassena yadaa phu.t.thassa, parideva.m bhikkhu na kareyya kuhi~nci.^eb^
[22] ^b^bhava~nca naabhijappeyya, bheravesu ca na sampavedheyya.. ^eb^

[03] ^b^phassena^eb^ ^a^P2.0370^ea^ ^b^yadaa phu.t.thassaa^eb^ti. ^b^phasso^eb^ti rogaphasso. rogaphassena phu.t.tho pareto samohito samannaagato assa; cakkhurogena phu.t.tho pareto samohito samannaagato assa, sotarogena...pe0... ghaanarogena... jivhaarogena... kaayarogena... siisarogena... ka.n.narogena... mukharogena... dantarogena... kaasena... saasena... pinaasena... .daahena... jarena... kucchirogena... mucchaaya... pakkhandikaaya... suulaaya... visuucikaaya... ku.t.thena... ga.n.dena... kilaasena... sosena... apamaarena... dadduyaa... ka.n.duyaa ^a^T0.0448^ea^... kacchuyaa... rakhasaaya... vitacchikaaya... lohitena... pittena... madhumehena... a.msaaya... pi.lakaaya... bhagandalena... pittasamu.t.thaanena aabaadhena... semhasamu.t.thaanena aabaadhena... vaatasamu.t.thaanena aabaadhena... sannipaatikena aabaadhena... utupari.naamajena aabaadhena... visamaparihaarajena aabaadhena... opakkamikena aabaadhena... kammavipaakajena aabaadhena... siitena... u.nhena... jighacchaaya... pipaasaaya... uccaarena... passaavena... .da.msamakasavaataatapasariisapasamphassehi phu.t.tho pareto samohito samannaagato assaati -- phassena yadaa phu.t.thassa.

[01] ^b^parideva.m^eb^ ^a^V0.0273^ea^ ^b^bhikkhu na kareyya kuhi~ncii^eb^ti. aadeva.m parideva.m aadevana.m paridevana.m aadevitatta.m paridevitatta.m vaacaa palaapa.m vippalaapa.m laalappa.m laalappaayana.m laalappaayitatta.m na kareyya na janeyya na sa~njaneyya na ^a^M0.0289^ea^ nibbatteyya naabhinibbatteyya. ^b^kuhi~ncii^eb^ti kuhi~nci kimhici katthaci ajjhatta.m vaa bahiddhaa vaa ajjhattabahiddhaa vaati -- parideva.m bhikkhu na kareyya kuhi~nci.
[03] ^b^bhava~nca naabhijappeyyaa^eb^ti. kaamabhava.m na jappeyya, ruupabhava.m na jappeyya, aruupabhava.m na jappeyya na pajappeyya naabhijappeyyaati -- bhava~nca naabhijappeyya.

[03] ^b^bheravesu ca na sampavedheyyaa^eb^ti. ^b^bheravaa^eb^ti ekenaakaarena bhayampi bheravampi ta~n~neva. vutta~nheta.m ^a^P2.0371^ea^ bhagavataa -- ``eta.m nuuna ta.m bhaya.m bherava.m na jahe aagacchatii''ti. bahiddhaaramma.na.m vutta.m siihaa byagghaa ^a^T0.0449^ea^ diipii acchaa taracchaa kokaa mahi.msaa assaa hatthii ahi vicchikaa satapadii, coraa vaa assu maanavaa vaa katakammaa vaa akatakammaa vaa. athaaparena aakaarena bhaya.m vuccati ajjhattika.m cittasamu.t.thaana.m bhaya.m bhayaanaka.m chambhitatta.m lomaha.mso cetaso ubbego utraaso, jaatibhaya.m jaraabhaya.m byaadhibhaya.m mara.nabhaya.m raajabhaya.m corabhaya.m aggibhaya.m udakabhaya.m attaanuvaadabhaya.m paraanuvaadabhaya.m da.n.dabhaya.m duggatibhaya.m uumibhaya.m kumbhiilabhaya.m aava.t.tabhaya.m susukaabhaya.m {su.msukaabhaya.m (syaa0)} aajiivikabhaya.m asilokabhaya.m parisaaya saarajjabhaya.m madanabhaya.m duggatibhaya.m bhaya.m bhayaanaka.m chambhitatta.m lomaha.mso cetaso ubbego utraaso. ^b^bheravesu ca na sampavedheyyaa^eb^ti bherave passitvaa vaa su.nitvaa vaa na vedheyya na pavedheyya na sampavedheyya na taseyya na uttaseyya na paritaseyya na bhaayeyya na santaasa.m aapajjeyya, abhiiruu assa achambhii anutraasii apalaayii, pahiinabhayabheravo vigatalomaha.mso vihareyyaati -- bheravesu ca na sampavedheyya.
[03] tenaaha bhagavaa --
[21] ``phassena yadaa phu.t.thassa, parideva.m bhikkhu na kareyya kuhi~nci.
[22] bhava~nca naabhijappeyya, bheravesu ca na sampavedheyyaa''ti..
[21] ^b^annaanamatho paanaana.m, khaadaniiyaanamathopi vatthaana.m. ^eb^
[22] ^b^laddhaa^eb^ ^a^T0.0450^ea^ ^b^na sannidhi.m kayiraa, na ca parittase taani alabhamaano..^eb^

[03] ^b^annaanamatho^eb^ ^a^P2.0372^ea^ ^a^M0.0290^ea^ ^b^paanaana.m, khaadaniiyaanamathopi vatthaana^eb^nti. ^b^annaana^eb^nti odano kummaaso sattu maccho ma.msa.m. ^b^paanaana^eb^nti a.t.tha paanaani -- ambapaana.m, jambupaana.m, cocapaana.m, mocapaana.m, madhupaana.m ^a^V0.0274^ea^, muddikapaana.m, saalukapaana.m, phaarusakapaana.m. aparaanipi a.t.tha paanaani -- kosambapaana.m, kolapaana.m, badarapaana.m, ghatapaana.m, telapaana.m, payopaana.m, yaagupaana.m, rasapaana.m. ^b^khaadaniiyaana^eb^nti pi.t.thakhajjaka.m, puuvakhajjaka.m, muulakhajjaka.m, tacakhajjaka.m, pattakhajjaka.m, pupphakhajjaka.m, phalakhajjaka.m. ^b^vatthaana^eb^nti cha ciivaraani -- khoma.m, kappaasika.m, koseyya.m, kambala.m, saa.na.m, bha"nganti -- annaanamatho paanaana.m khaadaniiyaanamathopi vatthaana.m.

[03] ^b^laddhaa na sannidhi.m kayiraa^eb^ti. ^b^laddhaa^eb^ti laddhaa labhitvaa adhigantvaa vinditvaa pa.tilabhitvaa na kuhanaaya, na lapanaaya, na nemittikataaya, na nippesikataaya, na laabhena laabha.m nijigiisanataaya {nijigi.msanataaya (sii0 syaa0)}, na ka.t.thadaanena, na ve.ludaanena, na pattadaanena, na pupphadaanena, na phaladaanena, na sinaanadaanena, na cu.n.nadaanena, na mattikaadaanena, na dantaka.t.thadaanena, na mukhodakadaanena, na caa.tukamyataaya, na muggasuupyataaya {na muggasuppataaya (sii0), na muggasuupataaya (syaa0)}, na paaribha.tayayataaya, na pii.thamaddikataaya {pi.t.thima.msikataaya (sii0), pi.t.thimaddikataaya (ka0)}, na vatthuvijjaaya, na tiracchaanavijjaaya, na a"ngavijjaaya, na nakkhattavijjaaya, na duutagamanena, na pahi.nagamanena, na ja"nghapesaniyena, na vejjakammena, na navakammena, na pi.n.dapa.tipi.n.dakena, na ^a^T0.0451^ea^ daanaanuppadaanena dhammena samena laddhaa labhitvaa adhigantvaa vinditvaa pa.tilabhitvaati -- laddhaa. ^b^na sannidhi.m kayiraa^eb^ti annasannidhi.m paanasannidhi.m vatthasannidhi.m yaanasannidhi.m sayanasannidhi.m gandhasannidhi.m aamisasannidhi.m na kareyya na janeyya na sa~njaneyya na nibbatteyya naabhinibbatteyyaati -- laddhaa na sannidhi.m kayiraa.

[01] ^b^na ca parittase taani alabhamaano^eb^ti. anna.m vaa na labhaami ^a^P2.0373^ea^, paana.m vaa na labhaami, vattha.m vaa na labhaami, kula.m vaa na labhaami, ga.na.m vaa na labhaami, aavaasa.m vaa na labhaami, laabha.m vaa na labhaami, yasa.m vaa na labhaami, pasa.msa.m vaa na labhaami, sukha.m vaa na labhaami, ciivara.m vaa na labhaami, pi.n.dapaata.m vaa na labhaami, senaasana.m vaa na labhaami, gilaanapaccayabhesajjaparikkhaara.m vaa na labhaami, gilaanupa.t.thaaka.m vaa na labhaami, ``appa~n~naatomhii''ti na taseyya na uttaseyya na parittaseyya na bhaayeyya na santaasa.m aapajjeyya ^a^M0.0291^ea^, abhiiruu assa achambhii anutraasii apalaayii, pahiinabhayabheravo vigatalomaha.mso vihareyyaati -- na ca parittase taani alabhamaano.
[01] tenaaha bhagavaa --
[21] ``annaanamatho paanaana.m, khaadaniiyaanamathopi vatthaana.m.
[22] laddhaa na sannidhi.m kayiraa, na ca parittase taani alabhamaano''ti..
[21] ^b^jhaayii^eb^ ^a^T0.0452^ea^ ^a^V0.0275^ea^ ^b^na paadalolassa, virame kukkuccaa nappamajjeyya. ^eb^
[22] ^b^athaasanesu sayanesu, appasaddesu bhikkhu vihareyya.. ^eb^

[03] ^b^jhaayii na paadalolassaa^eb^ti. ^b^jhaayii^eb^ti pa.thamenapi jhaanena jhaayii, dutiyenapi jhaanena jhaayii, tatiyenapi jhaanena jhaayii, catutthenapi jhaanena jhaayii, savitakkasavicaarenapi jhaanena jhaayii, avitakkavicaaramattenapi jhaanena jhaayii, avitakkaavicaarenapi jhaanena jhaayii, sappiitikenapi jhaanena jhaayii, nippiitikenapi jhaanena jhaayii, piitisahagatenapi jhaanena jhaayii, saatasahagatenapi jhaanena jhaayii, sukhasahagatenapi jhaanena jhaayii, upekkhaasahagatenapi jhaanena jhaayii, su~n~natenapi jhaanena jhaayii, animittenapi jhaanena jhaayii, appa.nihitenapi jhaanena jhaayii, lokiyenapi jhaanena jhaayii, lokuttarenapi jhaanena jhaayii, jhaanarato ekattamanuyutto paramatthagarukoti {sadatthagarukoti (sii0 syaa0)} -- jhaayii.

[03] ^b^na^eb^ ^a^P2.0374^ea^ ^b^paadalolassaa^eb^ti. katha.m paadalolo hoti? idhekacco paadaloliyena samannaagato hoti aaraamena aaraama.m uyyaanena uyyaana.m gaamena gaama.m nigamena nigama.m nagarena nagara.m ra.t.thena ra.t.tha.m janapadena janapada.m diighacaarika.m anava.t.thitacaarika.m anuyutto viharati. evampi paadalolo hoti.

[03] atha vaa bhikkhu antopisa"nghaaraame paadaloliyena samannaagato hoti. na atthahetu na kaara.nahetu uddhato avuupasantacitto ^a^T0.0453^ea^ parive.nato parive.na.m gacchati vihaarato vihaara.m gacchati a.d.dhayogato ^a^M0.0292^ea^ a.d.dhayoga.m gacchati paasaadato paasaada.m gacchati hammiyato hammiya.m gacchati guhaaya guha.m gacchati le.nato le.na.m gacchati ku.tito ku.ti.m gacchati kuu.taagaarato kuu.taagaara.m gacchati a.t.tato a.t.ta.m gacchati maa.lato maa.la.m gacchati udda.n.dato udda.n.da.m gacchati upa.t.thaanasaalato upa.t.thaanasaala.m gacchati ma.n.dalamaa.lato ma.n.dalamaa.la.m gacchati rukkhamuulato rukkhamuula.m gacchati. yattha vaa pana bhikkhuu nisiidanti tahi.m gacchati, tattha ekassa vaa dutiyo hoti, dvinna.m vaa tatiyo hoti, ti.n.na.m vaa catuttho hoti. tattha bahu.m samphappalaapa.m palapati, seyyathida.m -- raajakatha.m corakatha.m mahaamattakatha.m senaakatha.m bhayakatha.m yuddhakatha.m annakatha.m paanakatha.m vatthakatha.m yaanakatha.m sayanakatha.m maalaakatha.m gandhakatha.m ~naatikatha.m gaamakatha.m nigamakatha.m nagarakatha.m janapadakatha.m itthikatha.m suurakatha.m visikhaakatha.m kumbha.t.thaanakatha.m pubbapetakatha.m naanattakatha.m lokakkhaayika.m samuddakkhaayika.m iti bhavaabhavakatha.m iti vaa. evampi paadalolo hoti.

[03] ^b^na^eb^ ^a^V0.0276^ea^ ^b^paadalolassaa^eb^ti. paadaloliya.m pajaheyya vinodeyya byanti.m kareyya anabhaava.m gameyya, paadaloliyaa aarato assa virato pa.tivirato ^a^P2.0375^ea^ nikkhanto nissa.to vippamutto visa~n~nutto vimariyaadikatena cetasaa vihareyya careyya vicareyya iriyeyya vatteyya paaleyya yapeyya yaapeyya, pa.tisallaanaaraamo assa pa.tisallaanarato ajjhatta.m cetosamathamanuyutto ^a^T0.0454^ea^ aniraakatajjhaano vipassanaa samannaagato bruuhetaa su~n~naagaaraana.m jhaayii jhaanarato ekattamanuyutto paramatthagarukoti -- jhaayii na paadalolassa.

[03] ^b^virame kukkuccaa nappamajjeyyaa^eb^ti. ^b^kukkucca^eb^nti hatthakukkuccampi kukkucca.m, paadakukkuccampi kukkucca.m, hatthapaadakukkuccampi kukkucca.m, akappiye kappiyasa~n~nitaa, kappiye akappiyasa~n~nitaa, avajje vajjasa~n~nitaa, vajje avajjasa~n~nitaa, ya.m evaruupa.m kukkucca.m kukkuccaayanaa kukkuccaayitatta.m cetaso vippa.tisaaro manovilekho -- ida.m vuccati kukkucca.m.

[03] api ca dviihi kaara.nehi uppajjati kukkucca.m cetaso vippa.tisaaro manovilekho -- katattaa ca akatattaa ca. katha.m katattaa ca akatattaa ca uppajjati kukkucca.m cetaso vippa.tisaaro manovilekho? ``kata.m me kaayaduccarita.m, akata.m me kaayasucarita''nti uppajjati kukkucca.m cetaso ^a^M0.0293^ea^ vippa.tisaaro manovilekho, ``kata.m me vaciiduccarita.m, akata.m me vaciisucarita''nti uppajjati kukkucca.m cetaso vippa.tisaaro manovilekho, ``kata.m me manoduccarita.m, akata.m me manosucaritanti...pe0... ``kato me paa.naatipaato, akataa me paa.naatipaataa verama.nii''ti uppajjati kukkucca.m...pe0... manovilekho, ``kata.m me adinnaadaana.m... kato me kaamesumicchaacaaro... kato me musaavaado... kataa me pisu.navaacaa... kataa me pharusavaacaa... kato me samphappalaapo... kataa me abhijjhaa... kato me byaapaado... kataa me micchaadi.t.thi, akataa me sammaadi.t.thii''ti uppajjati kukkucca.m cetaso vippa.tisaaro manovilekho ^a^T0.0455^ea^. eva.m katattaa ca akatattaa ca uppajjati kukkucca.m cetaso vippa.tisaaro manovilekho.

[03] atha vaa ``siilesumhi ^a^P2.0376^ea^ na paripuurakaarii''ti uppajjati kukkucca.m cetaso vippa.tisaaro manovilekho, ``indriyesumhi aguttadvaaro''ti...pe0... ``bhojane amatta~n~numhii''ti... ``jaagariya.m ananuyuttomhii''ti... ``na satisampaja~n~nena samannaagatomhii''ti... ``abhaavitaa me cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa''ti... ``abhaavitaa me cattaaro sammappadhaanaa''ti... ``abhaavitaa me cattaaro ^a^V0.0277^ea^ iddhipaadaa''ti... ``abhaavitaani me pa~ncindriyaanii''ti... ``abhaavitaani me pa~nca balaanii''ti... ``abhaavitaa me satta bojjha"ngaa''ti... ``abhaavito me ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo''ti... ``dukkha.m me apari~n~naata''nti... ``samudayo me appahiino''ti... ``maggo me abhaavito''ti... ``nirodho me asacchikato''ti uppajjati kukkucca.m cetaso vippa.tisaaro manovilekho. ^b^virame kukkuccaa^eb^ti kukkuccaa aarameyya virameyya pa.tivirameyya kukkucca.m pajaheyya vinodeyya byanti.m kareyya anabhaava.m gameyya. kukkuccaa aarato assa virato pa.tivirato nikkhanto nissa.to vippamutto visa~n~nutto vimariyaadikatena cetasaa vihareyyaati -- virame kukkuccaa.

[03] ^b^nappamajjeyyaa^eb^ti sakkaccakaarii assa saataccakaarii a.t.thitakaarii anoliinavuttiko anikkhittacchando anikkhittadhuro appamaado kusalesu dhammesu. ``kadaaha.m aparipuura.m vaa siilakkhandha.m paripuureyya.m, paripuura.m vaa siilakkhandha.m tattha tattha pa~n~naaya anugga.nheyya''nti? yo tattha chando ca vaayaamo ca ussaaho ca usso.lhii ca thaamo ca appa.tivaanii ca sati ^a^T0.0456^ea^ ca sampaja~n~na~nc aatappa.m padhaana.m adhi.t.thaana.m anuyogo appamaado kusalesu dhammesu ^a^M0.0294^ea^. ``kadaaha.m aparipuura.m vaa samaadhikkhandha.m...pe0... pa~n~naakkhandha.m... vimuttikkhandha.m... vimutti~naa.nadassanakkhandha.m... kadaaha.m apari~n~naata.m vaa dukkha.m parijaaneyya.m, appahiine vaa kilese pajaheyya.m, abhaavita.m vaa magga.m bhaaveyya.m, asacchikata.m vaa nirodha.m sacchikareyya''nti? yo tattha chando ca vaayaamo ca ussaaho ca usso.lhii ca thaamo ca appa.tivaanii ca sati ca sampaja~n~na~nc aatappa.m ^a^P2.0377^ea^ padhaana.m adhi.t.thaana.m anuyogo appamaado kusalesu dhammesuuti -- virame kukkuccaa nappamajjeyya.

[03] ^b^athaasanesu sayanesu, appasaddesu bhikkhu vihareyyaa^eb^ti. ^b^athaa^eb^ti padasandhi...pe0... aasana.m vuccati yattha nisiidati -- ma~nco pii.tha.m bhisi ta.t.tikaa cammakha.n.do ti.nasanthaaro pa.n.nasanthaaro palaalasanthaaro. sayana.m vuccati senaasana.m vihaaro a.d.dhayogo paasaado hammiya.m guhaati -- athaasanesu sayanesu.

[03] ^b^appasaddesu bhikkhu vihareyyaa^eb^ti. appasaddesu appanigghosesu vijanavaatesu manussaraahasseyyakesu pa.tisallaanasaaruppesu senaasanesu careyya vicareyya vihareyya iriyeyya vatteyya paaleyya yapeyya yaapeyyaati -- athaasanesu sayanesu appasaddesu bhikkhu vihareyya.
[03] tenaaha ^a^V0.0278^ea^ bhagavaa --
[21] ``jhaayii na paadalolassa, virame kukkuccaa nappamajjeyya.
[22] athaasanesu ^a^T0.0457^ea^ sayanesu, appasaddesu bhikkhu vihareyyaa''ti..
[21] ^b^nidda.m na bahuliikareyya, jaagariya.m bhajeyya aataapii. ^eb^
[22] ^b^tandi.m maaya.m hassa.m khi.d.da.m, methuna.m vippajahe savibhuusa.m.. ^eb^
[03] ^b^nidda.m na bahuliikareyyaa^eb^ti. rattindiva.m chako.t.thaasa.m kaaretvaa pa~ncako.t.thaasa.m pa.tipajjeyya ekako.t.thaasa.m nippajjeyyaati -- nidda.m na bahuliikareyya.

[03] ^b^jaagariya.m bhajeyya aataapii^eb^ti. idha bhikkhu divasa.m ca"nkamena nisajjaaya aavara.niiyehi dhammehi citta.m parisodheyya, rattiyaa pa.thama.m yaama.m ca"nkamena nisajjaaya aavara.niiyehi dhammehi citta.m parisodheyya, rattiyaa majjhima.m ^a^P2.0378^ea^ yaama.m ^a^M0.0295^ea^ dakkhi.nena passena siihaseyya.m kappeyya paadepaada.m accaadhaaya sato sampajaano u.t.thaanasa~n~na.m manasikaritvaa, rattiyaa pacchima.m yaama.m paccu.t.thaaya ca"nkamena nisajjaaya aavara.niiyehi dhammehi citta.m parisodheyya.
[03] ^b^jaagariya.m bhajeyyaa^eb^ti jaagariya.m bhajeyya sambhajeyya seveyya niseveyya sa.mseveyya pa.tiseveyyaati -- jaagariya.m bhajeyya.

[03] ^b^aataapii^eb^ti. aatappa.m vuccati viiriya.m {viriya.m (sii0 syaa0)}. yo cetasiko viiriyaarambho nikkamo parakkamo uyyaamo vaayaamo ussaaho usso.lhii thaamo .thiti asithilaparakkamataa anikkhittacchandataa anikkhittadhurataa dhurasampaggaho viiriya.m ^a^T0.0458^ea^ viiriyindriya.m viiriyabala.m sammaavaayaamo. iminaa aataapena upeto samupeto upagato samupagato upapanno samupapanno samannaagato so vuccati aataapiiti -- jaagariya.m bhajeyya aataapii.

[03] ^b^tandi.m maaya.m hassa.m khi.d.da.m, methuna.m vippajahe savibhuusa^eb^nti. ^b^tandii^eb^ti {tandinti (sii0)} tandii tandiyanaa tandiyitatta.m {natthi attada.n.dasuttaniddese khuddakavatthuvibha"ngepi} tandimanakataa aalasya.m aalasyaayanaa aalasyaayitatta.m. maayaa vuccati va~ncanikaa cariyaa. idhekacco kaayena duccarita.m caritvaa...pe0... vaacaaya manasaa duccarita.m caritvaa tassa pa.ticchaadanahetu paapika.m iccha.m pa.nidahati. maa ma.m ja~n~naati {ja~n~nuuti (ka0)} icchati, maa ma.m ja~n~naati sa"nkappeti, maa ma.m ja~n~naati vaaca.m bhaasati, maa ma.m ja~n~naati kaayena parakkamati. yaa evaruupaa ^a^V0.0279^ea^ maayaavitaa accasaraa va~ncanaa nikati nikira.naa parihara.naa guuhanaa pariguuhanaa chaadanaa paricchaadanaa {pa.ticchaadanaa (sii0 ka0) mahaaniddese} anuttaaniikamma.m anaavikamma.m vocchaadanaa paapakiriyaa -- aya.m vuccati maayaa. ^b^hassa^eb^nti idhekacco ativela.m dantavida.msaka.m hasati. vutta~nheta.m bhagavataa -- ``kumaarakamida.m, bhikkhave ^a^P2.0379^ea^, ariyassa vinaye yadida.m ativela.m dantavida.msaka.m hasita''nti.

[03] ^b^khi.d.daa^eb^ti dve khi.d.daa -- kaayikaa ca khi.d.daa vaacasikaa ca khi.d.daa. katamaa kaayikaa khi.d.daa? hatthiihipi kii.lanti, assehipi kii.lanti, rathehipi kii.lanti, dhanuuhipi kii.lanti, a.t.thapadehipi kii.lanti, dasapadehipi kii.lanti, aakaasepi kii.lanti, parihaarapathepi kii.lanti, santikaayapi kii.lanti ^a^T0.0459^ea^, khalikaayapi kii.lanti, gha.tikaayapi kii.lanti, salaakahatthenapi kii.lanti, akkhenapi kii.lanti, pa"nkaciirenapi kii.lanti ^a^M0.0296^ea^, va"nkakenapi kii.lanti, mokkhacikaayapi kii.lanti, ci"ngulakenapi kii.lanti, pattaa.lhakenapi kii.lanti, rathakenapi kii.lanti, dhanukenapi kii.lanti, akkharikaayapi kii.lanti, manesikaayapi kii.lanti, yathaavajjenapi kii.lanti -- aya.m kaayikaa khi.d.daa. katamaa vaacasikaa khi.d.daa? mukhabherika.m {mukhabheriya.m (syaa0)} mukhaalambara.m mukha.di.n.dimaka.m {mukhade.n.dimaka.m (sii0 syaa0)} mukhavalimaka.m mukhabheru.laka.m {mukhabherulaka.m (sii0)} mukhadaddarika.m naa.taka.m laapa.m giita.m davakamma.m -- aya.m vaacasikaa khi.d.daa.

[03] methunadhammo naama yo so asaddhammo gaamadhammo vasaladhammo du.t.thullo odakantiko rahasso dvaya.mdvayasamaapatti. ki.mkaara.naa vuccati methunadhammo? ubhinna.m rattaana.m saarattaana.m avassutaana.m pariyu.t.thitaana.m pariyaadinnacittaana.m ubhinna.m sadisaana.m dhammoti, ta.mkaara.naa vuccati methunadhammo. yathaa ubho kalahakaarakaa methunakaati vuccanti, ubho bha.n.danakaarakaa...pe0... ubho bhassakaarakaa... ubho adhikara.nakaarakaa... ubho vivaadakaarakaa... ubho vaadino... ubho sallaapakaa methunakaati vuccanti ^a^P2.0380^ea^; evameva ubhinna.m rattaana.m saarattaana.m avassutaana.m pariyu.t.thitaana.m pariyaadinnacittaana.m ubhinna.m sadisaana.m dhammoti, ta.mkaara.naa vuccati methunadhammo.

[03] ^b^vibhuusaa^eb^ti dve vibhuusaa -- atthi agaariyassa vibhuusaa, atthi pabbajitassa vibhuusaa. katamaa agaariyassa vibhuusaa? kesaa ca massu ca maalaa ca gandhaa ^a^T0.0460^ea^ ca vilepanaa ca aabhara.naa ca pilandhanaa ca vattha~nca sayanaasana~nca ve.thana~nca ucchaadana.m parimaddana.m nhaapana.m sambaahana.m aadaasa.m a~njana.m maalaavilepana.m mukhacu.n.naka.m mukhalepa.m hatthabandha.m sikhaabandha.m {vasikkhaabandha.m (syaa0)} da.n.danaa.liya.m khagga.m chatta.m citraa upaahanaa u.nhiisa.m ma.ni.m vaa.labiijani.m odaataani vatthaani diighadasaani iti vaa -- aya.m agaariyassa vibhuusaa. katamaa pabbajitassa vibhuusaa? ciivarama.n.danaa ^a^V0.0280^ea^ pattama.n.danaa senaasanama.n.danaa imassa vaa puutikaayassa baahiraana.m vaa parikkhaaraana.m ma.n.danaa vibhuusanaa ke.lanaa parike.lanaa gedhitataa gedhitatta.m capalataa caapalya.m -- aya.m pabbajitassa vibhuusaa.

[03] ^b^tandi.m maaya.m hassa.m khi.d.da.m, methuna.m vippajahe savibhuusa^eb^nti. tandi~nca maaya~nca hassa~nca khi.d.da~nca methunadhamma~nca savibhuusa.m saparivaara.m saparibha.n.da.m saparikkhaara.m pajaheyya vinodeyya byanti.m kareyya anabhaava.m gameyyaati -- tandi.m maaya.m hassa.m khi.d.da.m, methuna.m vippajahe savibhuusa.m.
[03] tenaaha bhagavaa --
[21] ``nidda.m ^a^M0.0297^ea^ na bahuliikareyya, jaagariya.m bhajeyya aataapii.
[22] tandi.m maaya.m hassa.m khi.d.da.m, methuna.m vippajahe savibhuusa''nti..
[21] ^b^aathabba.na.m^eb^ ^a^P2.0381^ea^ ^b^supina.m lakkha.na.m, no vidahe athopi nakkhatta.m.^eb^
[22] ^b^viruta~nca^eb^ ^a^T0.0461^ea^ ^b^gabbhakara.na.m, tikiccha.m maamako na seveyya.. ^eb^

[03] ^b^aathabba.na.m supina.m lakkha.na.m, no vidahe athopi nakkhatta^eb^nti. aathabba.nikaa aathabba.na.m payojenti, nagare vaa ruddhe {rundhe (ka0)} sa"ngaame vaa paccupa.t.thite parasenapaccatthikesu paccaamittesu iiti.m uppaadenti, upaddava.m uppaadenti, roga.m uppaadenti, pajjaraka.m karonti, suula.m karonti, visuucika.m karonti, pakkhandika.m karonti. eva.m aathabba.nikaa aathabba.na.m payojenti.

[03] supinapaa.thakaa supina.m aadisanti, yo pubba.nhasamaya.m supina.m passati, eva.m vipaako hoti. yo majjhanhikasamaya.m {majjhantikasamaya.m (bahuusu)} supina.m passati, eva.m vipaako hoti. yo saayanhasamaya.m supina.m passati, eva.m vipaako hoti. yo purime yaame...pe0... yo majjhime yaame... yo pacchime yaame... yo dakkhi.nena passena nipanno... yo vaamena passena nipanno... yo uttaana.m nipanno... yo avakujja nipanno... yo canda.m passati... yo suuriya.m passati... yo mahaasamudda.m passati... yo sineru.m pabbataraajaana.m passati... yo hatthi.m passati... yo assa.m passati... yo ratha.m passati... yo patti.m passati... yo senaabyuuha.m passati... yo aaraamaraama.neyyaka.m passati... yo vanaraama.neyyaka.m passati... yo bhuumiraama.neyyaka.m passati... yo pokkhara.niiraama.neyyaka.m {pokkhara.niraama.neyyaka.m (syaa0)} passati, eva.m vipaako hotiiti. eva.m supinapaa.thakaa supina.m aadisanti.

[03] lakkha.napaa.thakaa ^a^V0.0281^ea^ lakkha.na.m aadisanti -- ma.nilakkha.na.m da.n.dalakkha.na.m ^a^T0.0462^ea^ vatthalakkha.na.m asilakkha.na.m usulakkha.na.m dhanulakkha.na.m aavudhalakkha.na.m itthilakkha.na.m purisalakkha.na.m kumaarikaalakkha.na.m kumaaralakkha.na.m daasilakkha.na.m daasalakkha.na.m hatthilakkha.na.m assalakkha.na.m mahi.msalakkha.na.m usabhalakkha.na.m go.nalakkha.na.m ^a^M0.0298^ea^ ajalakkha.na.m me.n.dalakkha.na.m ^a^P2.0382^ea^ kukku.talakkha.na.m va.t.talakkha.na.m godhaalakkha.na.m ka.n.nikaalakkha.na.m kacchapalakkha.na.m migalakkha.na.m iti vaati. eva.m lakkha.napaa.thakaa lakkha.na.m aadisanti.

[03] nakkhattapaa.thakaa nakkhatta.m aadisanti. a.t.thaviisati nakkhattaani. iminaa nakkhattena gharappaveso kattabbo, iminaa nakkhattena maku.ta.m bandhitabba.m, iminaa nakkhattena vaareyya.m kaaretabba.m, iminaa nakkhattena biijaniihaaro {biijanihaaro (syaa0 ka0)} kattabbo, iminaa nakkhattena sa.mvaaso {gharavaaso (syaa0)} gantabboti. eva.m nakkhattapaa.thakaa nakkhatta.m aadisanti.

[03] ^b^aathabba.na.m supina.m lakkha.na.m, no vidahe athopi nakkhatta^eb^nti. aathabba.na~nca supina~nca lakkha.na~nca nakkhatta~nca no vidaheyya na careyya na samaacareyya na samaadaaya vatteyya. atha vaa na ga.nheyya na ugga.nheyya na dhaareyya na upadhaareyya na upalakkheyya nappayojeyyaati -- aathabba.na.m supina.m lakkha.na.m, no vidahe athopi nakkhatta.m.

[03] ^b^viruta~nca gabbhakara.na.m, tikiccha.m maamako na seveyyaa^eb^ti. viruta.m vuccati migavaakka.m. migavaakkapaa.thakaa {migacakka.m. migacakkapaa.thakaa (syaa0)} migavaakka.m aadisanti -- sakuntaana.m vaa catuppadaana.m vaa ruta.m {ruda.m (syaa0)} vassita.m jaanantiiti. eva.m migavaakkapaa.thakaa migavaakka.m aadisanti. gabbhakara.niiyaa gabbha.m sa.n.thaapenti. dviihi ^a^T0.0463^ea^ kaara.nehi gabbho na sa.n.thaati -- paa.nakehi vaa vaatakuppehi vaa. paa.nakaana.m vaa vaatakuppaana.m vaa pa.tighaataaya osadha.m dentiiti. eva.m gabbhakara.niiyaa gabbha.m sa.n.thaapenti. ^b^tikicchaa^eb^ti pa~nca tikicchaa -- saalaakiya.m, sallakattiya.m, kaayatikiccha.m, bhuutiya.m, komaarabhacca.m. ^b^maamako^eb^ti buddhamaamako dhammamaamako sa"nghamaamako, so vaa bhagavanta.m mamaayati bhagavaa vaa ta.m puggala.m parigga.nhaati. vutta~nheta.m ^a^P2.0383^ea^ bhagavataa -- ``ye te, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu kuhaa thaddhaa lapaa si"ngii unna.laa asamaahitaa na me te, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu maamakaa, apagataa ca te, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu imasmaa dhammavinayaa, na ca te bhikkhuu imasmi.m dhammavinaye vuddhi.m viruu.lhi.m vepulla.m aapajjanti. ye ca kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu nikkuhaa nillapaa dhiiraa atthaddhaa susamaahitaa te kho me, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu maamakaa na ca apagataa te ^a^V0.0282^ea^, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu imasmaa dhammavinayaa, te ca bhikkhuu imasmi.m dhammavinaye vuddhi.m viruu.lhi.m vepulla.m aapajjanti''.
[21] ``kuhaa ^a^M0.0299^ea^ thaddhaa lapaa si"ngii, unna.laa asamaahitaa.
[22] na te dhamme viruuhanti, sammaasambuddhadesite..
[21] ``nikkuhaa nillapaa dhiiraa, atthaddhaa susamaahitaa.
[22] te ve dhamme viruuhanti, sammaasambuddhadesite''..

[03] ^b^viruta~nca gabbhakara.na.m, tikiccha.m maamako na seveyyaa^eb^ti. viruta~nca gabbhakara.na~nca tikiccha~nca maamako na seveyya na niseveyya na sa.mseveyya nappa.tiseveyya na careyya na samaacareyya na samaadaaya vatteyya. atha ^a^T0.0464^ea^ vaa na ga.nheyya na ugga.nheyya na dhaareyya na upadhaareyya na upalakkheyya nappayojeyyaati -- viruta~nca gabbhakara.na.m tikiccha.m maamako na seveyya.
[03] tenaaha bhagavaa --
[21] ``aathabba.na.m supina.m lakkha.na.m, no vidahe athopi nakkhatta.m.
[22] viruta~nca gabbhakara.na.m, tikiccha.m maamako na seveyyaa''ti..
[21] ^b^nindaaya^eb^ ^a^P2.0384^ea^ ^b^nappavedheyya, na unnameyya pasa.msito bhikkhu.^eb^
[22] ^b^lobha.m saha macchariyena, kodha.m pesu.niya~nca panudeyya.. ^eb^

[03] ^b^nindaaya nappavedheyyaa^eb^ti. idhekacce bhikkhuu nindanti jaatiyaa vaa gottena vaa kolaputtiyena vaa va.n.napokkharataaya vaa dhanena vaa ajjhenena vaa kammaayatanena vaa sippaayatanena vaa vijjaa.t.thaanena vaa sutena vaa pa.tibhaanena vaa a~n~natara~n~natarena vaa vatthunaa nindanti garahanti upavadanti, nindito garahito upavadito nindaaya garahaaya upavaadena akittiyaa ava.n.nahaarikaaya na vedheyya nappavedheyya na sampavedheyya na taseyya na uttaseyya na paritaseyya na bhaayeyya na santaasa.m aapajjeyya, abhiiruu assa achambhii anutraasii apalaayii, pahiinabhayabheravo vigatalomaha.mso vihareyyaati ^a^T0.0465^ea^ -- nindaaya nappavedheyya.

[03] ^b^na^eb^ ^a^V0.0283^ea^ ^b^unnameyya pasa.msito bhikkhuu^eb^ti. idhekacce bhikkhuu pasa.msanti jaatiyaa vaa gottena vaa kolaputtiyena vaa va.n.napokkharataaya vaa dhanena vaa ajjhenena vaa kammaayatanena vaa sippaayatanena vaa vijjaa.t.thaanena vaa ^a^M0.0300^ea^ sutena vaa pa.tibhaanena vaa a~n~natara~n~natarena vaa vatthunaa pasa.msanti thomenti kittenti va.n.nenti, pasa.msito thomito kittito va.n.nito pasa.msaaya thomanena kittiyaa va.n.nahaarikaaya unnati.m na kareyya unnama.m na kareyya maana.m na kareyya thambha.m na kareyya, na tena maana.m janeyya na tena thaddho assa patthaddho paggahitasiroti -- na unnameyya pasa.msito bhikkhu.

[03] ^b^lobha.m saha macchariyena, kodha.m pesu.niya~nca panudeyyaa^eb^ti. ^b^lobho^eb^ti yo lobho lubbhanaa lubbhitatta.m saaraago saarajjanaa saarajjitatta.m abhijjhaa lobho akusalamuula.m. ^b^macchariya^eb^nti pa~nca macchariyaani -- aavaasamacchariya.m...pe0... gaaho vuccati macchariya.m. ^b^kodho^eb^ti yo cittassa aaghaato pa.tighaato pa.tigha.m pa.tivirodho, kopo pakopo sampakopo, doso padoso sampadoso, cittassa byaapatti manopadoso, kodho kujjhanaa kujjhitatta.m, doso dussanaa dussitatta.m, byaapatti.m byaapajjanaa byaapajjitatta.m, virodho ^a^P2.0385^ea^ pa.tivirodho ca.n.dikka.m asuropo anattamanataa cittassa. ^b^pesu~n~na^eb^nti idhekacco pisu.navaaco hoti ito sutvaa amutra akkhaataa imesa.m bhedaaya, amutra vaa sutvaa imesa.m akkhaataa amuusa.m bhedaaya. iti samaggaana.m vaa bhettaa bhinnaana.m vaa anuppadaataa, vaggaaraamo vaggarato vagganandii vaggakara.ni.m ^a^T0.0466^ea^ vaaca.m bhaasitaa hoti -- ida.m vuccati pesu~n~na.m.

[03] api ca dviihi kaara.nehi pesu~n~na.m upasa.mharati -- piyakamyataaya vaa bhedaadhippaayena vaa. katha.m piyakamyataaya pesu~n~na.m upasa.mharati? imassa piyo bhavissaami manaapo bhavissaami vissaasiko bhavissaami abbhantariko bhavissaami suhadayo bhavissaamiiti. eva.m piyakamyataaya pesu~n~na.m upasa.mharati. katha.m bhedaadhippaayena pesu~n~na.m upasa.mharati? katha.m ime naanaa assu vinaa assu vaggaa assu dvedhaa assu dvejjhaa assu dve pakkhaa assu bhijjheyyu.m na samaagaccheyyu.m dukkha.m na phaasu vihareyyunti. eva.m bhedaadhippaayena pesu~n~na.m upasa.mharati. ^b^lobha.m saha macchariyena, kodha.m pesu.niya~nca panudeyyaa^eb^ti. lobha~nca macchariya~nca kodha~nca pesu~n~na~nca nudeyya panudeyya pajaheyya vinodeyya byanti.m kareyya anabhaava.m gameyyaati -- lobha.m saha macchariyena, kodha.m pesu.niya~nca panudeyya.
[03] tenaaha ^a^V0.0284^ea^ bhagavaa --
[21] ``nindaaya ^a^M0.0301^ea^ nappavedheyya, na unnameyya pasa.msito bhikkhu.
[22] lobha.m saha macchariyena, kodha.m pesu.niya~nca panudeyyaa''ti..
[21] ^b^kayavikkaye na ti.t.theyya, upavaada.m bhikkhu na kareyya kuhi~nci.^eb^
[22] ^b^gaame ca naabhisajjeyya, laabhakamyaa jana.m na lapayeyya.. ^eb^

[03] ^b^kayavikkaye^eb^ ^a^T0.0467^ea^ ^a^P2.0386^ea^ ^b^na ti.t.theyyaa^eb^ti. ye kayavikkayaa vinaye pa.tikkhittaa na te imasmi.m atthe adhippetaa. katha.m kayavikkaye ti.t.thati? pa~ncanna.m saddhi.m patta.m vaa ciivara.m vaa a~n~na.m vaa ki~nci parikkhaara.m va~ncaniya.m vaa karonto udaya.m vaa patthayanto parivatteti. eva.m kayavikkaye ti.t.thati. katha.m kayavikkaye na ti.t.thati? pa~ncanna.m saddhi.m patta.m vaa ciivara.m vaa a~n~na.m vaa ki~nci parikkhaara.m na va~ncaniya.m vaa karonto na udaya.m vaa patthayanto parivatteti. eva.m kayavikkaye na ti.t.thati. ^b^kayavikkaye na ti.t.theyyaa^eb^ti. kayavikkaye na ti.t.theyya na santi.t.theyya, kayavikkaya.m pajaheyya vinodeyya byanti.m kareyya anabhaava.m gameyya, kayavikkayaa aarato assa virato pa.tivirato nikkhanto nissa.to vippamutto visa~n~nutto vimariyaadikatena cetasaa vihareyyaati -- kayavikkaye na ti.t.theyya.

[03] ^b^upavaada.m bhikkhu na kareyya kuhi~ncii^eb^ti. katame upavaadakaraati kilesaa? santeke sama.nabraahma.naa iddhimanto dibbacakkhukaa paracittaviduno, te duuratopi passanti aasannaapi na dissanti cetasaapi citta.m pajaananti, devataapi kho santi iddhimantiniyo dibbacakkhukaa paracittaviduniyo, taa duuratopi passanti, aasannaapi na dissanti cetasaapi citta.m pajaananti. te o.laarikehi vaa kilesehi majjhimehi vaa kilesehi sukhumehi vaa kilesehi upavadeyyu.m. katame o.laarikaa kilesaa? kaayaduccarita.m vaciiduccarita.m manoduccarita.m -- ime ^a^T0.0468^ea^ vuccanti o.laarikaa kilesaa. katame majjhimaa kilesaa? kaamavitakko byaapaadavitakko vihi.msaavitakko -- ime vuccanti majjhimaa kilesaa. katame sukhumaa kilesaa? ~naativitakko, janapadavitakko, aparavitakko, paraanudayataa pa.tisa~n~nutto vitakko ^a^M0.0302^ea^, laabhasakkaarasilokapa.tisa~n~nutto vitakko, anava~n~nattipa.tisa~n~nutto vitakko -- ime vuccanti sukhumaa kilesaa. te o.laarikehi vaa kilesehi majjhimehi vaa kilesehi sukhumehi vaa kilesehi na upavadeyya upavaada.m na kareyya upavaadakare kilese na kareyya na janeyya na sa~njaneyya na nibbatteyya naabhinibbatteyya, upavaadakare kilese pajaheyya vinodeyya ^a^V0.0285^ea^ ^a^P2.0387^ea^ byanti.m kareyya anabhaava.m gameyya, upavaadakarehi kilesehi aarato assa virato pa.tivirato nikkhanto nissa.to vippamutto visa~n~nutto vimariyaadikatena cetasaa vihareyya. ^b^kuhi~ncii^eb^ti kuhi~nci kimhici katthaci ajjhatta.m vaa bahiddhaa vaa ajjhattabahiddhaa vaati -- upavaada.m bhikkhu na kareyya kuhi~nci.

[03] ^b^gaame ca naabhisajjeyyaa^eb^ti. katha.m gaame sajjati? idha bhikkhu gaame gihiihi sa.msa.t.tho viharati sahanandii sahasokii sukhitesu sukhito dukkhitesu dukkhito, uppannesu kiccakara.niiyesu attanaa voyoga.m aapajjati. evampi gaame sajjati.

[03] atha vaa bhikkhu pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya gaama.m vaa nigama.m vaa pi.n.daaya pavisati arakkhiteneva kaayena arakkhitaaya vaacaaya arakkhitena cittena anupa.t.thitaaya ^a^T0.0469^ea^ satiyaa asa.mvutehi indriyehi. so tatra tatra sajjati tatra tatra ga.nhaati tatra tatra bajjhati tatra tatra anayabyasana.m aapajjati. evampi gaame sajjati.

[03] katha.m gaame na sajjati? idha bhikkhu gaame gihiihi asa.msa.t.tho viharati na sahanandii na sahasokii na sukhitesu sukhito na dukkhitesu dukkhito, uppannesu kiccakara.niiyesu na attanaa voyoga.m aapajjati. evampi gaame na sajjati.

[03] atha vaa bhikkhu pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya gaama.m vaa nigama.m vaa pi.n.daaya pavisati rakkhiteneva kaayena rakkhitaaya vaacaaya rakkhitena cittena upa.t.thitaaya satiyaa sa.mvutehi indriyehi. so tatra tatra na sajjati tatra tatra na ga.nhaati tatra tatra na bajjhati tatra tatra na anayabyasana.m aapajjati. evampi gaame na sajjati. ^b^gaame ca naabhisajjeyyaa^eb^ti gaame na sajjeyya na ga.nheyya na bajjheyya na palibajjheyya, agiddho ^a^M0.0303^ea^ assa agadhito amucchito anajjhosanno viitagedho vigatagedho cattagedho...pe0... brahmabhuutena attanaa vihareyyaati -- gaame ca naabhisajjeyya.

[03] ^b^laabhakamyaa jana.m na lapayeyyaa^eb^ti. katamaa lapanaa? laabhasakkaarasilokasannissitassa paapicchassa icchaapakatassa aamisacakkhukassa ^a^P2.0388^ea^ lokadhammagarukassa yaa paresa.m aalapanaa lapanaa sallapanaa ullapanaa samullapanaa unnahanaa samunnahanaa ukkaacanaa samukkaacanaa {ukkaapanaa samukkaapanaa (syaa0)} anupiyabhaa.nitaa ^a^V0.0286^ea^ caatukamyataa muggasuupyataa paaribha.tayataa parapi.t.thima.msikataa {pi.t.thima.msikataa (ka0) visuddhimagge siilaniddesava.n.nanaa oloketabbaa}, yaa ^a^T0.0470^ea^ tattha sa.nhavaacataa sakhilavaacataa sithilavaacataa {mettavaacakataa (syaa0)} apharusavaacataa -- aya.m vuccati lapanaa.

[03] api ca dviihi kaara.nehi jana.m lapati -- attaana.m vaa niica.m .thapento para.m ucca.m .thapento jana.m lapati, attaana.m vaa ucca.m .thapento para.m niica.m .thapento jana.m lapati. katha.m attaana.m niica.m .thapento para.m ucca.m .thapento jana.m lapati? ``tumhe me bahuupakaaraa, aha.m tumhe nissaaya labhaami ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanapaccayabhesajjaparikkhaara.m, yepi me a~n~ne daatu.m vaa kaatu.m vaa ma~n~nanti, tumhe nissaaya tumhe sampassantaa yampi me puraa.na.m maataapettika.m naamadheyya.m tampi me antarahita.m. tumhehi aha.m ~naayaami asukassa kuluupako asukaaya kuluupako''ti. eva.m attaana.m niica.m .thapento para.m ucca.m .thapento jana.m lapati.

[03] katha.m attaana.m ucca.m .thapento para.m niica.m .thapento jana.m lapati? ``aha.m tumhaaka.m bahuupakaaro, tumhe ma.m aagamma buddha.m sara.na.m gataa, dhamma.m sara.na.m gataa, sa"ngha.m sara.na.m gataa, paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirataa, adinnaadaanaa pa.tivirataa, kaamesumicchaacaaraa pa.tivirataa, musaavaadaa pa.tivirataa, suraamerayamajjappamaada.t.thaanaa pa.tivirataa. aha.m tumhaaka.m uddesa.m demi, paripuccha.m demi, uposatha.m aacikkhaami, navakamma.m adhi.t.thaami. atha pana tumhe ma.m ujjhitvaa a~n~ne sakkarotha garu.m karotha maanetha puujethaa''ti. eva.m attaana.m ucca.m .thapento para.m niica.m .thapento ^a^P2.0389^ea^ jana.m lapati.

[03] ^b^laabhakamyaa^eb^ ^a^T0.0471^ea^ ^a^M0.0304^ea^ ^b^jana.m na lapayeyyaa^eb^ti. laabhahetu laabhapaccayaa laabhakaara.naa laabhaabhinibbattiyaa laabha.m paripaacento jana.m na lapayeyya, lapana.m pajaheyya vinodeyya byanti.m kareyya anabhaava.m gameyya, lapanaa aarato assa virato pa.tivirato nikkhanto nissa.to vippamutto visa~n~nutto vimariyaadikatena cetasaa vihareyyaati -- laabhakamyaa jana.m na lapayeyya.
[03] tenaaha bhagavaa --
[21] ``kayavikkaye na ti.t.theyya, upavaada.m bhikkhu na kareyya kuhi~nci.
[22] gaame ca naabhisajjeyya, laabhakamyaa jana.m na lapayeyyaa''ti..
[21] ^b^na ca katthiko^eb^ {katthitaa (syaa0 ka0)} ^b^siyaa bhikkhu, na ca vaaca.m payutta.m bhaaseyya.^eb^
[22] ^b^paagabbhiya.m na sikkheyya, katha.m viggaahika.m na kathayeyya..^eb^

[03] ^b^na^eb^ ^a^V0.0287^ea^ ^b^ca katthiko siyaa bhikkhuu^eb^ti. idhekacco katthii hoti vikatthii. so katthati vikatthati ahamasmi siilasampannoti vaa vatasampannoti vaa siilabbatasampannoti vaa jaatiyaa vaa gottena vaa kolaputtiyena vaa va.n.napokkharataaya vaa dhanena vaa ajjhenena vaa kammaayatanena vaa sippaayatanena vaa vijjaa.t.thaanena vaa sutena vaa pa.tibhaanena vaa a~n~natara~n~natarena vaa vatthunaa. uccaa kulaa pabbajitoti ^a^T0.0472^ea^ vaa mahaabhogakulaa pabbajitoti vaa u.laarabhogakulaa pabbajitoti vaa suttantikoti vaa vinayadharoti vaa dhammakathikoti vaa aara~n~nikoti vaa...pe0... nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanasamaapattiyaa laabhiiti vaa katthati vikatthati. eva.m na kattheyya na vikattheyya, kattha.m pajaheyya vinodeyya byanti.m kareyya anabhaava.m gameyya, katthanaa aarato assa virato pa.tivirato nikkhanto nissa.to vippamutto visa~n~nutto vimariyaadikatena cetasaa vihareyyaati -- na ca katthiko siyaa bhikkhu.

[03] ^b^na^eb^ ^a^M0.0305^ea^ ^b^ca vaaca.m payutta.m bhaaseyyaa^eb^ti. katamaa payuttavaacaa? idhekacco ^a^P2.0390^ea^ ciivarapayutta.m vaaca.m bhaasati, pi.n.dapaatapayutta.m vaaca.m bhaasati, senaasanapayutta.m vaaca.m bhaasati, gilaanapaccayabhesajjaparikkhaarapayutta.m vaaca.m bhaasati -- ayampi vuccati payuttavaacaa.

[03] atha vaa ciivarahetu pi.n.dapaatahetu senaasanahetu gilaanapaccayabhesajjaparikkhaarahetu saccampi bha.nati musaapi bha.nati, pisu.nampi bha.nati apisu.nampi bha.nati, pharusampi bha.nati apharusampi bha.nati, samphappalaapampi bha.nati asamphappalaapampi bha.nati, mantaapi vaaca.m bhaasati -- ayampi vuccati payuttavaacaa. atha vaa pasannacitto paresa.m dhamma.m deseti -- ``aho vata me dhamma.m su.neyyu.m, sutvaava dhamma.m pasiideyyu.m, pasannaa ca me pasannaakaara.m kareyyu''nti -- aya.m vuccati payuttavaacaa. ^b^na ca vaaca.m payutta.m bhaaseyyaa^eb^ti. antamaso dhammadesana.m vaaca.m upaadaaya payuttavaaca.m na bhaaseyya ^a^T0.0473^ea^ na katheyya na bha.neyya na diipeyya na vohareyya, payutta.m vaaca.m pajaheyya vinodeyya byanti.m kareyya anabhaava.m gameyya, payuttavaacaaya aarato assa virato pa.tivirato nikkhanto nissa.to vippamutto visa~n~nutto vimariyaadikatena cetasaa vihareyyaati -- na ca vaaca.m payutta.m bhaaseyya.

[03] ^b^paagabbhiya.m na sikkheyyaa^eb^ti. ^b^paagabbhiya^eb^nti tii.ni paagabbhiyaani -- kaayika.m paagabbhiya.m, vaacasika.m paagabbhiya.m, cetasika.m paagabbhiya.m. katama.m kaayika.m paagabbhiya.m? idhekacco sa"nghagatopi kaayika.m paagabbhiya.m dasseti, ga.nagatopi kaayika.m paagabbhiya.m dasseti, bhojanasaalaayapi kaayika.m paagabbhiya.m dasseti, jantaagharepi kaayika.m paagabbhiya.m dasseti, udakatitthepi ^a^V0.0288^ea^ kaayika.m paagabbhiya.m dasseti, antaraghara.m pavisantopi kaayika.m paagabbhiya.m dasseti, antaraghara.m pavi.t.thopi kaayika.m paagabbhiya.m dasseti.

[03] katha.m sa"nghagato kaayika.m paagabbhiya.m dasseti? idhekacco sa"nghagato acittiikaarakato there bhikkhuu gha.t.tayantopi ti.t.thati, gha.t.tayantopi nisiidati, puratopi ti.t.thati, puratopi nisiidati, uccepi aasane nisiidati, sasiisa.m paarupitvaa nisiidati ^a^P2.0391^ea^, .thitakopi bha.nati, baahaavikkhepakopi bha.nati. eva.m sa"nghagato kaayika.m paagabbhiya.m dasseti.

[03] katha.m ^a^M0.0306^ea^ ga.nagato kaayika.m paagabbhiya.m dasseti? idhekacco ga.nagato acittiikaarakato theraana.m bhikkhuuna.m anupaahanaana.m ca"nkamantaana.m saupaahano ca"nkamati ^a^T0.0474^ea^, niice ca"nkame ca"nkamantaana.m ucce ca"nkame ca"nkamati, chamaaya ca"nkamantaana.m ca"nkame ca"nkamati, gha.t.tayantopi ti.t.thati, gha.t.tayantopi nisiidati, puratopi ti.t.thati, puratopi nisiidati, uccepi aasane nisiidati, sasiisa.m paarupitvaapi nisiidati, .thitopi bha.nati, baahaavikkhepakopi bha.nati. eva.m ga.nagato kaayika.m paagabbhiya.m dasseti.

[03] katha.m bhojanasaalaaya kaayika.m paagabbhiya.m dasseti? idhekacco bhojanasaalaaya acittiikaarakato there bhikkhuu anupakhajja nisiidati, navepi bhikkhuu aasanena pa.tibaahati, gha.t.tayantopi ti.t.thati, gha.t.tayantopi nisiidati, puratopi ti.t.thati, puratopi nisiidati, uccepi aasane nisiidati, sasiisa.m paarupitvaa nisiidati, .thitakopi bha.nati, baahaavikkhepakopi bha.nati. eva.m bhojanasaalaaya kaayika.m paagabbhiya.m dasseti.

[03] katha.m jantaaghare kaayika.m paagabbhiya.m dasseti? idhekacco jantaaghare acittiikaarakato there bhikkhuu gha.t.tayantopi ti.t.thati, gha.t.tayantopi nisiidati, puratopi ti.t.thati, puratopi nisiidati, uccepi aasane nisiidati, anaapucchaapi ka.t.tha.m pakkhipati, anaapucchaapi dvaara.m pidahati. eva.m jantaaghare kaayika.m paagabbhiya.m dasseti.

[03] katha.m udakatitthe kaayika.m paagabbhiya.m dasseti? idhekacco udakatitthe acittiikaarakato there bhikkhuu gha.t.tayantopi otarati, puratopi otarati, gha.t.tayantopi nhaayati, puratopi nhaayati, uparitopi nhaayati, gha.t.tayantopi uttarati, puratopi uttarati ^a^T0.0475^ea^. eva.m udakatitthe kaayika.m paagabbhiya.m dasseti.

[03] katha.m ^a^V0.0289^ea^ antaraghara.m pavisanto kaayika.m paagabbhiya.m dasseti? idhekacco antaraghara.m pavisanto acittiikaarakato there bhikkhuu gha.t.tayantopi gacchati, puratopi gacchati, vokkammapi theraana.m bhikkhuuna.m purato gacchati ^a^P2.0392^ea^. eva.m antaraghara.m pavisanto kaayika.m paagabbhiya.m dasseti.

[03] katha.m antaraghara.m pavi.t.tho kaayika.m paagabbhiya.m dasseti? idhekacco antaraghara.m pavi.t.tho ``na pavisa, bhante''ti vuccamaano pavisati, ``na ti.t.tha, bhante''ti vuccamaano ^a^M0.0307^ea^ ti.t.thati, ``na nisiida, bhante''ti vuccamaano nisiidati, anokaasampi pavisati, anokaasepi ti.t.thati, anokaasepi nisiidati, yaanipi taani honti kulaana.m ovarakaani guu.lhaani ca pa.ticchannaani ca, yattha kulitthiyo kuladhiitaro kulasu.nhaayo kulakumaariyo nisiidanti tatthapi sahasaa pavisati, kumaarakassa siisampi paraamasati. eva.m antaraghara.m pavi.t.tho kaayika.m paagabbhiya.m dasseti -- ida.m kaayika.m paagabbhiya.m.

[03] katama.m vaacasika.m paagabbhiya.m? idhekacco sa"nghagatopi vaacasika.m paagabbhiya.m dasseti, ga.nagatopi vaacasika.m paagabbhiya.m dasseti, antaraghara.m pavi.t.thopi vaacasika.m paagabbhiya.m dasseti. katha.m sa"nghagato vaacasika.m paagabbhiya.m dasseti? idhekacco sa"nghagato acittiikaarakato there bhikkhuu anaapuccha.m vaa anajjhi.t.tho vaa aaraamagataana.m bhikkhuuna.m dhamma.m bha.nati, pa~nha.m visajjeti, paatimokkha.m uddisati ^a^T0.0476^ea^, .thitakopi bha.nati, baahaavikkhepakopi bha.nati. eva.m sa"nghagato vaacasika.m paagabbhiya.m dasseti.

[03] katha.m ga.nagato vaacasika.m paagabbhiya.m dasseti? idhekacco ga.nagato acittiikaarakato there bhikkhuu anaapuccha.m vaa anajjhi.t.tho vaa aaraamagataana.m bhikkhuuna.m dhamma.m bha.nati, pa~nha.m visajjeti, .thitakopi bha.nati, baahaavikkhepakopi bha.nati; aaraamagataana.m bhikkhuniina.m upaasakaana.m upaasikaana.m dhamma.m bha.nati, pa~nha.m visajjeti, .thitakopi bha.nati, baahaavikkhepakopi bha.nati. eva.m ga.nagato vaacasika.m paagabbhiya.m dasseti.

[03] katha.m antaraghara.m pavi.t.tho vaacasika.m paagabbhiya.m dasseti? idhekacco antaraghara.m pavi.t.tho itthi.m vaa kumaari.m vaa evamaaha -- ``itthannaame ittha.mgotte ki.m atthi? yaagu atthi, bhatta.m atthi, khaadaniiya.m atthi? ki.m pivissaama ^a^P2.0393^ea^, ki.m bhu~njissaama, ki.m khaadissaama, ki.m vaa atthi, ki.m ^a^V0.0290^ea^ vaa me dassathaa''ti vippalapati. eva.m antaraghara.m pavi.t.tho vaacasika.m paagabbhiya.m dasseti -- ida.m vaacasika.m paagabbhiya.m.

[03] katama.m cetasika.m paagabbhiya.m? idhekacco na uccaa kulaa pabbajito samaano uccaa kulaa pabbajitena saddhi.m sadisa.m attaana.m karoti cittena, na mahaabhogakulaa pabbajito samaano mahaabhogakulaa pabbajitena saddhi.m sadisa.m attaana.m karoti cittena, na u.laarabhogakulaa pabbajito ^a^M0.0308^ea^ samaano u.laarabhogakulaa pabbajitena saddhi.m sadisa.m attaana.m karoti cittena, na suttantiko ^a^T0.0477^ea^ samaano suttantikena saddhi.m sadisa.m attaana.m karoti cittena, na vinayadharo samaano vinayadharena... na dhammakathiko samaano dhammakathikena... na aara~n~niko samaano aara~n~nakena... na pi.n.dapaatiko samaano pi.n.dapaatikena... na pa.msukuuliko samaano pa.msukuulikena... na teciivariko samaano teciivarakena... na sapadaanacaariko samaano sapadaanacaarikena... na khalupacchaabhattiko samaano khalupacchaabhattikena... na nesajjiko samaano nesa~n~nikena... na yathaasanthatiko samaano yathaasanthatikena saddhi.m sadisa.m attaana.m karoti cittena, na pa.thamassa jhaanassa laabhii samaano pa.thamassa jhaanassa laabhinaa saddhi.m sadisa.m attaana.m karoti cittena, na dutiyassa jhaanassa laabhii samaano dutiyassa... na tatiyassa jhaanassa laabhii samaano tatiyassa... na catutthassa jhaanassa laabhii samaano laabhii samaano catutthassa... na aakaasaana~ncaayatanasamaapattiyaa laabhii samaano aakaasana~ncaayatanasamaapattiyaa... na vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanasamaapattiyaa laabhii samaano vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana samaapattiyaa... na aaki~nca~n~naayatanasamaapattiyaa laabhii samaano aaki~nca~n~naayatana samaapattiyaa... na nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanasamaapattiyaa laabhii samaano nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanasamaapattiyaa laabhinaa saddhi.m sadisa.m attaana.m karoti cittena -- ida.m cetasika.m paagabbhiya.m. ^b^na sikkheyyaa^eb^ti paagabbhiya.m na sikkheyya na careyya na aacareyya na samaacareyya na samaadaaya vatteyya, paagabbhiya.m pajaheyya vinodeyya byanti.m kareyya anabhaava.m gameyya, paagabbhiyaa aarato assa virato pa.tivirato nikkhanto nissa.to vippamutto visa~n~nutto vimariyaadikatena cetasaa vihareyyaati -- paagabbhiya.m na sikkheyya.

[03] ^b^katha.m^eb^ ^a^T0.0478^ea^ ^a^P2.0394^ea^ ^b^viggaahika.m na kathayeyyaa^eb^ti. katamaa viggaahikaa kathaa? idhekacco evaruupi.m katha.m kattaa hoti -- ``na tva.m ima.m dhammavinaya.m aajaanaasi...pe0... nibbe.thehi vaa sace pahosii''ti. vutta~nheta.m bhagavataa -- ``viggaahikaaya kho, moggallaana, kathaaya sati kathaabaahulla.m paa.tika"nkha.m, kathaabaahulle sati uddhacca.m, uddhatassa asa.mvaro, asa.mvutassa aaraa citta.m ^a^V0.0291^ea^ samaadhimhaa''ti. ^b^katha.m viggaahika.m na kathayeyyaa^eb^ti. viggaahika.m katha.m na katheyya na bha.neyya na diipeyya na vohareyya, viggaahika.m katha.m pajaheyya vinodeyya byanti.m kareyya anabhaava.m gameyya, viggaahikakathaaya aarato assa virato pa.tivirato nikkhanto nissa.to vippamutto visa~n~nutto vimariyaadikatena cetasaa vihareyyaati -- katha.m viggaahika.m na kathayeyya.
[03] tenaaha bhagavaa --
[21] ``na ^a^M0.0309^ea^ ca katthiko siyaa bhikkhu, na ca vaaca.m payutta.m bhaaseyya.
[22] paagabbhiya.m na sikkheyya, katha.m viggaahika.m na kathayeyyaa''ti..
[21] ^b^mosavajje na niyyetha, sampajaano sa.thaani na kayiraa.^eb^
[22] ^b^atha jiivitena pa~n~naaya, siilabbatena naa~n~namatima~n~ne.. ^eb^

[03] ^b^mosavajje na niyyethaa^eb^ti. mosavajja.m vuccati musaavaado. idhekacco ^a^T0.0479^ea^ sabhaggato {sabhaagaggato (sii0 ka0)} vaa parisaggato {parisagato (sii0 ka0)} vaa...pe0... aamisaki~ncikkhahetu vaa sampajaanamusaa bhaasitaa hoti -- ida.m vuccati mosavajja.m. api ca tiihaakaarehi musaavaado hoti -- pubbevassa hoti ``musaa bha.nissa''nti, bha.nantassa hoti ``musaa bha.naamii''ti, bha.nitassa hoti ``musaa mayaa bha.nita''nti, imehi tiihaakaarehi musaavaado hoti. api ca catuuhaakaarehi... pa~ncahaakaarehi... chahaakaarehi... sattahaakaarehi... a.t.thahaakaarehi... musaavaado hoti -- pubbevassa hoti ``musaa bha.nissa''nti, bha.nantassa hoti ``musaa bha.naamii''ti, bha.nitassa hoti ``musaa mayaa ^a^P2.0395^ea^ bha.nita''nti vinidhaaya di.t.thi.m vinidhaaya khanti.m vinidhaaya ruci.m vinidhaaya sa~n~na.m vinidhaaya bhaava.m -- imehi a.t.thahaakaarehi musaavaado hoti. ^b^mosavajje na niyyethaa^eb^ti. mosavajje na yaayeyya na niyyaayeyya na vaheyya {na vuyheyya (sii0 ka0), natthi syaa0 potthake} na sa.mhareyya, mosavajja.m pajaheyya vinodeyya byanti.m kareyya anabhaava.m gameyya, mosavajjaa aarato assa virato pa.tivirato nikkhanto nissa.to vippamutto visa~n~nutto vimariyaadikatena cetasaa vihareyyaati -- mosavajje na niyyetha.

[03] ^b^sampajaano sa.thaani na kayiraa^eb^ti. katama.m saa.theyya.m? idhekacco sa.tho hoti parisa.tho, ya.m tattha sa.tha.m sa.thataa saa.theyya.m kakkarataa kakkariya.m parikkhattataa paarikkhattiya.m -- ida.m vuccati saa.theyya.m. ^b^sampajaano sa.thaani na kayiraa^eb^ti. sampajaano hutvaa saa.theyya.m na kareyya na janeyya na sa~njaneyya na nibbatteyya naabhinibbatteyya, saa.theyya.m ^a^T0.0480^ea^ pajaheyya vinodeyya byanti.m kareyya ^a^V0.0292^ea^ anabhaava.m gameyya, saa.theyyaa aarato assa ^a^M0.0310^ea^ virato pa.tivirato nikkhanto nissa.to vippamutto visa~n~nutto vimariyaadikatena cetasaa vihareyyaati -- sampajaano sa.thaani na kayiraa.

[03] ^b^atha jiivitena pa~n~naaya, siilabbatena naa~n~namatima~n~ne^eb^ti. ^b^athaa^eb^ti padasandhi...pe0... padaanupubbataapeta.m -- athaati. idhekacco luukhajiivita.m jiivanto para.m pa.niitajiivita.m jiivanta.m atima~n~nati -- ``ki.m panaaya.m bahulaajiivo sabba.m sa.mbhakkheti, seyyathida.m -- muulabiija.m khandhabiija.m pha.lubiija.m aggabiija.m biijabiijameva pa~ncama.m asanivicakkadantakuu.tasama.nappadhaanenaa''ti {asaniiva cakka.m dantakuu.ta.m sama.nappadhaanenaati (sii0)}. so taaya luukhajiivitaaya para.m pa.niitajiivita.m jiivanta.m atima~n~nati.

[03] idhekacco pa.niitajiivita.m jiivanto para.m luukhajiivita.m jiivanta.m atima~n~nati -- ``ki.m panaaya.m appapu~n~no appesakkho na laabhii ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanapaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraana''nti. so taaya pa.niitajiivitaaya ^a^P2.0396^ea^ para.m luukhajiivita.m jiivanta.m atima~n~nati. idhekacco pa~n~naasampanno hoti. so pu.t.tho pa~nha.m visajjeti. tassa eva.m hoti -- ``ahamasmi pa~n~naasampanno, ime pana~n~ne na pa~n~naasampannaa''ti. so taaya pa~n~naasampadaaya para.m atima~n~nati. idhekacco siilasampanno hoti, paatimokkhasa.mvarasa.mvuto viharati aacaaragocarasampanno, a.numattesu vajjesu bhayadassaavii, samaadaaya sikkhati sikkhaapadesu. tassa eva.m hoti -- ``ahamasmi siilasampanno, ime pana~n~ne ^a^T0.0481^ea^ bhikkhuu dussiilaa paapadhammaa''ti. so taaya siilasampadaaya para.m atima~n~nati. idhekacco vatasampanno hoti aara~n~niko vaa pi.n.dapaatiko vaa pa.msukuuliko vaa teciivariko vaa sapadaanacaariko vaa khalupacchaabhattiko vaa nesajjiko vaa yathaasanthatiko vaa. tassa eva.m hoti -- ``ahamasmi vata sampanno, ime pana~n~ne na vatasampannaa''ti. so taaya vatasampadaaya para.m atima~n~nati. ^b^atha jiivitena pa~n~naaya, siilabbatena naa~n~namatima~n~ne^eb^ti. luukhajiivitaaya vaa pa.niitajiivitaaya vaa pa~n~naasampadaaya vaa siilasampadaaya vaa vatasampadaaya vaa para.m naatima~n~neyya, naavajaaneyya, na tena maana.m janeyya, na tena thaddho assa, patthaddho paggahitasiroti -- atha jiivitena pa~n~naaya siilabbatena naa~n~namatima~n~ne.
[03] tenaaha bhagavaa --
[21] ``mosavajje na niyyetha, sampajaano sa.thaani na kayiraa.
[22] atha jiivitena pa~n~naaya, siilabbatena naa~n~namatima~n~ne''ti..
[21] ^b^sutvaa^eb^ ^a^V0.0293^ea^ ^a^M0.0311^ea^ ^b^rusito^eb^ {duusito (sii0 syaa0)} ^b^bahu.m vaaca.m, sama.naana.m vaa puthujanaana.m^eb^ {puthuvacanaana.m (sii0 syaa0)} ^b^.^eb^
[22] ^b^pharusena ne na pa.tivajjaa, na hi santo pa.tiseni.m karonti^eb^ {pa.tiseni karoti (syaa0)} ^b^..^eb^

[03] ^b^sutvaa^eb^ ^a^T0.0482^ea^ ^a^P2.0397^ea^ ^b^rusito bahu.m vaaca.m, sama.naana.m puthujanaana^eb^nti. ^b^rusito^eb^ti duusito khu.msito gha.t.tito vambhito garahito upavadito. ^b^sama.naana^eb^nti ye keci ito bahiddhaa paribbajuupagataa paribbajasamaapannaa. ^b^puthujanaana^eb^nti khattiyaa ca braahma.naa ca vessaa ca suddaa ca gaha.t.thaa ca pabbajitaa ca devaa ca manussaa ca, te bahukaahi vaacaahi ani.t.thaahi akantaahi amanaapaahi akkoseyyu.m paribhaaseyyu.m roseyyu.m viroseyyu.m hi.mseyyu.m vihi.mseyyu.m he.theyyu.m vihe.theyyu.m ghaateyyu.m upaghaateyyu.m upaghaata.m kareyyu.m tesa.m bahu.m vaaca.m ani.t.tha.m akanta.m amanaapa.m sutvaa su.nitvaa uggahitvaa upadhaarayitvaa upalakkhayitvaati -- sutvaa rusito bahu.m vaaca.m, sama.naana.m vaa puthujanaana.m.

[03] ^b^pharusena ne na pa.tivajjaa^eb^ti. ^b^pharusenaa^eb^ti pharusena kakkha.lena na pa.tivajjaa nappa.tibha.neyya, akkosanta.m na paccakkoseyya, rosanta.m nappa.tiroseyya, bha.n.dana.m nappa.tibha.n.deyya na kalaha.m kareyya na bha.n.dana.m kareyya na viggaha.m kareyya na vivaada.m kareyya na medhaga.m kareyya, kalahabha.n.danaviggahavivaadamedhaga.m pajaheyya vinodeyya byanti.m kareyya anabhaava.m gameyya, kalahabha.n.danaviggahavivaadamedhagaa aarato assa virato pa.tivirato nikkhanto nissa.to vippamutto visa~n~nutto vimariyaadikatena cetasaa vihareyyaati -- pharusena ne na pa.tivajjaa.

[03] ^b^na hi santo pa.tiseni.m karontii^eb^ti. ^b^santo^eb^ti raagassa santattaa santo, dosassa... mohassa... kodhassa... upanaahassa...pe0... sabbaakusalaabhisa"nkhaaraana.m ^a^T0.0483^ea^ santattaa samitattaa vuupasamitattaa vijjhaatattaa nibbutattaa vigatattaa pa.tipassaddhattaa santo upasanto vuupasanto nibbuto pa.tipassaddhoti -- santo. ^b^na hi santo pa.tiseni.m karontii^eb^ti. santo pa.tiseni.m pa.timalla.m pa.tika.n.taka.m {pa.tibandhana.m (sii0)} pa.tipakkha.m na karonti na janenti ^a^P2.0398^ea^ na sa~njanenti ^a^M0.0312^ea^ na nibbattenti naabhinibbattentiiti -- na hi santo pa.tiseni.m karonti.
[03] tenaaha bhagavaa --
[21] ``sutvaa rusito bahu.m vaaca.m, sama.naana.m vaa puthujanaana.m.
[22] pharusena ne na pa.tivajjaa, na hi santo pa.tiseni.m karontii''ti..
[21] ^b^eta~nca^eb^ ^a^V0.0294^ea^ ^b^dhammama~n~naaya, vicina.m bhikkhu sadaa sato sikkhe.^eb^
[22] ^b^santiiti nibbuti.m ~natvaa, saasane gotamassa nappamajjeyya..^eb^

[03] ^b^eta~nca dhammama~n~naayaa^eb^ti. ^b^eta^eb^nti aacikkhita.m desita.m pa~n~napita.m pa.t.thapita.m viva.ta.m vibhatta.m uttaaniikata.m pakaasita.m dhamma.m a~n~naaya jaanitvaa tulayitvaa tiirayitvaa vibhaavayitvaa vibhuuta.m katvaati. evampi eta~nca dhammama~n~naaya. atha vaa sama~nca visama~nca patha~nca vipatha~nca saavajja~nca anavajja~nca hiina~nca pa.niita~nca ka.nha~nca sukka~nca vi~n~nuugarahita~nca vi~n~nuupasattha~nca dhamma.m a~n~naaya jaanitvaa ^a^T0.0484^ea^ tulayitvaa tiirayitvaa vibhaavayitvaa vibhuuta.m katvaati. evampi eta~nca dhammama~n~naaya. atha vaa sammaapa.tipada.m anulomapa.tipada.m apaccaniikapa.tipada.m aviruddhapa.tipada.m anvatthapa.tipada.m dhammaanudhammapa.tipada.m siilesu paripuurakaarita.m indriyesu guttadvaarata.m bhojane matta~n~nuta.m jaagariyaanuyoga.m satisampaja~n~na.m, cattaaro satipa.t.thaane cattaaro sammappadhaane cattaaro iddhipaade pa~ncindriyaani pa~nca balaani satta bojjha"nge ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m, nibbaana~nca nibbaanagaamini~nca pa.tipada.m dhamma.m a~n~naaya jaanitvaa tulayitvaa tiirayitvaa vibhaavayitvaa vibhuuta.m katvaati. evampi ta~nca dhammama~n~naaya.

[03] ^b^vicina.m bhikkhu sadaa sato sikkhe^eb^ti. ^b^vicina^eb^nti vicinanto pavicinanto tulayanto tiirayanto vibhaavayanto vibhuuta.m karonto. ``sabbe sa"nkhaaraa aniccaa''ti...pe0... ``ya.m ki~nci samudayadhamma.m sabba.m ta.m nirodhadhamma''nti vicinanto ^a^P2.0399^ea^ pavicinanto tulayanto tiirayanto vibhaavayanto vibhuuta.m karontoti -- vicina.m bhikkhu. ^b^sadaa^eb^ti sadaa sabbadaa sabbakaala.m...pe0... pacchime vayokhandhe. ^b^sato^eb^ti catuuhi kaara.nehi sato -- kaaye kaayaanupassanaasatipa.t.thaana.m bhaavento sato...pe0... so vuccati sato. ^b^sikkhe^eb^ti ^a^M0.0313^ea^ tisso sikkhaayo -- adhisiilasikkhaa, adhicittasikkhaa, adhipa~n~naasikkhaa...pe0... aya.m adhipa~n~naasikkhaa. imaa tisso sikkhaayo aavajjanto sikkheyya...pe0... sikkheyya aacareyya samaacareyya samaadaaya vatteyyaati -- vicina.m bhikkhu sadaa sato sikkhe.

[03] ^b^santiiti^eb^ ^a^T0.0485^ea^ ^b^nibbuti.m ~natvaa^eb^ti. raagassa nibbuti.m santiiti ~natvaa, dosassa... mohassa...pe0... sabbaakusalaabhisa"nkhaaraana.m nibbuti.m santiiti ~natvaa jaanitvaa tulayitvaa tiirayitvaa vibhaavayitvaa vibhuuta.m katvaati -- santiiti nibbuti.m ~natvaa.

[03] ^b^saasane gotamassa nappamajjeyyaa^eb^ti. gotamassa saasane buddhasaasane jinasaasane tathaagatasaasane ^a^V0.0295^ea^ devasaasane arahantasaasane. ^b^nappamajjeyyaa^eb^ti sakkaccakaarii assa saataccakaarii a.t.thitakaarii anoliinavuttiko anikkhittacchando anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu. ``kadaaha.m aparipuura.m vaa siilakkhandha.m paripuureyya.m...pe0... aparipuura.m vaa samaadhikkhandha.m... pa~n~naakkhandha.m... vimuttikkhandha.m... vimutti~naa.nadassanakkhandha.m? kadaaha.m apari~n~naata.m vaa dukkha.m parijaaneyya.m, appahiine vaa kilese pajaheyya.m, abhaavita.m vaa magga.m bhaaveyya.m, asacchikata.m vaa nirodha.m sacchikareyya''nti? yo tattha chando ca vaayaamo ca ussaaho ca usso.lhii ca thaamo ca appa.tivaanii ca sati ca sampaja~n~na~nca aatappa.m padhaana.m adhi.t.thaana.m anuyogo appamaado kusalesu dhammesuuti -- saasane gotamassa nappamajjeyya.
[03] tenaaha bhagavaa --
[21] ``eta~nca dhammama~n~naaya, vicina.m bhikkhu sadaa sato sikkhe.
[22] santiiti nibbuti.m ~natvaa, saasane gotamassa nappamajjeyyaa''ti..
[21] ^b^abhibhuu^eb^ ^a^T0.0486^ea^ ^a^P2.0400^ea^ ^b^hi so anabhibhuuto, sakkhidhammamaniitihamaddasi.^eb^
[22] ^b^tasmaa hi tassa bhagavato saasane, appamatto sadaa namassamanusikkhe..^eb^[iti bhagavaa]

[03] ^b^abhibhuu^eb^ ^a^M0.0314^ea^ ^b^hi so anabhibhuuto^eb^ti. ^b^abhibhuu^eb^ti ruupaabhibhuu {abhibhuutaruupaa (syaa0) evama~n~nesu pa~ncapadesupi} saddaabhibhuu gandhaabhibhuu rasaabhibhuu pho.t.thabbaabhibhuu dhammaabhibhuu, anabhibhuuto kehici kilesehi, abhibhosi ne paapake {abhibhuu hi ne hiine paapake (sii0 ka0), abhibhuu hi paapake (syaa0)} akusale dhamme sa.mkilesike ponobhavike sadare dukkhavipaake aayati.m jaatijaraamara.niyeti -- abhibhuu hi so anabhibhuuto.

[03] ^b^sakkhidhammamaniitihamaddasii^eb^ti. ^b^sakkhidhamma^eb^nti na itihitiha.m na itikiriyaaya na paramparaaya na pi.takasampadaaya na takkahetu na nayahetu na aakaaraparivitakkena na di.t.thinijjhaanakkhantiyaa saama.m sayamabhi~n~naata.m attapaccakkhadhamma.m addasi addakkhi apassi pa.tivijjhiiti -- sakkhidhammamaniitihamaddasi.

[03] ^b^attada.n.daa bhaya.m jaata^eb^nti. ^b^da.n.daa^eb^ti tayo da.n.daa -- kaayada.n.do, vaciida.n.do, manoda.n.do. tividha.m kaayaduccarita.m kaayada.n.do, catubbidha.m vaciiduccarita.m vaciida.n.do, tividha.m manoduccarita.m manoda.n.do. ^b^bhaya^eb^nti dve bhayaani -- di.t.thadhammika~nca bhaya.m samparaayika~nca bhaya.m. katama.m di.t.thadhammika.m bhaya.m? idhekacco kaayena duccarita.m carati, vaacaaya duccarita.m carati, manasaa duccarita.m carati, paa.nampi hanati, adinnampi aadiyati, sandhimpi chindati, nillopampi harati, ekaagaarikampi karoti, paripanthepi ti.t.thati, paradaarampi gacchati, musaapi bha.nati. tamena.m gahetvaa ra~n~no dassenti -- ``aya.m, deva, coro aagucaarii. imassa ya.m icchasi ta.m da.n.da.m pa.nehii''ti. tamena.m raajaa paribhaasati. so paribhaasapaccayaa bhayampi uppaadeti, dukkha.m domanassa.m {dukkhadomanassa.m (syaa0)} pa.tisa.mvedeti. eta.m bhaya.m dukkha.m domanassa.m kuto tassa? attada.n.dato jaata.m sa~njaata.m nibbatta.m abhinibbatta.m paatubhuuta.m.

[03] yathaa pana na.lo asaaro nissaaro saaraapagato, yathaa era.n.do asaaro nissaaro saaraapagato, yathaa udumbaro asaaro nissaaro saaraapagato, yathaa setakaccho ^a^P2.0410^ea^ asaaro nissaaro saaraapagato, yathaa paaribhaddako asaaro nissaaro saaraapagato, yathaa phe.napi.n.do asaaro nissaaro saaraapagato, yathaa udakapubbu.la.m {bubbulaka.m (sii0), pubbu.laka.m (syaa0)} asaara.m nissaara.m saaraapagata.m ^a^T0.0498^ea^, yathaa mariici asaaraa nissaaraa saaraapagataa, yathaa kadalikkhandho asaaro nissaaro saaraapagato, yathaa maayaa asaaraa nissaaraa saaraapagataa; evameva nirayaloko asaaro nissaaro saaraapagato niccasaarasaarena ^a^M0.0322^ea^ vaa sukhasaarasaarena vaa attasaarasaarena vaa niccena vaa dhuvena vaa sassatena vaa avipari.naamadhammena vaa.

[03] tiracchaanayoniloko... pettivisayaloko... manussaloko... devaloko asaaro nissaaro saaraapagato ^a^V0.0304^ea^ niccasaarasaarena vaa sukhasaarasaarena vaa attasaarasaarena vaa niccena vaa dhuvena vaa sassatena vaa avipari.naamadhammena vaa. khandhaloko... dhaatuloko... aayatanaloko... aya.m loko... paro loko... brahmaloko... devaloko asaaro nissaaro saaraapagato niccasaarasaarena vaa sukhasaarasaarena vaa attasaarasaarena vaa niccena vaa dhuvena vaa sassatena vaa avipari.naamadhammena vaati -- samantamasaaro loko.

[03] ^b^disaa sabbaa sameritaa^eb^ti. ye puratthimaaya disaaya sa"nkhaaraa, tepi eritaa sameritaa calitaa gha.t.titaa aniccataaya jaatiyaa anugataa jaraaya anusa.taa byaadhinaa abhibhuutaa mara.nena abbhaahataa dukkhe pati.t.thitaa ataa.naa ale.naa asara.naa asara.niibhuutaa. ye pacchimaaya disaaya sa"nkhaaraa...pe0... ye uttaraaya disaaya sa"nkhaaraa... ye dakkhi.naaya disaaya sa"nkhaaraa... ye puratthimaaya anudisaaya sa"nkhaaraa... ye pacchimaaya anudisaaya sa"nkhaaraa... ye uttaraaya anudisaaya sa"nkhaaraa... ye dakkhi.naaya anudisaaya sa"nkhaaraa... ye he.t.thimaaya disaaya sa"nkhaaraa... ye uparimaaya disaaya sa"nkhaaraa... ye dasasu disaasu sa"nkhaaraa, tepi eritaa sameritaa calitaa gha.t.titaa aniccataaya jaatiyaa anugataa jaraaya anusa.taa byaadhinaa abhibhuutaa mara.nena ^a^T0.0499^ea^ abbhaahataa dukkhe pati.t.thitaa ataa.naa ale.naa asara.naa asara.niibhuutaa. bhaasitampi ceta.m --
[21] ``ki~ncaapi ^a^P2.0411^ea^ ceta.m jalatii vimaana.m, obhaasaya.m uttariya.m disaaya.
[22] ruupe ra.na.m disvaa sadaa pavedhita.m, tasmaa na ruupe ramatii sumedho..
[21] ``maccunaabbhaahato loko, jaraaya parivaarito.
[22] ta.nhaasallena oti.n.no, icchaadhuumaayito {icchaadhumaayiko (syaa0)} sadaa..
[21] ``sabbo aadiipito ^a^M0.0323^ea^ loko, sabbo loko padhuupito.
[22] sabbo pajjalito loko, sabbo loko pakampito''ti..
[03] disaa sabbaa sameritaa.

[03] ^b^iccha.m bhavanamattano^eb^ti. attano bhavana.m taa.na.m le.na.m sara.na.m gati.m paraayana.m icchanto saadiyanto patthayanto pihayanto abhijappantoti -- iccha.m bhavanamattano. ^b^naaddasaasi.m anosita^eb^nti. ajjhosita.myeva addasa.m, anajjhosita.m naaddasa.m, sabba.m yobba~n~na.m jaraaya osita.m, sabba.m ^a^V0.0305^ea^ aarogya.m byaadhinaa osita.m, sabba.m jiivita.m mara.nena osita.m, sabba.m laabha.m alaabhena osita.m, sabba.m yasa.m ayasena osita.m, sabba.m pasa.msa.m nindaaya osita.m, sabba.m sukha.m dukkhena osita.m.
[21] ``laabho ^a^T0.0500^ea^ alaabho yaso ayaso ca, nindaa pasa.msaa ca sukha.m dukha~nca.
[22] ete aniccaa manujesu dhammaa, asassataa vipari.naamadhammaa''ti..
[03] naaddasaasi.m anosita.m.
[03] tenaaha bhagavaa --
[21] ``samantamasaaro loko, disaa sabbaa sameritaa.
[22] iccha.m bhavanamattano, naaddasaasi.m anosita''nti..
[21] ^b^osaane^eb^ ^a^P2.0412^ea^ ^b^tveva byaaruddhe, disvaa me aratii ahu.^eb^
